1a1(skyes rabs): skyes rabs kyi rgyud slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa bzhugs//
1b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA ta ka mU la/ bod skad du
1b2(skyes rabs): skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud/ bam po dang po// bcom ldan
2a1(skyes rabs): 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan yon tan dam pas yongs gzung bkra shis
2a2(skyes rabs): pa grags pa'i gzhir gyur ma smad shin tu yid du 'ong // thub pa'i sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa rmad byung rnams// bdag
2a3(skyes rabs): gis snyan dngags me tog snyim pas gus pas mchod// grags pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa bzang po 'di rnams kyis//
2b1(skyes rabs): bde bar gshegs 'gyur lam rnams gang yin bstan par 'gyur// yid la dad pa med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 2d+d+ho//
2b2(skyes rabs): mchogi spyod pa dam pa'i phyogs tsam gyis// bdag gi snyan dngags mnyan du rung bar bya ba'i phyir// lung dang gtsug lag rigs pas mi 'gal lam dag gis// de ltar 'dzin don
2b3(skyes rabs): 'gyur snyom nas 'di brtsom so// rang don brtson pas gzhan don brtson pa gang yin po'i// ston sgrub pa bzang po'i rje su mthun ma gyur// thad mkhyen ces brjod pa ma nA gsal bar gra/
2b4(skyes rabs): mnyam me de dang chos dang dge 'dun spyi bos 'dud// bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la yang son tha~Md la rgyu med par rab tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas sang+yas bac+doM sa la sem+ba rabyA dwa
3a1(skyes rabs): bya'o// de yang 'di skad thos so// bdag cag gi bla ma dkon mchog gsum bla mar byed pa/ sgrub pa'i yon tan rnams kyis bla ma mgu bar byas pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs kyis bla mar gyur pa rnams kyis
3a2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe snga ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'di yongs su bsgrags pa rjesu thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' yi dam bcoM lnga pa khyad par can dang mthun par gyur/ sbyin po dang / tshig sbyin pa dang / don spyod pa lnga sogs pa shes rab kyi yongs
3a3(skyes rabs): su zin pas skyo ba med rnying snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa rnams kyis 'jig rten yong su 'dzin pA na rang gi choso la mngon par dga' ba las gyur pa'i gtsang sbra dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze'i rigs chen po dzaM mtho ji mthor gyur pa zhig tu skye ba yongasu bzung bar gyur
3a4(skyes rabs): to zhes grago// de skyes pa'i las bya ba la sogs pas sbyang ba rim pa bzhin du byas shing rim pa bzhin du mngon par mtho bar skyes pa na rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs pa dang / mgon skyabs kyi khyad par dang / shes pa ches cher 'dzin pa dang / le lo med pas ring
3a5(skyes rabs): po ma thogs par rig bI gnas bco brgyad dang / bdag gi rigs dang mi 'gal ba'i rgyu rtsal rnams la slob dpon gyi go 'phong thob par gyur to// rigs byed shes la de ni tshangs po bzhin// rgyal po rnams kyis bkur ba rgyal po bzhin// skye dgu rnams lha
3a6(skyes rabs): brgya byin mngon sum pozhen// shes 'dod rnams la don spyod pa dang 'dra/ de skal ba dang ldan zhing yon tan khyad par can du gyur pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang grags pa'i khyad par rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rdo blo tshes la gos
3b1(skyes rabs): par bsgoms pa dang / rab tu byung ba la 'dris par byas pas de la mngon par dgar ma gyur to// snron gyi spyod pas de blo yongs su dag/ 'dod pa rnams la skyon mang mthong nas ni// khyim na gnas pa nad bzhin yongs spangs nas// nags tshal gnas shig
3b2(skyes rabs): rab tu brgyan par gyur// de ni drar yang chags maud dA yi su// shes rab yongs su sbyang shing zhi ba yis// mi yis 'jig rten pa'i dam pa'i spyod bral ba// ngan par spyod la chags pa bzlog pa bzhin// de yi rang bzhin byams pa'i bdag nyid
3b3(skyes rabs): kyis// rnam par brlan pa bzhin du sems mthun zhing // phan tshun gnod pa med pa'i sems gyur nas// dka' thub can gcan gzan khro bo'ang spyod// spyod pa dag cing dbang po dul ba dang // cho ga shes ldan zhing snying rje'i yon tan gyis// 'jig rten dag na
3b4(skyes rabs): skye bro ma 'bris pa'ang // gzhan la dwe byams bzhin du de la byams// 'dod pa chung la ngan g.yo mi shes shing // rnyed dang gragasna dang bde la ma chags paso// do ni lha rnams yid kyang mgu gyur nas// dang zhing gus la rab tu gzhol bar byed// de ni rab tu byung bar
3b5(skyes rabs): mi thos te// dra yi yon tan rnams kyis sems drangs te// gnyen dang yongasu gzung ba rnam spungs te// dgongs grub bzhin du de yi slob mar gyur// tshul khrims gtsang sbra dbang po dul ba dang // drin pa ma nyams rab tu dben pa dang // byams la sogs dang yid ni ting
3b6(skyes rabs): dzin la// de ni slob ma rnams la ci nus ston// de nas bdag nyid chen po de re zhig cig na slob ma'i tshogs rnams ni phal cher yongs rdzogs shing rgya cher gyur// dge pa'i lam li ni rab tu bkod// 'jig rten pa rnams ni nges pa'i lam dam pa la btsud// ngan song gi smon
4a1(skyes rabs): bcad pa bzhin du byas// bang 'gro'i lam ni lam po che bzhin du byas nas// tshe 'di la bde ba smyung ba 'i'i dri'i mo rjes sgyu mthun pa'i slob ma ma pham pA dang 'khrugs te// rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i gnas rlots+tsha sul spyan sgros
4a2(skyes rabs): shig tu gnas shing spyod do// de nas ri khrod de na ni// stag mo phrug gu 'brangs pa zhig/ phrug gu 'byungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// spyod pa nyams par gyur pa mthong // mig gnyis lha bzhan por gyur// bkres pas lto ba rab tI ts+li/
4a3(skyes rabs): phrug gu bdag gi bu yon yang // kha zas bzhin du lta bar gyur// mA la yid gcugs 'jigs med cing // nu zho 'dod phyir lpags pa las// stag skad nyer nyer sgra 'byin cing // gzhan gyi bu bzhin spong bar gyur// byang chub sems dpas
4a4(skyes rabs): de mthong nas// brtan yang snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// sa g.yos pa yi ljon shing bskrin// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gdungs pos 'dir// bdag gi sdug bsngal chen pos kyang // snying rje'i bdag nyid bstan pa gsal// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal chung
4a5(skyes rabs): dus kyang // 'dar bar gyur pa de rmad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brdebs shing rings rings skad du smra ba'i tshig rang bzhin khyad par can la gas la bar ston pa snying rje'i dbang gis tshig 'bru gsal bar slob ma la smras pa// bu bu 'khor ba
4a6(skyes rabs): yon tan med la ltos// gcan zan mo ni ltogs nas su// byams par mtshams las 'das nas ni// bdag gi bu yang za bar 'dod// kye ma'o bdag la byams pa 'di// ha cang ma 'os mi bzod do// ha cang ma yang bdag gi bu// za bar 'dod pa
4b1(skyes rabs): ga la srid// gang phyir 'di 'dra'i las dag kyang // byed par rtsol ba de lta bu'i// bdag la byams pa'i dgra bo de// 'phel bar byed pa su zhig yod// de bsna na stag mo bdag dang phrug gu rnams ma rungs par ma gyur par 'di bkres pa'i sdug
4b2(skyes rabs): bsngal gsal ba'i rgyu ga zhig nas myur du tshol cig/ bdag kyang 'di'i thub chos 'di las bzlog pa'i phyir 'bad do// des kyang de mnyan te de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes nas// de'i zas 'tshol ba la 'bad par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas
4b3(skyes rabs): slob ma de snyed bta rigs te gtang nas bsams pa// bdag gi lus 'di tshang bar yod bzhin du// ci phyir gzhan las sha ni btsal bar bya// des kyang rnyed dam mi rnyed gtol med la// bdag gis dgos pa 'di yang mi 'grub srid//
4b4(skyes rabs): gnyis su na// bdag med 'jig la snying po med pa'i lus// sdug bsngal dri med rtag tu mi gtsang po'i// lus kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs gyur pa la// dga' bar mi 'gyur de ni mkhas pa yin// bdag gi bde la chags nas
4b5(skyes rabs): gzhan dag/ sdug bsngal yal bar dor ba mthu med dam// gzhan dag sdug bsngalnga dgra la bde ba med// nus pa yod bzhin ci ste yal bar dor// nus pa yod bzhin bdag gis yal bor nas// gsod pa'i sgra yang sdug bsngal
4b6(skyes rabs): byed pa la// yal bar bor na sdig pa byis pa bzhin// bdag gi sems ni 'dam bu mes tshig bzhin// de bas lus kyis bsrung ba bya ba ni// g.yang sar lhung la thug pa'i srog yod pas// phrug gu gsang las gcan mo bsrung ba dang /
5a1(skyes rabs): dang / gcan mo las kyang de'i phyag gu bsrung // gzhan yang / 'jig rten phan brtson rnams la bstan pa dang // brtson 'grus zhan pa spro ba bskyed pa dang // gtong phod rnams ni dga' ba bskyed pa dang // skye bo dam pa'i yid ni drang ba dang //
5a2(skyes rabs): bdud kyi sde chen sgra ni bkod pa dang // sangs rgyas yon tan dga' ba dang ba dang // bdag gi don brtson ngo tsha bskyed pa dang // 'jungs dang 'dod chen can yang ngo tsha bskyed// theg pa mchog la brten pa dang bskyed cing // gtong ba snyems pa ngo mtshar bskyed pa dang /
5a3(skyes rabs): gtong ba dga' ba rjes su yi rang rnams// mtho ris lam chen rnam par sbyang phyir ro// lus tsam gyis kyang gzhan la phan thogs par// nam zhig 'gyur zhes bdag gis gang bsams pa// smon lam de ni 'bras bu yod par bya// byang chub mchog kyang
5a4(skyes rabs): rab tu nye bar bya'o// 'dran phyir ma yin grags pa 'dod phyir min// mtho ris 'dod dang rgyal srid bsgrub phyir min// bdag gi bde ba mchog thob phyir min gyi// gzhan don bsgrub phyir bdag ni 'di rtsom mo// de bas bdag ni 'di yau lus gcig tu// 'jig
5a5(skyes rabs): rten dag la sdug bsngal bde 'byung ba// bsal zhing bsgrub pa rtag tu nus gyur cig/ nyi mas mun bsil snang byung nus bzhin no// mthong zhing thos sam rjesu dran yang rung // reg gam gtam du brjod par gyur kyang rung // rnam pa kun tu 'gro la phan pa ni//
5a6(skyes rabs): bde ba ldan pa rtag tu byed gyur cig/ de ltar gzhan don bsgrub phyir nges byas nas// srog dang bral yang rab tu dgar 'gyur te// bstan pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skye 'gyur bar// bdag gi lus ni de nas bor bar gyur// de nas stag mo nges byang chub sems dpas
5b1(skyes rabs): lus bor ba'i sgra des khros shing ngo mtshar skyes nas bdag gi phrug gu bca' ba gtang ste// de nas mig gnyis kyis bltas na// byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral ba mthong nas// de ma thag tu nye bar 'ongs te bza' bar brtsamaso// de'i 'og
5b2(skyes rabs): tu de'i slob ma de shwa rnyed pas slar 'ongs te/ mkhan po gang na bzhugs snyam nas bltas na// byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus dang bral ba stag mo de za zhing 'dug pa mthong ba dang // des de'i spyod pa khyad par can ngo mtshar che bar bzung nas mya ngan dang sdug
5b3(skyes rabs): bsngal gyi shugs btang ste// de'i yon tan gyi gzhi la smon pa tshig tu smra ba bzhin du yid la bsams pa tshig tu smras na legs te// e ma'o// sdug bsngal can la 'di snying rje// bdag nyid che ba bdag nyid bde ma chags// dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa
5b4(skyes rabs): mchog tu byas// gzhan gyi dpal dang grags pa zil gyis mnan// e mA'o// rab tu dba' ba 'jig pa med// yon tan gzhi ldan byams mchog rnam par bstan// e ma'o yon tan chen po bdag gi lus// phyag gi gnas kyi khyad par can
5b5(skyes rabs): du byas// rang bzhin zhi ba sa bzhi bzhin du bstan// e ma'o/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// e ma'o// dpa' ba phun sum tshogs pa 'dis// bdag gi skyon ni rab tu grags par gyur// mgon po 'dis ni mgon dang bcas byas pa//
5b6(skyes rabs): da ni 'gro ba mya ngan bya mi dgos// gzhan gyis pham du dgos pa'i bdud dag kyang // da ni nges par shugs kyang nar zhes 'byin// yod ye skal ba chen po sems can thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa// thugs rje shin tu rlabs che ba// snying stobs dpag
6a1(skyes rabs): tu med pa// byang chub sems dpa' don ji lta ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas// de nas don de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la sbran to// de nas de'i spyod pa ngo mtshar gyur pa'i slob ma dang // dri za gnod sbyin klu dang sum cu rtsa
6a2(skyes rabs): gsum bdag po rnams// phreng ba na bza' rgyan dang tsan ngan phye ma char 'bab pas// de yi sku gdung rin chen 'dzin pa'i sa gzhi khebs par byas// de bas na de ltar bcom ldan 'das sku tshe snga ma la yang sems can thams cad la rgyu med par rab tu
6a3(skyes rabs): byams pa'i rang bzhin can// sems can thams cad bdag gir gyur pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dad par bya'o// dad pa bskyed pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de lta bas na de ni bdag
6a4(skyes rabs): cag gis dad par bya ba'i gnas yin no zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar chos kyang bya dka' ba mang pos bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir rim 'gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o// de lta snying rje ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin zhing ngo bo nyid
6a5(skyes rabs): khyad par can sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir snying rje'i yon tan bsdogs po la yang brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i rgyud las rtogs pa brjod pa dang pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das des bya dka' ba brgya phrag mang
6a6(skyes rabs): pos bdag cag gi don du dam po'i chos 'di yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o// de yang 'di skad thos te// bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dpag tu med pa'i dus nas goms par bya ba bsod
6b1(skyes rabs): nams kyi las byas shing bsags shing 'dris par byas pa de re zhig cig yul shi bi rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to zhes grag go// de byis pa nas rgan pa la bsnyen bskur byed par dga' ba/ dul ba la rjesu dga' ba/ rje blon byams pa/ rang bzhin
6b2(skyes rabs): gyis yid gzhungs pas rig pa du ma rtogs pa'i blo rgya che ba/ spro ba dang gsang tshig dang / gzi byin gyi mthu dang / skal pa phun sum tshogs pas skye dgu rnams bdag gi bu bzhin du skyong bar gyur to// de la 'khor gsum rjes mthun yon tan tshogs
6b3(skyes rabs): phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du gnas par gyur// dngos po thams cad yongs su rdzogs gyur cing // 'gal zhing 'khrugs pas mdzes pa med ma gyur// ma dul ba phyar ba rnams la dpyas gyur pa// blun po rnams ni rab tu phung byed pa// bdag nyid
6b4(skyes rabs): chung ngu rnams ni myos 'gyur gang // dpal de de la ming ni don bzhin gyur// rang bzhin rgya che snying rje'i yon tan ldan// rgyal po de ni nor la dbang byed phyir// phongs pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i don grub pas// ngo 'dzum mi gnag bzhin bzangs mthong
6b5(skyes rabs): bas dga'// de nas rgyal po de sbyin pa la dga' bas grong khyer gyi kho khor yug tu sbyin po'i khang pa nor dang 'bru dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa rtsig tu bcug nas// bdag gi bdag nyid che ba dang rjes su mthun pa/ re ba ji lta ba bzhin du
6b6(skyes rabs): skong ba// gus pa bcas pas yid dga' bar byed pa// dus bzhin du 'byor pas yid du 'ong ba'i sbyin pa'i char rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi sprin bzhin du phab par gyur te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba// mal cha dang
7a1(skyes rabs): stan dang gos dang bza' ba dang / byug spos dang / phreng ba dang gser dang / dungal la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams la char bzhin du phab po// de nas rgyal po de yis sbyin brlabs po che thos nas/ phyogs tha dad pa'i yus na gnas pa'i mi rnam
7a2(skyes rabs): ya mtshan che zhing snying dga' bar gyur te/ yul der lhags so// mi yul kun tu yid kyi rtags na yang // gzhan du bslang ba'i skabs ni ma rnyed na yang / phongs pa rnams ni dga' bzhon der lhags pa// nags tshol glang po mtsho chen dogs lhags bzhin// /
7a3(skyes rabs): de nas rgyal po de skye bo slong ba thob tu re bas yid dga' bar gyur pa mgron po'i chas su zhugs pas mi sdug par gyur pa rnams so so nas lhags pa dang / skye bo mdza' bshes byas nas 'ong ba dag/ mthong bar gyur nas dga' ba'i mig bskrad bzhin// slong
7a4(skyes rabs): ba'i tshig ni gtam snyan thos bzhin dga'// byin nas dga' ba slong bas kyang lhags te/ sbyin pa las byung de yi grags pa'i dri// phongs pa'i tshig gi rlung gis bsgrags pa dag/ rgyal po gzhan gyi dregs pa med byas pa// spos kyi glang po glang po gzha
7a5(skyes rabs): gyi bzhin// de nas re zhig cig rgyal po de sbyin gtong gi khang pa rnams nyul du song song ba dang // phongs pa rnams re bskong bas slong ba'i skye bo 'drul pa nyung bar mthong nas/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams mi 'phel bar gyur pas mgu bar ma gyur to// de la brten
7a6(skyes rabs): nas 'phongs pa tshim par gyur// sbyin la dpa' ba de ni snying ma tshim// phongs pa rnams kyis slong ba'i ngag gis// de yi sbyin pa'i tshad la thu bo ma gyur// des bsams pa/ phongs po rnams 'joms pa med cing bag brkyang ste/ bdag gi lus slong ba'i
7b1(skyes rabs): skyes bu dam pa ya rabs de dag re skying / nga nyon mongs 'ongs pa rnams tshig rtsub bos te bsdigs te bskrad pa bzhin du nor tsam la yang bag brkyang ste slang mi phod par gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal ba sbyin brlabs pa che// bdag gi lus la 'ang rab tu ma chag
7b2(skyes rabs): por/ sbyin par bya ba rnam rtog do reg nas// bud med khyo la gdung bzhin sa g.yos so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa gzhi g.yos pas ri'i rgyal po ri rib rin po che'i 'od gsal ba g.yos par gyur pa dang / 'di ci zhig snyam du rtog pa skyes so// rgyal po de'i
7b3(skyes rabs): rnam par rtog pa khyad par can 'di las sa g.yos par gyur par rig nas/ sems la ya mtshan che bar gyur te bsams pa// sbyin pa rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su// 'di ni rgyal po gyen mnga' rnams brtags sam// bdag gi lus 'di nges par sbyin byas
7b4(skyes rabs): nas// 'on te snying nas 'bad de bsams pa yin// de bas na 'di re zhig brtags par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po ngo blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te 'khor gyi nang na 'dug cing / phongs pa rnams la 'os 'os su gang ci 'dod ces bos te// nor bu rin po che dang /
7b5(skyes rabs): gser dang dngul dang nor gyi tshogs rnams ni phyung ste/ bkor gyi bla rnams kyis spyan byas// gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i gos kyi snod rnams ni kha phye// bzhon pa dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis drang ba'i shing rta'i khyad par bzang po rnams ni sogs
7b6(skyes rabs): skye bo phongs pa rnams ni so so nas lhags pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze rgan po long ba zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'ongs par gyur to// de nas rgyal po des snying rje dang byams pas bsgos pa'i lta bas bstan
8a1(skyes rabs): zhing gsal la zhi bas bsu zhing / 'khyud pa bzhin du bltas pa dang / rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams kyis ci 'dod ces dris pa dang / mi'i bdag po dang nye bar 'ongs nas/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis shis pa brjod de/ rgyal po la
8a2(skyes rabs): 'di skad ces smras so// sa bdag dam pa khyod kyi spyan 'tshal phyir/ rgan po ring nas mi mthong bzhin du mchis/ pad+ma'i spyan mnga' spyan ni gcig pus kyang / 'jig rten bdag khos 'jig rten bgyi ba 'grub/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la bsams shing smon pa rab
8a3(skyes rabs): tu 'grub pas rab tu dga' zhing spro bar gyur te/ ci bram ze 'di bden par smras sam/ 'on te 'di lta bu'i rtog pa la goms par bdag nyid kyis 'di ltar zin snyam du rtog pa skyes nas yid la mig slong ba'i tshig sman pa nyan par 'dod de// mige slong ba de la smras pa/ bram
8a4(skyes rabs): ze'i gtso bo nga la mig slong bar// su yi bstan nas khyod ni 'di ru 'ongs// mig ni rab tu btang dka' zhes grags pa'i// srid pa su zhig nga la meng par gyur// de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su gyur pa'i brgya byin des rgyal po de'i bsam pa rig nas/ smras pa/ brgya
8a5(skyes rabs): byin 'dre ba brgya byin gyis bstan nas// khyod la spyan slong slad du 'dir mchis so// de yi srid dang bdag gi re ba dag/ spyan rtsal bas ni 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de nas rgyal po de brgya byin gyis smos pas/ lha'i mthus bram ze 'di gdon mi za bar cho ga
8a6(skyes rabs): dis mig dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i tshig gsal bas de la 'di skad ces smras so// yid la re ba gang gis 'dir 'ongs pa'i// bram ze khyod kyi re ba de ngas bskang // nga yi mig ni ya gcig 'dod pa la// khyod la mig ni gnyis
8b1(skyes rabs): ka ngas sbyin gyis/ des khyod ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig gi gdong brgyan nas// ci dga' de 'di yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes// rnam rtog g.yeng ba de 'di yin zhes ngo mtshar gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro bas mthong bas song // de nas rgyal po de'i blon po
8b2(skyes rabs): rnams mig sbyin par stsol bar rig nas// brtabs pa dang bcas pa'i shugs kyis bsgrag par gdungs pa'i yidadu gyur nas// rgyal po la smras pa// sbyin pa la dgyes ches nas mi rigs pa dang // gnod par 'gyur ba mi rtag par// lha de ltar mi mdzad du gsol/
8b3(skyes rabs): spyan stsal bar mi rig so// bram ze 'di ni gcig pu'i phyir// bdag cag thams cad mi dor gsol// skye dgu bide bskyed pa rnams// mya ngan zhugs kyis mi bsreg gsol// dpal chen bskyed par gyur pa'i nor rnams dang // dpal dang ldan pa'i nor chen po
8b4(skyes rabs): gzhon dang // dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta stsol// glang po dregs pa gzi ldan 'gying bstsol// rkang gdug khrol ze'i sgra rnams grags pa yi// khang pa dus rnams kun tu bde ldan pa// ston ka'i sbron pas rab tu dkar ba stso le// 'gro ba'i mig gcig nyid kyi
8b5(skyes rabs): spyan ma stsal// gzhan yang rgyal po re zhig dgongs su gsol// gzhan gyi mig gzhan la ji ltar sbyar du rung // de ste 'di lta'i mthu zhig lags na khyod kyi spyan la bltos ci 'tshal/ lha gzhan yang / gzhan gyi 'byor la dbang byed pa/ mig gi dbul
8b6(skyes rabs): lo ci zhig bgyi// de bas dkor las stsal du gsol// lha cig thub tshod mi mdzad gsol// de nas rgyal po des blon po de rnams la byams pa'i tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ gang zhig sbyin zhes smras nas ni// mig sbyin pa yi blo skyed pa// de ni 'dod pa'i zhags
9a1(skyes rabs): pa yis/ bdag nyid slar ni 'ching bar byed// sbyin no zhes ni khas blangs nas// gang zhig yid la gzhan sems pa// ser snas ma nges blo can te// de las sdig che gang zhig yong // sbyin no zhes ni khas blangs pas// phongs pa'i re ba
9a2(skyes rabs): bstan byas nas// bslu ba'i tshig ni rtsub po des// sbyin pa bsams pa ci yang med// gang yang khyed na re lha'i mthu nyid kyis 'da'i mig yod par ci'i phyir mig gyur zhes zer pa de yang nyon cig// rgyu gcig gi ni 'grub pa yi// 'bras bu gang yang yod ma
9a3(skyes rabs): yin// lha rnams kyis ni byas pa yang // rgyu rkyen gzhan la bltos pas yod// de bas na nga sbyin pa chen po byed pa la khyed kyi bgegs byed pa mi rigs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha nor dang 'bru dang rin po che la sogs pa stsal pa'i rigs kyi/ nyid
9a4(skyes rabs): kyis spyan ni stsal ba'i mi rigs so zhes bdacig cag gis sngar gsol ba btab pa las sa te// de bas na bdag cag lha yul ma lags par gshegs su mi gsol lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zhig slong ba de nyid sbyin par bya// mi 'dod pa ni byin yang dag
9a5(skyes rabs): mi 'gyur// chus khyer ba la chu yis ci zhig bya// de bas bslangs pa'i don ni 'di la sbyin// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po chen po rab tu yid btsugs shing 'dris pa zhig byams pa'i shugs kyis btang ste rgyal po de la smos pa/ kye cung zhig gzhes shig/ la
9a6(skyes rabs): las dka' thub ting 'dzin cho ga chen pos gang zhig thob 'gyur zhing // gang la brten nas mchod sbyin chen po mang pos grags dang mtho ris 'thob// brgya byin longs spyod la yang 'gran pa'i rgyal srid thob pa de spangs nas// ci zhig mthong na khyod kyis mig
9b1(skyes rabs): sbyin cho ga 'di ni su las lobs// mchod sbyin byas pas sum cu rtsa gsum nye// grags pas kun tu rab tu gsal gyur cing // mi dbang gtsug gi 'od kyis rkang brgyan pa// ci zhig 'dod phyir mig ni sbyin par byed// de nas rgyal po ngos blon po
9b2(skyes rabs): de la byams pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa// nga 'bad 'di ni sa kun thob phyir min// mtho ris dang ni grags pa 'thob phyir min// slong ba 'di ni don med mi 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten bskyab phyir nga ni 'di ltar 'bod// de nas rgyal po des me tog
9b3(skyes rabs): ut+pa la mthing ka'i 'dab ma ltar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i mig ya gcig sman dpyad las 'byung ba bzhin du dral bus ma snang bar phyung ste// rab tu dga' bzhin du mig slong ba la byin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ci nas kyang mig de de'i mig tu
9b4(skyes rabs): gnas par gyur pa rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa des mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byas so// de nas mig ya gcig phye ste slong ba la bltas pa dang / rgyal po dri snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas mig ya gcig kyang de la sbyin no// de nas rgyal
9b5(skyes rabs): po de yis mig byin nas// pad+ma med pa'i pad+ma'i mtsho 'bru gdong // gzhan la med pa'i rab tu dga' bar gyur// bram ze'ang mig dang ldan par 'khor gyis mthong // rgyal po'i btsun ma'i 'khor dang pho brang 'khor rnams kyang // mya ngan mchi mos sa gzhi thams
9b6(skyes rabs): chag chag btab// rgyal po rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo brtan mthong nas ni// brgya byin de yang ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu dga'// de nas brgya byin ngo mtshar chen pos sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma'o brtan zhing snying stobs che//
10a1(skyes rabs): kye ma'o sems can phan 'dogs pa/ las 'di mngon sum gsal gyur kyang / the tshom za bar 'gyur ba 'dra// de bas na ngo mtshar che ba'i sems can 'di yun ring du 'di ltar nyon mongasu gzhug pa'i mi rigs kyi/ thabs kyis 'dra'i myig
10a2(skyes rabs): slar skye bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po de rim gyis mig gi rgyu ni saso// btsun mo'i 'khor dang po byung 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi mya ngan ni bsrabs shing sangs nas/ rab tu dben pa 'dod phyir phyir rdzing bu'i 'gram nas me tog gi ljid kyis non
10a3(skyes rabs): ba'i shing bzang po stug po yod pa/ ser bu bsil zhing bde la bsrung zhim por dang ldang ba/ bum pa mang po sgra 'byin pa zhig tu skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin mdun du 'ongs so// de nas rgyal pos 'di su zhes dris pa dang / nga ni lha'i
10a4(skyes rabs): dbang po brgya byin yin te khyod kyi drung du 'ongs so// gshegs pa legs so// ci zhes bka' stsal du gsol zhes zhes dang bcas par smras pa dang / rgyal po la yang smras pa/ rgyal ba drang srong ci 'dod pa'i mchog de slongs shig/ de nas rgyal po de sbyin pa la goms
10a5(skyes rabs): shing / 'dzungs shing slong ba la ma goms pa'i phyir brtan pas ngo mtshar mi che zhing rlabs can du smras pa/ brgya byin bdag la nor mang zhing dmago tshogs che la mthu dang ldan/ da ni long bar gyur pas bdag/ 'chi ba 'ba' zhig mngon par 'dong / gzhan yang smra/
10a6(skyes rabs): ba rnams ni yid la re ba kun/ yongs su bskang yang rab tu dgar gyur cing / legs par lta ba'i bzhin rnams mi mthong bas// de phyir dbang po bdag ni 'chi bar dga'/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur gyis ngo
10b1(skyes rabs): snyam ma sems shig/ 'on kyang re zhig ngas khyod la 'dra'o// slong ba rnams kyis 'di ltar gnas skabs gyur byas na/ da ni de la khyod kyis yid ni ji snyam sems/ ci nas kyang yid ni rab tu ches par 'gyur ba ru/ de ni gsang ba med par rab tu smra bar gyis//
10b2(skyes rabs): rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag ngom du gzhug par de tsam du khyod la ci ched che/ 'on kyang lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol// de tshe dang ni da lta 'ang slong rnams kyi/ bslang zhes nges par smra ba'i tshig rnams la/ shis pa brjod pa bzhin du bdag dga' na/ bdag gi/
10b3(skyes rabs): mog ni ya gcig mthong bar shog/ nga nas rgyal po de'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis mthu dang bsod nams spel ba'i khyad par gyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu me tog ut+pa la mthing ka'i dbus rin po che an+d+ra rnyil gyis spras pa 'dra ba'i mig ya
10b4(skyes rabs): gcig mthong bar gyur to// ya mtshan che ba'i mig de mthong bar gyur nas rgyal po de sems rab tu dga' bas yang brgya byin la smras pa/ gang yang bdag la ya gcig mig bslangs na// de la bdag gi mig gcig dga' bzhin byin// dga' zhing
10b5(skyes rabs): spro la rtse gcig sems 'gyur na// ya gcig mig kyang bdag la yong par shog/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu rgyal po de'i mig ye gcig kyang snga ma dang 'gran pa ra bzhin du yod par gyur to// de nas ri dang bcas pa'i sa chen g.yos// rgya mtsho'i
10b6(skyes rabs): rlabs kyang dus las 'das te byung // lha rnams kyis ni rnga bo che dag kyang // zab cing snyan pa'i sgra tshon sgrogs par gyur// phyogs rnams kun kyang dang zhing gsal bar snang // ston ka'i dus bzhin nyi ma gsal bar snang // tsan dan phye mas bsgos pa'i
11a1(skyes rabs): me tog rnams// na mkha'i nang nas lding zhing 'bab par gyur// lha'i bu mo'i gakhor bcas lha rnams kyang // ya mtshan che ba'i mig bgrang der lhags gyur// ser bu yid du 'ong ba bde ba ldang // 'gro ba rnams kyi yid kyang dga' bar gyur// 'u
11a2(skyes rabs): po mthu chen ngo mtshar gyur pa rnams// yid ni rab tu dga' bas khyab gyur nas// rgyal po'i spyod mchog bstod pa'i gzhi brjod pa// snyan pa'i tshig rnams kun tu grags par gyur// e ma'o rlabs che e ma'o snying rje che// 'di yi sems ni ji ltar rnam dag
11a3(skyes rabs): pos// e ma'o bdag gi bdi la sems ma chags// dpa' zhing brtan mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i spyan ni dpal ldan slar rgyas pas// khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon bcas bgyid pa legs// e ma'o bsod nams tshogs ni don yod pa//
11a4(skyes rabs): ring zhing lon nas khyod kyi byin gyis rgyal// de nas brgya byin gyis legaso legaso zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas nas yang smras pa// rgyal po khyod kyis bsam pa dag pa ni// nga yi snga nas mi shes ma yin te// rgyal po khyod kyi mig 'di gnyis//
11a5(skyes rabs): de ltar khyod la byin pas na// dpag tshang brgya ni khor yug tu// brag ri rnams kyi bar bcad kyang // khyod kyi mag gi 'di gnyis kyis// thog ma med par mthong bar gyur zhes smras nas// brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
11a6(skyes rabs): dpa' blon po chen po rnams dang / rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang // pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams ya mtshan che zhing rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i mig gis lta zhing // bram ze rnams kyis kyang rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i shes pa brjod pa'i tshig smra bas/
11b1(skyes rabs): mngon par dga' bar byas te// pho brang dam pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs btsugs pa mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par phyin nas 'khor gyi nang du 'dug ste dga' ba lta ba'i phyir lhags pa'i blon po chen po la sogs pa bram ze dang / pho
11b2(skyes rabs): brang 'khor gyi mi ya rabs rnams la de ltar bdag gis nyams su myong ba'i chos bshad do// rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams las gyur pa'o// lha yi mthu ldan nga yi mo gaM mthong na// phongs pa rnams ni nor gyi mgu byas la// 'jig rten na ni su
11b3(skyes rabs): zhig sgrim pa lhod// dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du// brag ri mang pos par bsdud kyang // shin tu ring na gnas pa yi// blta bar bya ba gsal bar mthong // gang phyir mi yi mig ni 'dir dbyin nas// mi lngas 'das pa'i lha'i mig bdag gis thob
11b4(skyes rabs): gzhan la brtse zhing dul ba las byung ba'o// sbyin las gzhan pa mngon mtho'i thabs gang yod// shi bi pa rnams de ltar rig byas nas// sbyin dang spyad pas nor rnams don yod byos// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan la'ang 'di nyid ni// grags
11b5(skyes rabs): pa che zhing bde ba 'byung ba'i lam// 'jig rten phan phyir byin pa gang yin pa// snying po med pa'i nor yang snying po yod// sbyin pa byas na gter dang 'dra bar yod// mu byin nA ni shin tu chud zos 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das des bdag
11b6(skyes rabs): cag gi phyir bya dka' ba mang pos dam pa'i chos 'di bsgrubs pa yin pas rim gro bskyed de chos nyan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid dang / snga ma bzhin du snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la bsod nams kyi 'bras
12a1(skyes rabs): bu mthong bar 'gyur ba la yang brjod par bya'o// de ltar rim gro bskyed de bsod nams bsngags pa ni bdag gi mthu chen pa thob par 'gyur ba'i me tog grags pa rgyun chags pa yid 'ong 'tsho 'di nyid la bstan pa yin no// yul
12a2(skyes rabs): shi bi ba'i skyes pa rabs te gnyis pa'o// // sems rab tu dad pa las byung ba dang / snod khyad par can la byin pa'i sbyin pa ni rnam par sbyin pa che ba'i phyir chud zhes bya ba gang yang med do// de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub
12a3(skyes rabs): sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe yul ko sa la'i bdag por gyur to zhes grago/ de yang spro ba dang gsang tshig dang mthu dang nus pa phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa rgyal po'i yon tan rnams mchog tu gyur pa zin kyang skal pa phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan bzang
12a4(skyes rabs): pos 'byor pa lhag par gyur to// skal pa phun sum tshogs brgyan pas// de yi yon tan lhag par gsal// sten ka'i dpal ni gsal gyur pa'i// zla ba'i 'od zer gsal ba bzhin// de'i sgra dregs pa rnams kyang // de la bsten pa rnams la chags//
12a5(skyes rabs): khros dang byams pa'i rjes 'brangs dpal// rgyal po gzhan la de ltar gyur// de ni chos kyis bdag nyid gyur pas na// gzhan la gnod pa'i sems gdug med par gyur/ de yi dpal ni dgra la mi 'gro bas// babangs kyang de la glo ba gnyer bar gyur/ de bdag gi tshe/
12a6(skyes rabs): snga ma 'das pa rje su dran par gyur to// de rjes su dran par gyur pas rab tu skyo bar gyur nas// dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / phongs pa dang slong ba rnams la bde ba'i rgyu dang / gzhir gyur pa'i sbyin pa khyad par can byin par gyur to// tshul khrims kyis
12b1(skyes rabs): sdom pa ma yin pa dang // gso sbyong dang nges par gnas pa dag kyang dus mtshams kyi nyin par yang dag par len to// rgyal po'i 'khor dang bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bsod nams kyi mthu bsgrags pa dang // 'jig rten pa rnams legs par dgo
12b2(skyes rabs): par 'dod pas dang ba'i sems kyi don pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis yang dang yang du smra'o// bde bar gshegs pa bkur sti byas pa chung ngu yang // 'bras bu 'byor dang chung ngu med ces sngon thos kyi// zan dron khengs pa rtsub po lan tshwa med pa yi/
12b3(skyes rabs): 'bras bu 'byor pa chen po 'di ltar gyur la ltos// shing rta sna tshogs rta dang glang po 'gying ba dang // bdag gi dmag tshogs chen pos 'di dang sa chen 'di// nor mang dpal yang rjes chags btsun mo rgya chen ldan// zan dron chad gcig 'bras bu grub pa
12b4(skyes rabs): bzang po ltos// blon po chen po rnams dang bram ze rgan po rnams dang // pho brang 'khor gyi mi stong rims rnams yid la ngo mtshar gyur kyang / rgyal po chen po ci la dgongs te tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis rtag tu gsung zhes de la slar zhu ma nus//
12b5(skyes rabs): de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo gnang chen spobs pa thogs pa med zhig ngo mtshar skyes nas gtam gleng ba'i skabasu bab ste/ 'khor gyi nang du de la zhus pa/ mi yi dbang po nges par gsung ba ni// thugs la dgongs pa'i dgyes pa zhal du byung //
12b6(skyes rabs): khyod kyis de skad gsungs pas bdag gi sems// ngo mtshar che bas rab tu g.yeng bar gyur// skye bo 'di yis de ni thos ri na// rgyal po ci phyir gsung ba bka' stsal gsol// gsang na de skad gar yang mi bsgrags te// de bas bdag gis
13a1(skyes rabs): grags par zhus pa lags// de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' zhing byams pa'i lta bas btsun mo la ltas te// 'dzum pa'i bzhin mdangs dang ldan pas// smras pa/ don dang rgyu mtshan ma phye bar// nga yis smras pa 'di thos nas// /
13a2(skyes rabs): 'di ni khyod nyid 'ba' zhig tu// ngo mtshar cher gyur yid g.yos min// blon po chen po tshogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // yid ni ngo mtshar chen pos rab tu g.yos par gyur// nga yi pho bra ring 'khor dang btsun mor bcas pa yang // gang phyir
13a3(skyes rabs): nga yis de skad smras pa mnyan par gyis// gnyid las sad pa bzhin du skye ba dus dran pa// dbang po tshul dang ldan kyang nor tsam gyis ni thob pa la// las kyis mgu bar byas nas dman tshis 'tsho ba yi// gla mi zhig tu grong khyer 'dir ni dgyur to//
13a4(skyes rabs): gzhan gyis brnyas zhing ngal la dman pa'i gla de yang / skyabs su re zhing mo 'tshor dogs nas de la zhugs// dge sbyong bzhi zhig bsod snyoms phyir lhags mthong bar gyur// dbang po dul zhing dge slong dpal gyi rjes 'brang bzhin// dang zhing 'jam pa'i
13a5(skyes rabs): yid kyi de la phyag byas nas// zan dron tsam zhig bdag gi khyim du gus par byin// da yi myu gu tsamra zhig byung ste 'di yin te// rgyal po gzhan gyi gtsug gis nga yi zhabs la gtugs// nga yi da las bsams nas ni// lha mo khyod la smras pa
13a6(skyes rabs): yin// bsod nams kyis ni ngoms mi myong // dgra bcom mthong bas mo ngomaso so// de nas lha mo de dga'i zhing ya mtshan che ba'i mig dgrang nas rgyal po la rab tu gus par lta zhing smras pa/ mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu ni bsod nams
13b1(skyes rabs): kyi rnam par smin pa lags par gang go// rgyal ba tshon pa 'di ltar bsod nams mdzad pa la gus pani bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du'o// de bas na 'di ltar dngos sdig mi mdzad pa dang // skye dgu rnams la pa bzhin du
13b2(skyes rabs): yongs su skyong ba legs par mdzad pa dang // bsod nams kyi yon tan sgrub pa la mngon par phyogs pa lagaso// grags pa dpal drang sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pas 'bar// bka' lung mnyan po rgyal po gzhan gyi spyi bos gnod// ser ma
13b3(skyes rabs): langs pa'i rlabs bskyod rgya mtsho gos gyon pa'i// chos kyi tshul bzhin sa chen yun ring skyong por gyur// rgyal pos smras pa/ lha me de de lhor ga la zhog ma yin// mtshan ma bzang pos mngon par mtshon pa'i legs po'i lam// de nyid la
13b4(skyes rabs): ni bdag gis ngacung bston par bya// 'jig rten par ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thob nas ster// ngo bdag nyam su myong na ci phyir sbyin mi bya// de nas rgyal po des lha mo bzhin du dpal 'bar ba'i lha mo la rab tu byams pas bltas nas// dpal phun
13b5(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa la sems zhen pas yang smras pa/ skar ma'i rlung na zla ba bzhin// bud med nang na rnam par mdzes// shin tu yid 'ong 'byung ba'i las// dge ldan khyed kyi ci zhig byas// lha mos smras pa/ lha bdag gis kyang tshe snga ma la
13b6(skyes rabs): cung zad cig bgyis pa rjes su dran no// de smros shig smros shig ces rgyal pos dris pa dang smras pa// byis pa'i tshe na myong ba de ni rjes dran zhing // bdag gi bran mo bgyid pa'i tshon zan chang gcig/ thub pa zag pa zad la gus par phul ba
14a1(skyes rabs): yis/ de'i tshe gnyis kyi logs las 'dir ni sad pa bzhin// mi rje lhas mdzad dge ba de ni bdag gis dran// de yis bdag ni sa dang bcas pa'i mgon khyod gyur// zag pa zad la byas pa chung ba gang yang med// ji ltar thub pas
14a2(skyes rabs): bka' stsal bzhin du khyod kyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po nges bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong bas de bsod nams gus pa skyed pa sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i 'khor ya mtshan lo rtse gcig tu gyur rig nas nges pa 'di 'dra ba cung zad cig rje su bstan to// /
14a3(skyes rabs): dge ba mi che bas kyang rnam smin rgya chen dpal 'di mthong nas su/ sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pas bsod nams bya ba mi 'bang su zhig yod// nor gyi tshogs par yod kyang ser sna'i mun pas gang zhigi blo bsgribs nas// sbyin pas grags pa thob par mi byed
14a4(skyes rabs): mide ltar mi rung // dbang med par ni gang zhig btang dgos de bzhin su la'ang phan mi thogs// nor de'i rigs par btang na gal te yon tan gang zhig thob 'gyur na// yon tan nyams ni yod bzhin de la su zhig ser sna'i lam la brten// sbyin
14a5(skyes rabs): pab las byung yon tan dga' ba sogs pa sna tshogs grags dang ldan// sbyin pa zhes bya gter chen rjes 'gro rkun po la sogs thun mong min// sbyin pa'i dong dang ser skyon gyi rdul can sems ni sbyong bar byed// sbyin pa 'khor ba'i lam bgrong ngal ba
14a6(skyes rabs): med pa gzhon pa bde ba yin// sbyin pa bde ba mang po 'grub cing grogs pa bzang po mchog yin no// 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa 'am bka' lung gnyen po'i yon tan na ma// sum cu rtsa gsum pho brang gnas sam gzugs bzang yon tan nam/
14b1(skyes rabs): gang zhig bdong pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas thob par 'gyur// de ltar ngos don gtan la phab na smyon pa su mi byed// sbyin pa nor gyi snying po lon par gsungs// sbyin pa dbang phyug rnams kyi rgyu zhes gsungs// sbyin pa dpal ldan skye bo mchog go/
14b2(skyes rabs): tshul// shes rab chung ngus rdul tsam sbyin mi nus// de nas 'khor de dag gis rgyal po de'i tshig gzung du rung ba la rab tu gus shing dga' bar byas nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan sgrub pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur to// ngo b+has na de ltar
14b3(skyes rabs): sems rab tu dang ba las byung ba dang // snod khyad par can la byin pa ni rnam par smin pa che ba'i phyir chung zhes bya ba gang yang med do// de bas na sems rab tu dang bas bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'phags dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin na/ bdag
14b4(skyes rabs): kyang de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am// de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ba ring po mi thog su snyam du bsams te dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// zan dron chang gcig byin pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te gsum pa'o// skyes pa'i rabs
14b5(skyes rabs): kyi rgyung // // bam po gnyis pa/ skyes pa dam pa rnams ni bdag rlag par 'gyur ba la yang mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byed na bde bar 'dug po lta su zhig sbyin pa mi byed// de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon
14b6(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe skal pa khyad par can dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang spro ba phun sum tshogs pas nor phun sum tshogs dang ni ldan// spyod tshul mi mthun pa med pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis
15a1(skyes rabs): bskur sti bya ba'i gnasu ni gyur/ cho rigs btsun pa dang ni ldan// rig pa dang sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par rnam pa du ma khong du chud pas glo bu du dri ma med par na gyur/ yon tan che bas rgyal pos ni bkur sti byas// rab tu phye ba'i dang
15a2(skyes rabs): tshul can yin pas 'byor pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang thun mong du spyod pa'i tshong dpon zhig tu gyur to zhes grag go/ phongs pa rnams ni dgar gyur pas// phan tshun kun tu bsgrags pa ni// de'i ming sbyin la dpa' ba zhes// phyogs
15a3(skyes rabs): bcu kun tu khyab par gyur// sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i rnam rtog pa// yid la sems pa phongs pa rnams la med// de yi sbyin pa'i mthu chen grags par gyur// phongs pa rnams ni yid ches spobs shing slong // da ni bdag gi bde phyir nor
15a4(skyes rabs): mi sbeng // 'gran pa dang ni chags pa'i zil non min// de ni phangs pa'i sdug bsngal bzod mi nus// de bas med ces smra ba sbas par gyur// de nas re zhig cig sems can chen po zan gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe khrus byas byug spos kyis byug pa
15a5(skyes rabs): dang // g.yos mkhan mkhas pas g.yos pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba'i sung ba dang ro dang 'dzem pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsreg pa//
15a6(skyes rabs): de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par 'phel bar 'dod pa zhig de'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'ongs so// 'ongs nas kyang sgo khang na sdod cing 'dug go// ngogs med mi g.yo brtan zhi bzhi pa yi// mig gis sa la gnya' shing gang du lta/
15b1(skyes rabs): rab tu zhi bar gyur cing de na sdod // de'i lag pad+ma'i mchog ni lhung bzod thogs// de nas bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa'i smyon pa phun sum tshogs pa do mi bzod pas de la bgegs bya ba'i phyir btsun pa de ngang bar sgo gnyis kyi bar du sem
15b2(skyes rabs): can dmyal ba nang na me chen po 'bar ba/ zab su mi 'greng du ma yod pa rab tu zab pa// mthong na rab tu 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra grags pa// skye bo mang po rnam par g.yo bos gang ba zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas byang chub
15b3(skyes rabs): sems dpas rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la gshegs pa mthong nas// chung ma la bdag nyid kyi 'phags pa la bsod snyoms phul cig ces smraso// de nas de'i ltar mnyan te// de bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas// bza' ba dang bca' ba
15b4(skyes rabs): bzang po khyer te song song ba las// sems can dmyal ba mthong ba dang / 'jigs skrag pa'i mig rig por gyur te// sgo drung nas slar log pa dang / 'di ci nyes zhes khyim thab kyis dris so// nges brtabs pas skad bgags nas// de la
15b5(skyes rabs): sgra yang de'u ma nus te smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa// e ma'o 'phags pa 'di bdag gi khyim nas bsod snyoms ma bzhes par slar bzhud na gA la rung snyam ste// des smras pa ma mnyam par rings rings ltar bza' ba
15b6(skyes rabs): bca' ba bzang po ngag nyid kyis khyer te mthu chen po de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir sgo khang gi drung du phyin pa dang // bar de sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu 'jigs pa de mthong bar gyur to// de nas 'di ci zhig yin snyam du rnam
16a1(skyes rabs): par rtog pa skyes pa dang / bdud sdig can khang pa'i ngos kyi rtsig pa'i nang nas byung ste// lha'i lus ya mtshan che ba mngon du bstan nas// bar snang la gnas te// phan par 'dod pa bzhin du gsal bar smras pa// kye khyim bdag sems can dmyal ba
16a2(skyes rabs): chen po 'di ni 'bod sgrogs chen po zhes bya ba yin no// phongs pas bsngags pa'i tshig gis bslus nas ni// sbyin la zhugs pas gang gi nor chung gsan// de dag le ni stong phrag du mar yang // 'di na gnas 'gyur 'byung bar rab tu dka'// nor ni 'khor gsum khyad
16a3(skyes rabs): par rgyu yin te// de med byas na su yis chos ma rlag/ nor chud gsan pas chos ni brlag 'gyur na// ci phyir sems can dmyal bar gnas mi 'gyur// sbyin pa'i phyir ni chos kyi rtsar gyur pa'i// nor ni khyod kyis chung gsan sdig byas pas// dmyal ba'i gshed po mi
16a4(skyes rabs): bzad 'bar ba'i lce// de phyir khyod ni za phyir 'dir 'ongs so// de bas blo ni sbyin las bzlog na legs// 'on tang phral du lhung bar khyod mi 'gyur// snying rje ngu zhing 'gre ldog byed pa yi// gtong ba 'di dang lhan cig khyod mi 'gro// sbyin pa tshul min mi byed len
16a5(skyes rabs): pa po'o// skye bo rnams ni lha yul 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas mtho ris lam sgrib btang nas ni// sbyin la brtson las ldog la gnas par bgyis// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa// 'di skad zer ba'i bdag nyid ngan pa 'di ni bdag sbyin pa
16a6(skyes rabs): pa byed pa la nges par bgegs byed pa yin no snyam nas// bdag gi snying stobs kyis khar bor te bstan par byas nas tshig 'jam po rgyun mi 'chad par de la 'di skad smras par nges so// bdag cag/ 'dra la phan par dgongs nas ni// khyod kyi 'phags pas
16b1(skyes rabs): lam ni rnam brtan pa// gzhan la phan 'dogs mkhas pa'i spyod pa can// lha rnams kyi ni de ltar bgyi ba'i rigs// nyes pa byung ba'i sngon nam 'og tu yang // zhi ba'i lam der 'chi ba'i rab tu rigs// nad la cho ga spyad pa nongs pa yi// tshabs cher gyur pa
16b2(skyes rabs): spyad kyis sman mi thogs// sbyin la zhugs pa bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di// spyad kyis glon par rab tu mi 'gyur dogs// khyod kyis phan pa bstan pa'ang mi nyan par// bdag gi sems ni sbyin las slar mi ldogo/ sbyin pa sdig par 'gyur zhes gang
16b3(skyes rabs): smras shing // nor yang chos kyi rgyu yin zhes bgyi ba// sbyin pa mi gtogs chos lam gzhan yod pa 'am// de ni gter sbas chos kyi rgyur 'gyur ba laM// 'on te rkun pos ngo mthon phrogs gyur tam// 'dod pas khyer te mi snang gyur pa 'am// me yI
16b4(skyes rabs): tshig na bsod nams thob 'gyur bar// mi yi blos ni rtogs par mi nus// nor sbyin pa ni dmyal bar 'gro ba dang // len pa lha yul 'gro zhes bya ba yang // khyod kyis sbyin las ldog par byas mod kyi// ngo yi bdag ni sbyin la brtson par 'gyur
16b5(skyes rabs): khyod kyi tshig de gzhan du ma gyur cig/ bdag la slong ba de dag mtho ris dang // 'jig rten pan phyir bdag ni sbyin pa byed// bdag gi bde ba bsgrub phyir 'di mi byed// de nas yang bdud pham par 'dod pa bzhin brtan par bya ba'i lag pa brkyang ste/ byang
16b6(skyes rabs): chub sems dpa' la smras pa// 'di ni nga yis phan pa 'am rdzun smras pa// legs par rtogs la gang du dga' bar song // bde dang ldan na gus bcas dran par bgyi// yang na 'gyod bzhin da ni dran par byos// byang chub sems dpas grogs
17a1(skyes rabs): po khyod bzod par mdzod cig ces smras nas// phongs pa rnams kyis bdag bag phab spobs te blangs pa la// sbyin pa'i dus su brnyas te mi byin dga' ba las// mi bzang me lho 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal ba der// mo lto 'bar bas
17a2(skyes rabs): phag nas spyi'u tshugs lhung yang rung // de skad smras nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi skal pa'i mthu la brten nas// sbyin pa la nyes dmigs med par yang shes te// bu sman dang g.yog 'khor 'gror mi ster ba rnams bor nas// blo la tsham chom med
17a3(skyes rabs): cing sbyin pa byed par 'dod pa skyes te dmyal ba'i nang nas phar song ngo // de nas de yi bsod nams mthu yis der// 'dam rdzob med par 'dam las skyes pa byung // ze'u 'bru dkar po so yi phreng ba dag/ bdud la 'phya ba bzhin du dgo da par gyur// de nas
17a4(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bsod nams khyad par can las byung ba'i pad+ma'i stegs las song ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyi drung du phyin nas sems rab tu dang zhing dga' bas de la bsod snyoms phul lo// de'i yid ni rab tu dang bya'i phyir// de nas
17a5(skyes rabs): dge slong de ni mkha' lnga ldings// de ni de la char 'bebs 'bar bar byed// glog dang bcas pa'i sprin ni dpal bzhin mdzes// bdud ni yid la bsams pa ma grub nas// yi chad nas ni mdangs kyang nyams par gyur// de la phyogasau te l-I yang ma nus
17a6(skyes rabs): dmyal dang bcas par de nas mi snang gyur// 'di ci'i phyir bshad ce na// de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag brlag par 'gyur ba la yang mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byed na bde bar 'dug pa lta bu zhig sbyin pa mi byed// de bas na snying stobs can ni bsdigs
17b1(skyes rabs): kyang mi rig pa byed du gzhug mi nuso zhes kyang bshad par bya'o// tshong dpon gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa rnams ni 'byor pa zad dogs nas sbyin pa byed pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de yang 'di skad thos te// byang chub sems
17b2(skyes rabs): dpa' gtong ba dang tshul khrims dang tshe rigs dang dul ba dang / mang du thos pa dang shes pa dang / dregs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ni ldan// 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pas ni nor sbyin pa po dang 'dra// glo bur ba thams cad la sbyin po byed pas sbyin pa'i
17b3(skyes rabs): sbyor ba ni rgyun mi 'chad// 'jig rten la phan pa'i don byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa po'i gtso bo tshong dpon zhig tu gyur ces grag go// ser sna la sogs pa'i nyes pas zil gyis ma non pa'i phyir mong yang zil gyis ma non pa zhes btags so// 'dod pa'i don
17b4(skyes rabs): 'byor the chom med gyur pa// dga' ba skye ba'i khyad par rgyur gyur pa// phongs pa rnams kyis de ni mthong ba bzhin// des kyang phongs pa rnams ni/ mthong na dga'// slong bas bslang zhes nges par smras pa la// de ni med ces smra yang mi nus so//
17b5(skyes rabs): de yi sems ni nor la chags pa'i skabaso// snying rje chen pos rab tu med pa byas// phongs pa rnams kyis de yi khyim nas ni// nor gyi snying po chung yang rab tu dga'// rgyu rkyen med par myur du chud za ba'i// nor ni shin tu mi bzang nor min rig/
17b6(skyes rabs): 'jig rten dag na nor ni phal cher yang // chags pa'i gzhi dang ngan 'gro'i grogasu 'gyur// de yi nor ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi/ 'byor pa thob pas don dang mthun par 'a gyur// de nas sems can chen po des kun tu slong ba rnams ji ltar 'dod
18a1(skyes rabs): pa bzhin du nyon ma mongs par gus pa khyad par can gyis brgyan cing / nor sbyin pa rlabs po chos rab tu tshim par byas pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sbyin ba rlabs po tshe thos nas yid la ya mtshan che bar gyur
18a2(skyes rabs): te/ 'di sbyin pa la brtan nyams sad pa dang / 'di nor zad du dogs pas ser sna byed du gzhug pa'i phyir nyin re zhing rim gyis nor dang 'bru dang rin po che dang yo byad kyi rnam pa de dang de dag mi snang bar byas so// sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa la mos pas chu
18a3(skyes rabs): yi thigs pa nyi mas phog pa bzhin/ de yi nor ni ji tsam zad gyur pa// de tsam du ni sbyin pa chen po yi// me yis tshig pa bzhin du khyim nas 'byin// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sems dpa' chen po de'i nor gyi mchog zad par gyur kyang sbyin pa
18a4(skyes rabs): la rab tu gzhol bar gyur par rig nas blo la shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de'i nor gces pa thams cad nub gcig tu mi snang bar byas nas thag pa gcig dang zor ba gcig cig bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam langs nas duso bzhin
18a5(skyes rabs): du langs te bltas na// bdag gi khyim nor dang 'bru dang yo byad dang mi rnams ni me sgra ca co ci yang med pa sdug bsngal ltar 'dug cing srin pos phung bar byas pa bzhin du lta na// nyams mi dga' bar gyur pa mthong nas// 'di ci nyes snyam du rtog pa skyes te kun
18a6(skyes rabs): tu byul ba dang / thag pa bsdogs pa gcig dang zor ba gcig cig de na 'dug pa mthong nas nges bsams pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis slong ba'i tshig smra ba ma phod de bdag gi zho shas 'tsho bas bdag gi khyim du spobs pa de lta bu bstan na ni bdag gi nor
18b1(skyes rabs): legs par spyad pa nyid du gyur to// de ste bdag skal pa chung ba'i skyon gyis mthong bar gyur pa ma bzod nas sus kyang ma spyad par med par gyur na ni ma rungs par gyur to snyam mo// nor rnams ngoni mi rtag par// bdag gis snga nas shes zin na// phongs
18b2(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyis// bdag gi yid ni 'dir bsregaso// sbyin dang bkur stis yun ring bde bas pa// bdag gi khyim ni nor dang bral mthong na// mtsho skam drung du skom pa lhags pa bzhin// bdag gis phongs pa de dag ji ltar 'gyur//
18b3(skyes rabs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi brtan pa la brtan pas zhum pa dang sro sha bar ma gyur te// de'i gnas skabs na'ang slong ba la ma goms pas po shes kyang gzhan la slong ma phod pa dang / bslang ba ni de ltar dka' ba lta zhig snyam nas de slong ba rnam
18b4(skyes rabs): la de bas kyang rjesu brtse bar gyur to// de nas bdag nyid chen po de slong ba rnams la 'ong ba legs so zhes bya ba tsam la bltos nas// bdag nyid kyis thag pa de dang zor ba blangs te nyin re zhing rtswa btsongs pa de'i rin rnyed pa tsam gyis skye bo phongs pa rnams
18b5(skyes rabs): slong ba la mgu bar byed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de rab tu dbul bar gyur kyang 'di ltar zhum pa med cing sbyin pa la rab tu gzhol bar mthong nas ya mtshan che zhing gus par gyur te/ lha'i lus mngon sum du bstan nos par snang la gan
18b6(skyes rabs): te sbyin pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po la smras pa khyim bdag byams kyis 'gyod pa'i gnas skabs 'di lta bu/ sbyin pa drags pas khyod kyis myong ba 'di// rkun pos ma khyer chu dang mes ma tshig/ rgyal po rnams kyi nor yang
19a1(skyes rabs): ma phrogs so// de bas khyod la phan phyir nga sgra yis// sbyin la zhugs pa'i chags pa btang bar gyis// 'di ltar gyur kyang gal te ma byin na// sngon gyi 'byor pa bzang po thob par gyur// chung ngu gong kyang rtag tu spyad na ni// yun ring spyad na mi
19a2(skyes rabs): sman zad la ltos// bsags na grogs mkhar mthon por gyur la ltos// dar bar 'dod pas bsdams pa byas na legs// de nas byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la smras pa/ spyan stong mngon ba rab tu phongs gyur kyang //
19a3(skyes rabs): 'phags pas ma rabs chos bya rab tu dka'// gang zhig thob phyir ser sna'i sems 'byung ba// brgya byin nor de bdag la med kyang rung // slong ba'i sdug bsngal shi dang 'dra ba yi// gnyen po'i lam du 'gro bar 'dod pa la// de yis phongs la ya rabs
19a4(skyes rabs): gzi byin can// su zhig med ces zer ba'i ser bas brdeg/ slong bas gdungs nas ngo zum gnag gyur pa// phongs pa rnams ni mgu bar mi 'gyur ba'i// nor ram rin chen lha'i rgyal srid kyang // de lta bu dag bdag ni stsogs sam ci// gang zhig
19a5(skyes rabs): ser sna'i skyon ni 'phel 'gyur zhing // gtong ba'i sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// bdag lta bu yis de ni gtang ba'i rigs// yongs su bzung bar snyad btags phongs pa yin// glog ni 'gyu ba bzhin du mi brtano// kun dang thun mongs phongs pa du ma'i
19a6(skyes rabs): rgyu// bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sbyin yin na// ya rabs su zhig ser sna'i lam la brten// brgya byin khyod kyis bdag la gnyen pa brtan// phan pa smras pas bdag la brtse bar gyis// sbyin pas yid ni dga' ba goms par gyur// de bas lam
19b1(skyes rabs): min su zhig dga' bar 'gyur// khyod kyi thugs ni dga' bar gyur pa yi// lam du 'jug par bgyi ba'i mi rigaso// ngo bo nyid ni mi mthun phyogs kyi lam// bgrod dkar zhugs pa sla ba ma yin// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyim bdag 'byor pa phun sum tshogs
19b2(skyes rabs): shing // bang mdzod yongasu gang ba dang / zhing gi snams legs par byed cing // rlabs che la rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang // dbang phyug dbang du gyur pa la rim pa 'di 'jig rten na ngar bar 'gyur gyi/ gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur pa la ni mi rung ngo //
19b3(skyes rabs): ltos shig/ bdag gi blo yis lcogs shing ma g.yengs pa'am// grags pa'i rjes mthun rigs dang mthun pa 'am// las kyi yon tan gyis ni 'byor thob nas// nyi ma bzhin du 'gran zla zil mnan te// skye bo rnams ni zhar la grogs btsal nas//
19b4(skyes rabs): 'dza' bor bcas pa'i gnyen rnams mgu byas te// rgyal po las kyang bkur sti thob gyur nas// mngon par chags bzhin dpal gyis 'khyud gyur na// de nas sbyin pa 'am bde ba'i rim pa la// rab tu zhugs nA skye bos phyas gdags med// 'dab
19b5(skyes rabs): gshog ma rdzogs mkha' la 'phur 'dod bzhin// sbyin pa 'ba' zhig 'dod pas brlag par 'gyur// de bas sdom zhing mi g.yeng gnas byas la// sbyin pa thong la re zhig nor sogs shig/ 'byor pa med par gang zhig mi smyon pa// de la ma rabs 'gyur/
19b6(skyes rabs): pa ci zhig yod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// khyod de ltar ha cang dus ma che bar thong zhig/ gzhan gyi don pas gang zhig don cher 'dzin pa// des kyang 'byor pa khyad du bsad nas sbyin dgos so// gang dag chags pa spangs nas sbyin pas dgar
20a1(skyes rabs): gyur pa// 'byor pa chen po nges kyang dga' ba de mi myong // 'byor pa 'ba' zhig gris kyang mtho ros thob mi 'gyur// sbyin pa yis ni grags pa snyan pa thob par 'gyur// ser sna la sogs skyon yang zil gyis non
20a2(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// de bas 'byor pa de'i phyir smyon pa su mi byed// gang zhig skye shis nyen pa'i 'jig rten skyong 'dod pa// snying rje'i dbang gis bdag kyang rab tu gtong byed cing // gzhan sdug bsngal bas bdag gi bde ba mi myong ba// de la khyod kyi dpal ldan nor
20a3(skyes rabs): yang ci zhig bya// lha'i dbang po gzhan yang / nor rnams phun sum tshogs pa bzhin// tshe yi gnas po mi brtan te// de bas slong ba mthong nas ni// phun sum tshogs la mi blta'o// shing rta gcig gis sa la gang du ma drangs pa// de bzhin gzhan yang lam
20a4(skyes rabs): der brtul te 'dong // de ltar thog ma'i lam ni bde ba 'di bor nas// yang dag ma yin lam du 'jug par bdag mi dga'// gal te bdag ni phyis kyang nor dang ldan gyur na// slong ba rnams kyi sems ni nges par mgu bar bya// 'di ltar gyur kyang ci
20a5(skyes rabs): 'byor pa ni sbyin par bya// brgya byin bdag gi sbyin las ldog par ma gyur cig/ de skad smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas legaso legaso zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas te/ rab tu gus shing byams pa'i lta bas
20a6(skyes rabs): bltos nas smos pa/ skye bo rnams ni grags dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i las/ mi bzad ngan pa rnams kyis 'byor pa thob par 'dod// bdag gi bde la chags pas nyes dmigs mang mthong nas// shin tu g.yengs pa'i sems kyi rab tu 'jug/
20b1(skyes rabs): khyod kyi nor ni zad par gyur pa'ang ma bsams shing // bdag gi bde nyams nga yis bslus pa 'ang ma bsams par// gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la sems ni brtan gyur pas// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa rab tu che ba bstan// e ma'o rlabs chen khyad
20b2(skyes rabs): par 'phags pa gsal ba yis// snying gi ser sna'i mun pa rab tu gsal bar gyur// nor ni med par gyur kyang de la chags pa yis// rab tu sbyin las zhum pa'o skyon du yong ma gyur// gzhan sdug pa yi sdug la ngo mtshar mi che ste// snying rje'i dbang
20b3(skyes rabs): gi khyod ni 'jig rten phan par 'dong // gangs kyi ri bo rlung gis bskyod par mi nus bzhin// rab tu sbyin la bdag gi bskyod par ma nus so// glags pa kun tu bsgrags phyir yongs su brtags pa 'ongs/ khyod kyi nor 'di rnams ni bdag gis sbas par
20b4(skyes rabs): gyuraro// da ltar ma byas na nr-i nor bu bzang po yang // nor bu de ni grags dang rin cher mi ldom mo// ngo bas slong ba rnams la sbyin pa char bzhin phob// sprin chen gyis ni mtsho rnams bkang ba bzhin du byos// ngas ni rje su bzung bas nor yang zad mi
20b5(skyes rabs): gyur// bdag gos gtses pa 'di yang khyod kyis bzod par byos zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas nas// brgya byin gyis de'i nor gyi rnam pa de dag kyang slar byin te bzod par byas nas de nyid mi snang bar gyur to// de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams
20b6(skyes rabs): ni bdog pa zang du dogs pa 'am// 'byor pa la chags pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do// tshong dpon zil gyis ma non pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te lnga pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang / sbyin pa ci nus
21a1(skyes rabs): su byed pa yod na mir gyur pa dag su zhig sbyin pa mi byed/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ dgon pa'i gnas ldum bu dang rtswa dang shing ljon pa yid 'ong ba yod pa me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa// chu gtsang ma bai DUr+ya mthing ga 'dra ba 'bab pa'i
21a2(skyes rabs): mchos mtha' bskor ba// sa gzhi'i ne'u bsing sngon po 'jam pa dang ldan pa skye bo dka' thub can dag gnas gnas pa zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ri bong zhig tu gyur te gnas so zhes grag go/ de ni lus bzangs snyings stobs che ba dang / stobs
21a3(skyes rabs): kyang che zhing gzi mdangs che bas na// gcan gzan ngan pas klags ltar bag mi tshe// ri dgas rgyal po'i tshul gyis de na gnas// bdag gi pags pa a dzin gyon// bdag gi spu yis shun pags can// rtswa yi myu gus sems mgu zhing // thub
21a4(skyes rabs): pa bzhin du de na mdzes// de yi lus dang ngag yid las// byams pas yongs su dkar ba yis// ri rigs slob ma bder gnas shing // bdag nyid ngan pa spangs par gyur// ngo'i yon tan khyad par can gyis byams pa dang yul skyes pa
21a5(skyes rabs): sems rab tu chags pa'i grogs gsum zhig yod par gyur te/ sram dang / ce spyang dang / spre'u rnamaso// de dag kyang phan tshun mnyen du 'brel pa bzhin du gcig la gcig byams zhing chags par gyur// gcig la gcig spobs shing bkur
21a6(skyes rabs): sti byed pas rab tu mdza' bar gyur pa'i grogs po bzhin du dga' zhing de na gnas te// dud 'gro'i rang bzhin la ni mi phyogs// srog chags rnams la snying rje che ba dang / brkam pa med pa dang / rku ba mi dran pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i
21b1(skyes rabs): 'tsho ba la gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa la gsal bas dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / spyod pa brtan pa'i phyir lha rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur to// bde dang mthun zhing yon tan mi mthun tshul// mi yang yon tan phyogs la brten nas ni// rnam
21b2(skyes rabs): par mdzes na dud 'gro smos ci dgos// ri bong gzugs can mkhas de de rnams kyi// gzhan la snying rje tsho ba'i bla mar gyur// yon tan rjes 'gro rang bzhin phun sum tshogs// de rnams grags pa lha yul du yang grag/ de nas re zhig cig bdag
21b3(skyes rabs): nyid chen po des phyi dro'i dus su grogs de rnams chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags te rab tu gus pas bkur sti byas pa dang / zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi la dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogasu nye ba/ nyi ma dang thag ring bas rnam par dkar zhing mdzes
21b4(skyes rabs): pa dngul gyi me long lung med pa 'dru ba// ngos gcig cung zad sngo ba shar ba la bltas nas grogs rnams la smras pa/ dkyil 'khor cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ bzang po 'di ni dgos pa bzhin// dge ba rnams la gso sbyong gis// spro ba zla ba 'di
21b5(skyes rabs): ston to// de bas na nges par sang ni tshes bco lnga ste/ khyed cag gis kyang gso sbyong bsdams par bya ba brtsam zhing / rigs par rnyed pa'i kha zas kyis dus su lhags pa'i glo bur pa la mgron gyis la srog bzung bar bya ba'i rigs so//
21b6(skyes rabs): khyed rnams ltos shig/ 'du ba gang yong mtha' ni 'bral bar 'gyur// dar ba yod na ngan pa rlung ba'i mtha'// tshe yang glog bzhin 'gyur zhing mi brtan no// de phyir bag yod pa la brtan par gyis// de bas sbyin pa tshul khrims brgyan pa yin// /
22a1(skyes rabs): bsod nams ngag ni khyed kyis spel bar gyis// skye bo ngan 'gro'i nang na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten rnams la bsod nams rten gyi mchog/ skar ma rnams kyi dbul ni zil mnan nas/ gzi mdangs yon tan gyis ni zla ba mdzes//
22a2(skyes rabs): 'od zer can rnams nyi mas zil mnan nas// mdzes par gang gyur do na bsod nams mthu/ sa yi dbang phyug rnams kyi bsod nams mthus// rgyal po rnams dang blon po dregs pa rnams// dregs pa kun spangs rta mchog tshul dag gis//
22a3(skyes rabs): dga' ba bzhin du bka' lung nyan par byed// so tshis bya ba'i tshul la 'bang gyur kyang // bsod nams mi ldan dpal min rje su 'brang // bsod nams che bas de ni bskrad pa bzhin/ de dang mi mthun drung du khros bzhin 'gro// sdug bsngal gzhir
22a4(skyes rabs): gyur gtam ngan brjod 'brang ba'i// sdig pa'i lam las de bas slar log la// de bas bsod nams spyad pas dpal ldan pa// bde ba rab tu 'byung sgrub la blo byos shig/ de dag gis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes nas nges rje su bsten pa mnyan
22a5(skyes rabs): tAM/ phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas bdag bdag gis gnas dong ngo // grogs de dag dong nas ring po ma ldon par bdag nyid chen po dus bsams pa/ mgron zhig 'ongs na'ang de dag gis/ ci yang rung bas mgron byur yod// bdag
22a6(skyes rabs): gis tso yang sbyin du med// bdag gis so rtses bcad pa yi// rtswa yi myu gu kha bo 'di// mgron la sbyin du yong mi rung // mi nus pa ni yong ye smad// de bas ci yang mi nus pa// bdag ni gson yang ci la phan// bdag ni mgron zhig 'ong gyur
22b1(skyes rabs): na// dga' gang mya ngan skye bar 'gyur snyam mo// da 'gron byar mi rung ba snying po med pa'i lus 'di gar bor na 'ga' zhig la phan thogs par 'gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po de dran pa rnyed pa// e ma'o bdag la yod cing rnyed sgyu
22b2(skyes rabs): pa bdag gi lus 'di nyid mgron rnams la sbyin du rung ba'i nor kha na ma tho ba med pa bdag la yod bzhin du ci'i phyir mya ngan bya/ bdag gi mgron byar rung ba 'di rnyed kyis// snying khyod da ni mi dgar ma byed cig/ bdag gis nga ni 'gron rnams spob
22b3(skyes rabs): pa la// rdzogs par yod pa'i lus 'dis bkur sti bya'o snyam du nges par bsams nas/ sems dpa' chen po de rnyed pa mchog rnyed pa bzhin du yid rab tu dga' bar gyur cing de na 'dug go/ de yi snying la rnam rtog pa/ khyad par can ni skyes gyur pas
22b4(skyes rabs): mthu dang rab tu dang ba dag/ lha rnams la ni bstan par gyur// de nas sa gzhi ri dang bcas pa g.yos pa ni// rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i gos gyon dga' ba bzhin// mkha' las lha yi DA sgra rgyas par grags/ phyogs kyang rab tu ngang ba'i gos gyon gsal
22b5(skyes rabs): sprin kyang klog dang ldan pa'i 'brug gi sgra// rgyun chags dal bus sgrog cing dgod pa bzhin// phan tshun bangos pas rdul rnams lhags pa yi// me tog rgyun chags rnams kyis de la 'thor// sor bu dal bus ldang ba'i rlung gis kyang //
22b6(skyes rabs): nga ljon sna tshogs me tog dri zhim rdul// rab tu dkrigs pa srab mo'o gos bkram zhing // rab tu dga' bas de la mchod deng 'dra// de'i rnam par rto rig pa rmang du byung ba de la rab tu dga' zhing yid la ngo mtshar skyes pa'i lha rnams
23a1(skyes rabs): kyis kun tu bsgrags pa// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis thos nas yid la ya mtshan dang ngo mtshar che bar gyur te// de'i bsam pa nyams sad pa'i phyir// phyi de nyin nyi ma phyed kyi dus na nyi zer gyi 'od ni rab tu gsal bar
23a2(skyes rabs): gyur// phyogs rnams kyang smag rgyu 'khrigs pa'i gos ni gyon// nyi ma tsha ba'i 'od kyis ni mgo g.yogs// mig gis bltar yang mi bzod par gyur pa'i tshe na// nags tshal rnams kyi grob ma ni 'dus par gyur// tsha ba'i sbrang bu rnams
23a3(skyes rabs): kyi sgra ni tshor grag/ bya rnams lding zhing rgyu ba'i rgyun ni chang // 'gron po rnams ni tsha bas gdungs shing ngal bar gyur pa na lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas lam+bu nor ba 'dra bar byas te// bkres pa dang /
23a4(skyes rabs): skom pa dang ngal bsau gdungs shing ma grin pa 'gags pa bzhin du/ de dge dang nye ba zhig tu smra phyung ste ngu zhing bos la// grogs dang bral bas gcig pur gyur// nags chu la stug pa'i nang du 'khyams// bkrus shing ngal bas
23a5(skyes rabs): bdag lus dub// dge ba rnams kyis bskyab pa'i rigs// bdag ni lam dang lam min sems ma shes// gcig pu phyogs bslang gar 'gro gtol kyang med// dgon pa 'di na tsha zhing skom pas gdungs// ma 'jigs sgra yi su zhig/
23a6(skyes rabs): bdag tshim byed// de nas sems can chen po de dag de'i sgra snying rje rje skad zer ba des snying 'dar bar gyur nas rings rings ltar mgyogasu dong ste phyogs der phyin pa dang / mgron po lam nor te nyam theg pa de mthong nas// nye bar lhag
23b1(skyes rabs): te gus pa dang bcas par dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/ bdag ni dgon par 'khyams snyam du// khyod kyis brtags pa de thong zhig/ bdag cag slob ma'i 'khor bzhin du/ bdag cag gang phyir nye bar gzong // de bas de ring bdag cag gis// bkur sti bya
23b2(skyes rabs): bas yongs bzung zhing // zhi ba rje su bzung nas su// sang ni ji ltar 'dod par song // de nas de cang mi zer bas 'gron du 'os pa khas blangs pa sram gyis rig nas dga' bas rtab rtab por gyur cing mgyogs par song ste/ nya mo bdun khyer te 'ongs nas
23b3(skyes rabs): de la smras pa// nya pa rnams kyis brjed nas bor ba'am// sngangs te brgal bas thang la 'gres pa dag/ mi dga' gnyid kyis log bzhin nya bdun po// bdag gis rnyed pa 'di dag zo la 'dug/ de nas ce spyang yang ci rnyed pa'i zas dag khyer te 'ongs nas//
23b4(skyes rabs): de la phyag byas te gus par smras pa/ sbyin kor gcig dang zho ni rdze'u gang zhig/ la la zhig gis bor ba rnyed pa 'di// bdag la phan pa'i phyir ni de rnams la// yon tan gnas khyod nags tshal 'dir bzhugs shig ces smras nas yid dga' bzhin du de la
23b5(skyes rabs): byin no// de nas spre'us shing tog a 'bra'i 'bras bu rab tu smin pa 'jam po ldong ros kyi phye mas kha dog bsgyur ba 'dra ba rtse sar ba/ rtsa ba dmar ba'i snye ma dag cig khyer te 'ongs nas thal mo sbyar te// de la smras pa/ a 'bra smin cing yid du 'ong ba'i
23b6(skyes rabs): chu/ grib ma bsil ba dam pa rnams dang 'grogs// bdag la mchis kyis tshangs pa rig pa'i mchog/ 'di dag bsnoms la khyod ni 'dir bzhugs shig/ de nas ri bong gi zhes byas nA de'i drung du 'ongs te/ gus par lta zhing bdag gis lus kyis
24a1(skyes rabs): mgron byed pa ni// nags kyi ri bong la ni ci yang med// mut+ka dang ni til dang 'bras kyang med// bdag gis lus ni me la bsregs pa 'di// bsnoms la de ring dka' thub nags na bzhugs// gang gi don sgrub nor ni ci yod pa// phongs pa
24a2(skyes rabs): 'ongs na de ni de la dbul// bdag la lus las lhag pa'i nor yang med// de bas bdag gi nor dbyig 'di khyer cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu gzhan dag gi/ srog kyang gcod par mi byed na// de ltar rab tu byams bstan pa// khyod lha
24a3(skyes rabs): bu la smos ci dgos// ri bong gis smras pa/ bram ze'i chos la 'di lta bu'i snying rje nye bar gnas pa ni rigs kyi// de bas na bdag la phan pa'i thabs 'ga' zhig gud nas btsal te 'ong gi bar du bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du khyed re zhig 'di
24a4(skyes rabs): na bzhugs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas mngag ma'i phung po gser bco ma'i kha dog 'dra ba cung zad 'bar ba me stag rnam par 'phro ba du ba med pa zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas ri bong gi phyogs kun tu
24a5(skyes rabs): bltas pa dang me'i phung po de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yi dga' nas brgya byin la smras pa/ bdag la phan pa'i thabs 'di bdag gi rnyed de de bas na bdag gi lces longs spyod du byas pas phan gdags pa'i bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas par
24a6(skyes rabs): bdag la 'bad pa'i rigaso// bram ze chen po gzigasu gsol// sbyin par bya dang sbyin 'dod gzhol sems dang // khyod lta bu yi 'gron dang ldan gyur pa/ 'di lta bu ni rnyed par rab tu dka'/ khyod la brten nas bdag ni don yod gyur ces mgron
24b1(skyes rabs): la dga' ba'i phyir gus shing rim gro bskyed de/ de la de skad smras te/ de nas de ni me 'bar de'i nang du// nor 'dod pa dag gter ni mthong ba bzhin// rab tu dga' bas me yi nang du zhugs// pad+ma rgyas pa'i chu nang dang pa bzhin// lha rnams kyi bdag
24b2(skyes rabs): pos de mthong nas yid la ngo mtshar skyes te// bdag nyid kyi lus su gnas nas lha'i me tog char bzhin 'bab pa dang bcas pa'i tshig rnar snyan cing / yid du 'ong bas mngon par bstod de// bdag nyid kyi leg pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dpal
24b3(skyes rabs): phun sum tshogs pa/ sngor gdub kyi rgyun bzang pos brgyan pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer te bstan to// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris na gnas pa'i lha khyed rnams ltos shig/ skyes bu chen po 'di'i lus
24b4(skyes rabs): rab tu ya mtshan che ba 'di la rje su yi rang ba gyis shig/ mgron la byams pas di ring chags meng pa// e ma'o 'di yis ji ltar lus btang ba// sems can mi brtan rnams kyi dman ma yang // de ltar the tshom med par gtong mi nus//
24b5(skyes rabs): 'di lha'i rigs dang de dang 'gal ba yi// gtong ba rgya chen sems kyang gsal ba 'di// lha mi bsod nams mi byed pa rnams la// dpe bstan bzhin du 'di ni rnam par gsal// e ma'o yon tan goms byas pa// 'di yi blo la bsgos pa dang /
24b6(skyes rabs): e ma'o dam pa'i spyod gzhol ba// spyod pa rgya chen 'di yis bstan// de nas brgya byin gyis de'i las khyad par can bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par bsams nas khang bzangs mchog rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs
25a1(skyes rabs): kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ri bong gi gzugs brnyan gyis brgyan te bzhag go// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba la// deng sang du yang ri bong gzugs// me long dkyil gyis gzugs brnyan bzhin// rab tu mngon
25a2(skyes rabs): par mdzes par snang // de dag phyin chad 'jig rten pas// ku mu nga ni kha 'byed pa// mtshan mo'i mtshan ma zla ba la// ri bong mtshan ma can zhes bsgrags// de bas na de ltar sems can chen po dud 'gror gyur pa rnams kyang ci nus par sbyin par byin pa mthong na
25a3(skyes rabs): mir gyur pa su zhig sbyin pa mi byangad// de bzhin du dudadu 'gror gyur pa yon tan la dga' na// dam pa rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa'i phyir yon tan la gus par bya'o zhes kyang bshad par bya'o// ri bong gi skyes pa'i rabs te drug pa'o// /
25a4(skyes rabs): dka' thub kyi nags tshol na gnas pa rnams la yang gtong ba dang dpa' ba gnyis brgyan du 'gyur na gnas gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de yang 'od skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten la phan
25a5(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir 'khor ba na gnas pa'i tshe/ spyod pa dang yon tan rnam par dag pas mngon par mtshon pas sa'i steng na rgyan du gyur pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs pa na mkha' la shar ba bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grago/
25a6(skyes rabs): de rim pa bzhin du thos pa dang dran pa las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin skyes pa'i las la sogs pa bya ba rnams ni byas/ rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa ni bslabs/ mkhas pa'i grags pas ni mi'i 'jig rten ma lus par khyab par byas/ sbyin pa po
25b1(skyes rabs): yon tan la dga' ba rnams kyis gsol ba btab ste phul ba rnams blangs pas 'byor pa'i phyir nor rab tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to// gnyen dang mdza' bshes rten dang phongs rnams dang / 'gron dang bla ma bkur sti bya ba rnams// 'byor
25b2(skyes rabs): pa de ni rab tu tshim byas pas// yul du sprin gyis char chen phab pa bzhin// mkhas pa'i phyir ni de yi grags pa ste// gtong ba dang ni dpa' bas lhag gyur pa// ston ka'i zla ba rnam par dag pa dang // yongs su rdzogs pas lhag par gos
25b3(skyes rabs): ba bzhin// de nas bdag nyid chen po de khyim na gnas pa bya ba ngan pas 'brel pa'i nyes pas rlag pa/ bag med pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ nor bsgrub cing bsrung ba'i zhar gyis rnam par dkrugs pa/ nye bar zhi ba dang 'gal ba/ sdug bsngal
25b4(skyes rabs): mang po'i mda'i 'ben du gyur pa/ so chos kyi las sgrub pa mtha' yas pas dub par gyur pa/ cho ga mi shes pa dang / bde ba myong ba chung bar ri ge nas/ rab tu byung ba ni de'i nyes pa med cing bde la/ chos sgrub pa dang rjesu mthun pas/ thar pa'i
25b5(skyes rabs): chos brtsam pa'i gnas su gyur par mthong bas/ nyon mongs par rnyed pa'i nor phun sum chog pa 'jig rten gyis bkur sti byas pa yid bde ba dag kyang rtsa bzhin spangs nas rab tu byung ba dka' thub can gyis dul ba dang bsdams pa
25b6(skyes rabs): rab tu 'bad par gyur to/ sems dpa' chen po de rab tu byung bar gyur kyang grags pa che ba dang / sngon bshes pa rjes su dran pa dang / srid pa'i yon tan dang / rab tu zhi bas mtshan pa'i phyir legs pa 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams de'i yon tan
26a1(skyes rabs): mang pos yid mgu bas de bzhin du 'du zhing 'ong bar gyur to// de skye bo khyim pa'i 'du 'dzis rab tu dben pa'i bde ba med par byed pa/ 'khrug pa dang g.yeng ba dang bar chad du 'gyur ba de la mi dga' nas// rab tu dben pa la dga' ba'i
26a2(skyes rabs): phyir kA ra zhes bya ba'i gling lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa rgya mtsho'i rlabs rlung gis bskyod pas an+da rnyil gyi bcag 'phro ltar sngo ba mthor bas mtha' ma gtor ba// sa gzhi bye ma skye bos khebs pa/ shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs me tog dang
26a3(skyes rabs): 'bras bu dang 'dab mas brgyan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ chu gtsang ma btung du rung ba yod pa zhig tu gnas nas dka' thub kyi gnas dpal dang ldan par byas// lus bzang nga ni dka' thub kyis// ring par gyur cing de na mdzes// mkha' la
26a4(skyes rabs): zla ba mdzes pa bzhin// gzi mngangs che ba 'ang mkha' la snang / spyod dang dbang po rab tu zhi zhing dal// brtul zhugs bsdams la nges byas nags tshal gnas// blo yi mthu chung rnams kyis thub pa zhes// bya dang ri dgas rnams kyang de la 'khor
26a5(skyes rabs): de nas bdag nyid chen po de dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas kyang sbyin pa la rab tu goms pas glo bur ba rnams dus su 'ongs nas/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu ci rnyed pa dang / chu gtsang ma dang / 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig shis pa
26a6(skyes rabs): brjod pa yid 'ong ba skye bo dka' thub can la 'os pa rnams kyis mchod par byed// glo bur du lhags pa rnams la 'gron du byas pa'i lhag ma nags tshal nas byung bas 'tsho ba'i phyir za zhing gnas so// de'i dka' thub mchog tu gyur pa'i
26b1(skyes rabs): grags pa 'phros pas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sems mgu bar gyur nas/ sems dpa' chen po de brtan nam mi brtan nyams sad pa'i phyir dgon pa'i gnas de na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dka' thub can rnams kyi bzar rung ba thams cad mthar gyis mi snang bar
26b2(skyes rabs): byas// byang chub sems dpa' yang yid bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang / chog shes pa la goms pa dang / zas la zhen pa med pa dang / lus la ma chags pa'i phyir de dag mi snang bar gyur pa'i rgyu yid la mi byed do// de shing gi lo ma gzhon nu dag bcos te
26b3(skyes rabs): des zas kyi dgos pa byas te/ zhen pa med cing zas khyad par can mi 'tshol bar blo bde bar byas te de bzhin du gnas so// chog shes nges pa'i bdag nyid can// 'tsho ba gang na'ang btsal med dag// rtswa dang lo ma chu yi gnas// gang na'ang med pa ma yin no// /
26b4(skyes rabs): de de ltar gnas pas lho'i dbang po brgya byin yid la ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas yon tan rab tu brtan par gyur pa de brtag par phyir nags tshal dgon pa de na shing ljon pa dang ldum bu thams cad dpyid kyi rlung gis btab pa bzhin du lo ma med par byas so// de
26b5(skyes rabs): nas byang chub sems dpas lo ma lhags shing rnyings pa cung zad rlon pa rnams btus te/ chu'i nang du bcos pa de dag za zhing mi dga' ba med par bsam gtan gyi bde bas yid tshim par byas te bdud rtsis ngoms pa bzhin du de na gnas so// mang du thos
26b6(skyes rabs): pa snyoms pa med/ 'byor pa rnams ni ser sna med/ nags tshal gnas rnams chog shes pa// yon tan rgyan gyi mchog yin no// de nas de'i cho ga shes pa brtan pa ngo mtshar du gyur pa des brgya byin ngo mtshar cher gyur nas// khros pa bzhin du sems
27a1(skyes rabs): dpa' chen po do dro la bab pa'i tshe me la sbyin sreg bya ba ni zin/ bzlas brjod ni rdzogs nas skye bo glo bur du 'ongs pa lta ba'i phyir phyogs su bltas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i lus su bsgyur nas glo bur du 'ongs pa
27a2(skyes rabs): 'dra bar mdun du 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' yid dga' nas// de'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'dir 'ongs pa legaso zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod de/ zas kyi dus la bab pa bstan nas mgron du bos so/ de cang mi smra bas khas blangs
27a3(skyes rabs): par bdag nyid chen po ngos shes nas// sbyin par 'dod pas mig bgrang bzhin ni 'dzum pas mdzes// yid 'ongs rnar snyan tshig gis dga' bar byas nas ni// dka' bas rnyed de btsos pa de dag thams cad kyang // de la byin nas bdag nyid dga' bas tshim
27a4(skyes rabs): par gyur// de de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi gnas su zhugs nas dga' zhing mgu ba de nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'das so// de nas brgya byin de'i phyi de nyin dang nyi ma gsum pa la yang de bzhin du brtul zhugs kyi tshe de'i mdun du 'ongs so// de yang yid rab
27a5(skyes rabs): tu dga' nas de bzhin du de la mchod pa byas so// sbyin por 'dod pa'i dge ba rnams// snying rje goms pa las skyes pas// sdug bsngal srog la bab na yang // dman zhing zhum par yong mi 'gyur// de nas brgya byin sems la ngo mtshar rab tu che bar
27a6(skyes rabs): gyur te/ 'di ni dka' thub che bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po'i dpal thob par bya ba yang 'dod pa rtsam gyis 'grub par rig nas dogs pa dang 'jigs pa skyes te/ bdag gi lus lha'i tshe lugs ngo mtshor che ba bzang po dang ldan pa mngon par
27b1(skyes rabs): bstan nas de la dka' thub kyi dgos pa dris so// gnyen dang mdza' bshes mchi mas baju ba dang / bde ba'i rgyur gyur yongs su bzung por te// bsam pa'i lcags kyu gang du dmigs nas ni// dku' thub sdug bsngal 'di la gnas par gyur// bde bar
27b2(skyes rabs): 'byor pa'i longs spyod yongs bor zhing // gnyen pa rnams kyang mya ngan bslangs nas su// rgyu rkyen chung ngu dag gis bstan pa rnams// bde dang 'gal ba'i dka' thub nags mi 'gro/ gang gi yon tan thos nas khyod lta bu'i// blo yang de ltar dbang du
27b3(skyes rabs): byas pa de/ bdag la gal te smra bar byar rung na// de bas bdag gi rtog pa bsal ba'i rigs// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gang gi phyir bdag 'di ltar 'bad pa grogs po khyod nyon cig/ yang dang yang du skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang // rga dang
27b4(skyes rabs): rgod dang na ba'i sdug bsngal dang // 'tsho bar 'gyur snyam sems pa'i 'jig rten rnams// bskyab pa'i phyir ni bdag ni de ltar gnas// de nas brgya byin gyis bsam pa// 'di ni bdag gi dpal 'dod pa ma yin no snyam nas dbugs phyin te/
27b5(skyes rabs): legs par smras pa des dga' bar gyur nas de'i tshig de rigaso zhes bya bas dga' ba bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' la mchog sbyin par byas so// 'dir khyod kyis dka' thub can dang mthun pa'i tshig legs par smras pa'i phyir 'od srungs
27b6(skyes rabs): khyod la mchog sbyin gyis gang 'dod pa de slongs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bde ba la ma chog pa dang / slong ba nyid sdug bsngal du rig cing cho ga shes pa la goms pas brgya byin la smras pa/ rjes su phan par 'gyur ba'i mchog
28a1(skyes rabs): gal te bdag la sbyin 'dod na// lha yi mchog la dam pa 'di// bdag gis da ni bslang bar bya'o// chung ma yid du 'ong dang bu dang dbang byed dang // mngon par 'dod pa'i nor rnams rgya chen thob gyur kyang // gang gis yid gapus nam yang
28a2(skyes rabs): chog mi shes pa yi// brkam pa'i rlung de bdag gi snying la med par byos// de nas de'i cho ga shes pa la gzhol ba legs par smras pas gsal bar byas pa des brgya byin yid rab tu ngad par gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya
