28a3(skyes rabs): bas de stod de yang mchog sbyin pas 'dzin par byas so// 'dir yang skye bo thub pa dang mthun pa'i tshig khyod kyis legs par smras pa la dga' bas skyes lon dang 'dra bar mchog gzhan yang sbyin par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog bslang
28a4(skyes rabs): ba la snyad btags te// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba thob dka' ba nyid de la bstan pa'i phyir yang de la bstan pa'i phyir yang de la chos bshad do// yon tan mchog gnas brgya byin khyod// nga lo gal te mchog spyan no// lha yi dbang po dam pa'i mchog/
28a5(skyes rabs): de sa gzhan yang 'di bla // sems can gang gis zil gnon dgra po bzhin// nor yang nyams shing mdog bzang grags pa dang // bde ba las kyang nyams par 'gyur ba yi// zhe sdang me nges bdag las ring du byas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis//
28a6(skyes rabs): de thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te legs so zhes bya bas de la gus pas bstod de// yang smras pa/ rab tu byung la grags pa de// rje su chags bzhin bstan par 'os// de bas legs par smras pa yi// mchog de bdag las bzhes su gsol//
28b1(skyes rabs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyir mchog nod pa la snyad btags nas sems can nyon mongs pa can dang 'grogs pa smad pa'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa rnams ni nams kyang mi thos shing // mthong bar mi 'gyur nam
28b2(skyes rabs): kyang mi smra zhing // de dag 'grogs pas skyo ba'i sdug bsngal yang // mi myong mchog de bdag ni khyod la slong // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phongs par gyur la khyad par du// dam pas phan gdags ma yin nam// phongs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir// byis pa
28b3(skyes rabs): tha ma yin par 'dod// byis pa 'di dag khyad par du// snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa na// ci phyir snying rje can yin yang // mthong ba tsam du'ang khyod mi 'dod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po mi nus mang // 'di la khyod ltos shig/ ji ltar byas kyang bris
28b4(skyes rabs): pa la// phan gdags paR+Ya ni mi nus te// bdag cag lta bu ji ltar na// de la phan par brtsan mi byed// de lta bas na 'di dag pha na gdags par bya ba'i snod ma yin par zung shig/ 'di dag tshul min pa yang tshul bzhin byed// gzhan yang 'di la rab tu sbyor bar
28b5(skyes rabs): 'dong // 'dul dang drang po'i rim par mi mthun pa// phan pa bstan kyang rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// mkhas pa'i nga rgyal gti mug mes bsregs shing // phan par smra ba la'ang khro bas rtsu ba 'gyur ba// 'dul la brtson 'grus chung bas gzu lums tson//
28b6(skyes rabs): de la ji ltar phan gdags rung ba smos// lha'i gtso bo de bas na// snying rje che bar gyur pa yang // byis pa rdzas su mi rung ba// mthong ba tsam du'ang mi 'dod do// brgya byin gyis de thos nas legs legaso zhes de la bstod / legs par smras pas sems
29a1(skyes rabs): rab tu dang bar gyur nas yang smras pa/ legs par smras pa rin chen la// rin ni ci yang yong ma yin// dga' bas me tog sbyim bkang bzhin// 'dir yang khyod la mchog sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu
29a2(skyes rabs): gnas skabs thams cad du bde ba bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la smras pa/ brtan pa mthong zhing brtan pa thos pa dang / de dag nyid dang brgya byin bdag 'grogs 'gyur// de dang smra zhing spobs pa'i bde ldan 'gyur// lha yi dam pa mchog de bdag
29a3(skyes rabs): ya stsol// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni brtan pa la rab tu dga' ba 'dran de smros shig/ brtan pa khyod la ci zhig bya// 'od srungs de yi rgyu smros shig/ brtan pa mthong bar 'dod pa yi// gang phyir mi brtan bzhin du gyur// de nas byang chub
29a4(skyes rabs): sems dbus ngo lo skyes bu dam pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ bdag gang gi phyir brtan pa 'ba' zhig mthong bar 'dod pa de grogs po nyon cig/ yon tan lam du bdag nyid 'gro bar byed// gzhan yang lam de nyid du 'dzud par byed
29a5(skyes rabs): rtsub pa'i tshig kyang mi bzod skyed mi 'gyur// de yi tshig ni phan dang ldan pa yin// gAyo rgyu med pa'i 'dul las rtag tu brgyan// de ltar phan pa dag kyang bstan par nus// de bas bdag blo yon tan dga' ba la// yon tan dga' phyir rob
29a6(skyes rabs): tu gzhol bar gyur// de nas de la brgya byin gyis legaso 'di ni rigaso zhes bstod de se mas rab tu dang bar gyur nas yang mchog sbyin par byas// cho ga shes pa la goms gyur pas// khyod kyis kun tu bzlog gyur kyang // bdag la
29b1(skyes rabs): phan gdags blo yis su// mchog ni blang bar bya ba'i rigs// gus la phan pa'i bsam pa dang // mthu yang ci yod thams cad kyis// mchog ni sbyin par byas pa las// ma blangs pa ni sdug bsngal che// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rab tu phan
29b2(skyes rabs): gdags par 'dod pa rtogs nas// de las dga' ba dang ngan pa 'dod pas sbyin pa la rab tu dga' bas de la bstan pa phyir smras pa// khyod kyis kho bas zad pa'i nyes pa sbyangs// yid kyang sbyin par dga'o dang mi thun gyur cing // slong ba rnam
29b3(skyes rabs): kyang tshul khrims rnam dag brgyan// 'di dag bdag la yod 'gyur mchog slong ngo // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'di yang khyod ni logs par smra ba rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur to// gzhan yang khyod kyis gang bslangs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin
29b4(skyes rabs): dudu 'gyur ro// legs par smras pa 'di la yang // khyod la mchog ni sbyin par bya// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lha rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyod// bdag la phan 'dogs rgyur gyur mchog sbyin na// gsal ba bdag drung slan chang mi
29b5(skyes rabs): byo na pa'i// mchog 'di lha min 'joms pa khyod la slong // de nas brgya byin ngo mtshor du gyur nas mi bzod pa bzhin du slar de la smras pa/ khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / bzlas brjod brtul zhugs mchod sbyin dka' thub spyad pa yi// skye bo 'di dag kho
29b6(skyes rabs): byabyi mchog sbyin 'dod phyir 'di ltar 'ongs pa la// khyod ni de ltar mthong bar mi 'dod ci'i phyir// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di la bdag gis khyod mnyes par bgyi yis lha'i rgyal po khyod ma bkyon cig/ 'di ni mi srun pa'i tshul yang ma lags/
30a1(skyes rabs): ma gus par bgyis pa yang ma lags// khyod dang phrad par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na// lha'i gzugs mchog rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang // gzi byin gsal zhing mdangs dang ldan pa mthong gyur na// khyod ni rab tu
30a2(skyes rabs): dang zhing zhi bar gyur pa yang // bdag gi dka' thub nyams par 'gyur du dogs lags modo// de nas brgya byin gyis de la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang por gyur to// de nas nam langes pa dang lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba
30a3(skyes rabs): brgya byin gyis sbyar ba rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma brgya byin gyis spyan drangs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu bshos 'drim par tshos shing bsdogs pa du ma tsam lhags par byang chub sems dpas mthong bar gyur to// bza'
30a4(skyes rabs): ba dang ni btung po sbyar ba de dag gis// drang srong chen po de dag mchod pa byas pa dang // thub pa de ni dga' ba chen po thob par gyur// skye bo dka' thub can dang mthun pa'i tshul dag dang // bsam gtan tshad med sdom dang zhi ba'i tshul gyis gnas
30a5(skyes rabs): de bas na de ltar dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa la yang gtong phod pa dang dpa' ba brgyan du 'gyur na khyim na gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na mi rnams kyis gtong phod pas bdag brgyan par bya'o zhes sbyin
30a6(skyes rabs): bdag gzengs bstod pa'i phyir de ltar bcom ldan 'das des sku tshe snga ma la yang legs par gsungs pa khyad par can rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin nas smon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na lnga smos kyang ci dgoso zhes de bzhin gshegs
30b1(skyes rabs): pa'i che ba nyid bstan pa yang sbyar bar bya'o// a ka tA'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun pa'o// / skyes pa'o'i rabs kyi rgyud bam pa gsum pa/ snong rje chen pa gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams ni bdag gi bde ba la mo lta ste/ ngo yang
30b2(skyes rabs): 'di skad thos so// byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi che ba nyid kyis snying rje dang ldan zhing // 'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa dang
30b3(skyes rabs): 'thun pa'i yon tan khyad par can mngon par 'phel ba/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i yid gyur pa byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to zhes grago/ skye dgu rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal gang // rgyal po de yang de dag de bzhin
30b4(skyes rabs): gyur// de bas de bzhin skye dgu bsrung la mkhas// mtshon cha dang ni gtsug lags rnams la goms// mi yi dbang po'i bkra' khrims spyi bos mno sa// de yi mtshon cha rgyan dring 'dra bar gyur// 'jig rten phan 'byung bstan ngag tshul rnams kyi
30b5(skyes rabs): gtsug lag dag kyang rnam par gsol bar snang // tshar bcad pa dang phan gdags bya ba la// chos dang 'gal ba de ni yong mi byed// tshul la mkhas shing phan par sems pa'i phyir// skye dgu rnams la rtogs mkhas pha dang 'dra/ de de ltar
30b6(skyes rabs): chos kyis skye dgu sbyong ba na/ bden pa dang / gting ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la sogs pa gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir khyad par can du gyur la rlabs che ba'i rim pas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags shing mngon par dang ba
31a1(skyes rabs): na tug nan tu bya gan tu nan ma ja ldan ma ba na nanam na drun/ dus sus du smos pa na / du sun gad
31a2(skyes rabs): cad med pa dang / rtag tu brus tshogs yong ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa mchog dang ldan pas myi rnams rab tu dag mthu zhing der byam nas// de dag yul den gnas ma rnams kyis pa so 'grog 'dod par gyur to// de
31a3(skyes rabs): rab tu bsgoms nas ni// rang gi las la 'jug byas kyang // den gnas pa rnams kyi mang me// 'phrog par bya bar mi nus so// rgyal po nga yi mthu khyung par tshabs na// bdag gi yin pa blon gar bzhag pa// de nyid de oM bsrung ba mchog
31a4(skyes rabs): yin pas// de dag gis ni mngangs paphyog nus mo gyur// de ltar rab tu 'bad kyang yul den gnas pa// nga zhig mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma nus pa de'i tshe// de dag gcig la gcig brgyus nus grogs po dag 'di co zhig yin snyam du sems
31a5(skyes rabs): par gyur to// bdag cag na sbru la gnong ba nus pa yi// rig sngags dga' thub dngos grug byung ba yang // de dag la ni yod pa ma yin na// 'on kyang de ring bdag cag thams cad kyi// maung ni don dang mthun par ma gyur to// de nas gnod sbyi de/
31a6(skyes rabs): bram ze'i gzug su bsgyur te da dong ba dang / grib shing sngon po zhig gi drung na nags na rmya ba'i ba long rje gcig cig lhas dang bcas par 'dug cing / nags tshul gyi shing gi me tog lo ma dang bcas pa'i phreng ba ni thogs/ dbyug pa dang dgra
31b1(skyes rabs): g.yas rol tu bzhag/ gcig pu srad bu ni 'khrul// smyug glu ni len cing 'dug pa mthong nas de'i drung du lhags te smras pa/ kye ba lang rdzi 'di lta bu'i dgon pa dben pa 'gro ba med pa na gcig pu ji ltar mi 'jigs/ des de dag la bltas/
31b2(skyes rabs): nas su la 'jigs zhes smras so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ srin po rnams dang 'dre rnams rang bzhin gyis gtum zhing ma rungs pa yin par khyod kyis sngon ma thos sam rig sngags dka' thub bde legs ldan pa dag/ grogs
31b3(skyes rabs): kyis bskor ba'i nang na 'dug gyur cing // dpa' la 'jigs pa med pa'i mi dag kyang // gang la thar bar 'gyur ba rab dka' ba// nags tshal rab tu dben zhing zab pa la// 'jigs pa'i sa na grogs kyang yong med par// mi yi sha dang tshil
31b4(skyes rabs): dag za ba yi// srin po de dag ci phyir khyod mi 'jigs// de skad ces smras pa dang ba lang rdzi des dgad nas de dag la smras pa/ bang legs chen pos 'gro ba 'di// yongs su bskyangs par gyur pas na// lha yi dbang po dag gis kyang // 'di
31b5(skyes rabs): ngag gtse bar mi nus na// sha za bo rnams kyis ga la nus// de bas nags na'ang khyim bzhin du// mtshan mo dag kyang nyin par bzhin// gcig pu'ang grogs kyi nang 'dug 'dro// bdag ni 'jigs pa med par 'dug/ de nas gnod sbyin de
31b6(skyes rabs): dag ngo mtshar cher gyur nas/ de la zil gyis gnon pa bzhin du ched cher byas nas smras pa/ kye bzang po khyod kyi bde legs kyi bye brag de ci 'dra ba zhig re shig spros shis tu sa shi// de dgod cing de dag la smras pa/ bdag cag gi bde legs kyi
32a1(skyes rabs): brag rmad du byung ba ci 'dra ba nyon cig/ gser gyi ri bo'i brag ltar yangs pa'i srang // ston ka'i zla ba dri med mdzes pa'i zhal// dpung pa gser gyi sdong po lta bur rgyas// mi dbang mkhyu mchog spyan 'dra rnam par
32a2(skyes rabs): gnon// bdag cag gi bde legs kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra'o zhes smras nas/ ngo mtshar che zhing khro ba dang bcas pas gnod sbyin de dag la bltas te yang smras pa// e ma'o 'di ngo mtshar che'o// mi dbang mthu cheni 'di ltar grags pa yang //
32a3(skyes rabs): khyed kyi rna lam ji ltar ma grags kye// 'on te bros kyang shin tu rmad byung bas// khyed cag yid mi ches phyir ma gzung grang // khyed cag gang nas lhags pa'i yul de yi// mi rnams yon tan tshol la mi mkhas sam// ched cher mi 'dzin skal
32a4(skyes rabs): ba med pa'i phyir// mi dbang grags pas rnam par spangasu dogs// de bas na de lta bu yul mtha' kho bo nas 'dir lhags pa ni khyed cag la skal ba cung zad cig yod do// gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang po de yul na gnas pa'i skye
32a5(skyes rabs): bo rnams la ni mi ma yin pa rnams kyis gnod pa bya bar mi nus pa rgyal po de'i mthu de lta bu ci las gyur/ ba lang rdzis smras pa/ nged kyi rgyal po chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu ni rang gi che ba nyid kyis thob pa'o// bram ze dag ltos shig/ de'i dbu
32a6(skyes rabs): byams pa ru mtshon khra bo'i dpung ni cho ga tsam// bde ni mi khro tshig rtsub mi smra sa yang legs par bsrung // de'i bka' khrims chos yin rgyu med nor yang dam pa mchod// de ltar rmad du byung yang ngan pa'i chos nyid dregs pa med/ kho bo cag gi rje
32b1(skyes rabs): 'di ni de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan te/ de bas na de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa byed mi nus so// de lta bas na kho bos khyed la ji snyed cig smra bar nus kyis// mi'i bdag po'o yon tan thos par 'dod na
32b2(skyes rabs): khyed grong khyer nyid du 'dong ba'i rigaso// khyed der dong na skye bo rnams rang gi chos lu dga' bas ya rabs kyi tshul la gnas pa dang / rtag tu bde zhing lo legs pas rab tu dga' ba phun sum tshogs shing cha lugs bzang la mi 'phyar ba drung
32b3(skyes rabs): skye bo blo bur du lhags pa rnams la khyad par du byams pa dang / mi'i bdag po'i yon tan snying la dran pa dang // de'i grags pa'i gzhi bstod pa bkra shis dang // bde legs bzhin du rab tu dga' zhing goms par byed pa dag mthong nas rgyal po'o/
32b4(skyes rabs): yon tan rgya cher shes par 'gyuraro// de ltar yon tan mang po brjod pas de mthong bar 'dod pa la nges par de'i yon tan mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rang gi mthus ma tshugs pas rgyal po de la sems mi bzod pa dang
32b5(skyes rabs): bcas pas yon tan snying nas brjod cing rigs pa dang dben par smras pa des kyang sems 'jam por ma gyur to// dben pa rnams ni phal cher yang // mi bzod pas ni yid gdungs nas// dngos po gang la de grags pa// de yi lhags par
32b6(skyes rabs): gdungs par 'gyur// rgyal po sbyin pa la dga' bar shes nas de la gnod pa byed par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag gis rgyal po mthong nas mthong ba'i tshe bza' ba bslangaso// de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' nas de'i lasu bskos pa'i mi rnams la
33a1(skyes rabs): kha zas zhim po bram ze rnams la myur du byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i kha zas rnams khyer te 'ongs na yang gnod sbyin de dag na ro kha zas de lta bu dag ni bdag cag ni mi za'o zhes nas stag gzig/
33a2(skyes rabs): rtsa sngon po mi 'dod pa bzhin du len du ma btub po// nga rgyal po des phos nas de dag gi drung du song ste/ 'o na khyed cag kha zas ji lta bu 'dod// de 'dra ba btsa lo zhes smras so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa// mi sha shin tu dron po dang / mi'i
33a3(skyes rabs): khrag ni dron po dag/ brtul zhugs ma nyams pad+ma'i spyan// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bza' btung lags zhes smras nas// rang gi lus kha nas mche ba gtsigs pa/ mig dmar zhing ser la yo zhing mi sdug pa dang / sna leb cing mi sdug pa dang / skra dang
33a4(skyes rabs): kha spu me 'bar ba ltar sor ba dang // lus char sprin lhor ngoms gnag cing mi sdug la 'jigs pa bstan pa dang / de dag mthong nas rgyal po des bsams pa// 'di dag ni sha za yin te mi ma yin no// de bas na bdag cag gi bza' ba dang btung
33a5(skyes rabs): pa mi 'dod do snyam du nges par gyur to// de nas mi'i dbang po de/ snying rje can gyi rang bzhin pas// bsam pa dag pas de dag la/ snying rje de bas kyang cher gyur// snying la snying rje 'ba' zhig sems pas gnod sbyin re dag la mya ngan byed cing don
33a6(skyes rabs): 'di ltar bu sems par nges so// spring rje can la 'di lta bu'o// bza' dang bca' ba rab tu dkon// nyin re zhing yang de btsal ba// de las sdug bsngal che ba med// snying rje med cing mi nus na'ang // 'bad pa'i don ni med par 'gyur// nus no'ang phan byeng
33b1(skyes rabs): goms pa la// de las dka' ba ci zhig yod// snying rje med cing yid ni ma zhi ba// de lta bu yi kha zas za ba rnams// tshe 'di dang ni pha rol rang don sreg/ 'di dag sdug bsngal nam zhig med par 'gyur// nga 'di dag gi kha zas sbyar bas nyin
33b2(skyes rabs): 'ga' zhig tsam yang gzhan// gsod pa la zhugs pa 'di las ji ltar bzlog par bya// phongs te slong du 'ongs pa rnams kyi gdong // re ba bzlog pas ngo 'dzu mi gnag gyur pa// bu yug rlung gis pad+ma rnying pa bzhin// mi dogar byas pa nam
33b3(skyes rabs): yang bdag mi dran// gdon mi za bar bdag gi lus 'di brtan zhing rgyas pa las// khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams sbyin par bya// phongs pa 'ongs na de ni rig pa snyam// de las gzhan pa bdag gis gang du btsal// bdag rang shi bo'i sha
33b4(skyes rabs): rnams drod med la// khrag rnams de la yod pa ma yin zhing // bru ba tsha bas sems ni gdungs pa la// de yis logs por mgu bar 'gyur ma yin// gson pa'i sha yang gud nas bdag gis ji ltar btsal bar bya// 'di dag bdag gi
33b5(skyes rabs): thang du 'ongs nas bkres pa dang skom pas mig dang gdong gi mdangs nyams shing bslangs pa dang re ba'i 'bras bu med pas lhags par yid la sdug bsngal zhing / phongs bzhin du slar dong na yang ji ltar bya/ de bas na 'di ni de dus la bab
33b6(skyes rabs): kyi// rtag tu na zhing gdugs pa'i rma 'dra ba// nad kyi 'byung khung ngan pa'i lus 'di las// dgos pa khyad par can du spyad pa yis// bcos pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzang por bya// de ltar nges par byas nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' bar gyur/
34a1(skyes rabs): pas mig rtsa dang gdong gi mdangs bzang pos rang gi lus bstan nas gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa/ bdag gi sha ni khrag dang bcas pa 'di// 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir bzung ste// gal te de ring mgron du byar rung na
34a2(skyes rabs): de ni bdag gi mngon par mtho bar 'gyur// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po 'di lhag pa'i bsam po shes bzhin du ngo mtshar rab tu che bas yid ma ches nas rgyal po la smras pa/ phongs pas bdag gi sdug bsngal dag/ slong zhing dman pas bstan pa
34a3(skyes rabs): lags// de las sbyin pa po nyid kyis// dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod// de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ de ni 'di dag 'od do snyam nas snying rab tu dga' ste rtswa bgro ba'i phyir sman pa rnams bos shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po de'i
34a4(skyes rabs): blon po rnams rgyal po'i sha dang khrag rnams gnod sbyin la sbyin par stsol bar rig nas rtab rtab por gyur te/ mi bzod cing sems 'khrug nas// byams pa'i dbang gis don 'di lta bu cung zad cig gsal bar smras so// lhas byin pa la
34a5(skyes rabs): ha cang dgyes tshos pas 'bangs glo ba nye ba rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba mi gzigs pa'i mi rig so// lhas 'di dag mi mkhyen pa yang ma lags te/ 'di ltar skye dgu rnams la gnod pa gang dang gang // de dang de dag gnod sbyin rnams
34a6(skyes rabs): la dga'// gzhan la gnod pas 'tsho zhing dga' ba skye// 'di dag rigs dang rang bzhin de ltar lags// rgyal srid dpal ni 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir// bde la ma chags lha yis gzung bar mdzod// de bas na bdag gi sha byin stsol ba yi// log
34b1(skyes rabs): pa'i lam du yi dam bcas pa thong // skyes bu dpa' bo khyod kyis mthus bskyabs pa'i// 'jig rten gdon mi za bar 'di mi bzod// phung bar byed la mkhas pa 'di dag ni// tshul gyis tshul min skye dgu phung bar 'dod// mchod sbyin tshon sum cu rtsa gsum
34b2(skyes rabs): pa'ang // tshil dang zhag la sogs pa sregs pas mgu/ khyod kyi zhal zas phun sum tshogs pa dag/ gus par byin yang 'di dag 'dod mi 'gyur// lha'i thugs ni bdag cag lta bu'i skye bos bcos pa ma lags mod kyis/ 'on kyang 'di ni bdag cag gi
34b3(skyes rabs): don du gces pa'i slad bdag cag 'di ltar rgo long gsol bar gyur to// gnod sbyin lnga po 'di rnams kyi slad du 'bangs thams cad mgon ma mchis par bgyi ba 'am/ lha 'di lta bu chos gang gi lam lags// gzhan yang 'di ltar bdag cag la ma
34b4(skyes rabs): byams pa ci las gyur// rje'i ched du 'tshal ba la sha dang khrag yongasu rdzogs par mchis pa 'di dag sngon bdag cag gi spras te ma phul na lha nyid kyis stsal bar bzhed// de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la smras pa// yod bzhin du ni med
34b5(skyes rabs): tsos su// nged cag lta bu ji ltar smra// brtul te gsal bar bslangs pa la// mi sbyin zhes kyang ji skad smra// chos kyi bka' khrims dag la thog mar 'gro ba dag/ gal te ngan pa'i lam du bdug song na// nga yis spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi//
34b6(skyes rabs): yi 'bangs rnams gnas skabs ji ltar 'gyur// 'di yang skye dgu rnams kyi don gyi phyir// ngas ni lus las snying po dbyung bar bya// nga yi sems ni ser snas phrogs gyur na// skye bo'i don la dge ba'i gzi tso 'dra// khyed kyis nga la gus pa dang /
35a1(skyes rabs): bcas par byams pa dang bag phab ste gang smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag cag la mi byams pa ci las gyur// sha dang khrag bdag cag la yongs su rdzogs par mchis bzhin du lhu nyid kyis bstsal bur bzhed ces zer ba
35a2(skyes rabs): de yang khyed la bshad// nga khyed la mau 'jar zhing mi byams pa yang ma yin la// ma byin du dogos pa yang maud mod kyi// rim gyis nor ni nyung bar gyur pa 'am// skal pa chud pas zad par gyur na ni// mdza' bo rnams la slod ba mdzes par gyur// nor
35a3(skyes rabs): ldan dbul la skyong ba yod mi mdzes// skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi phyir bskyed pa'i// lus ni sha rgyas shin tu mtho ba dag/ nga bdag nyid la chen po yod bzhin du// khyod la slong ba legs pa ma yin no// mi bshes gzhan gyis gnod pa mi bzod
35a4(skyes rabs): na/ khyed kyi gnod pa bdag gis glu la bzod// 'di dag khyed la mi slong nga la slong // de bas dbodag shi nani sbyin par bya// de bas na nga la rab tu byams pas chos kyi// bgegs la 'dzem pa med pa 'di thong zhig/ nga'i don du khyod spyod pa 'di
35a5(skyes rabs): lta bu bya ba'i mi rigs// 'di ni re zhig spyad dgos te// bza' la sogs pa yod bzhin du// sbyin la 'gog pa ji ltar 'gyur// legs sam gal te ma legs kyang // de ltar byed pa ci 'drar 'gyur// de ltar 'di rwa gal gyis 'tsho ba dre thong
35a6(skyes rabs): la nga'i rjes su mthun par bya na rigs pas spyad par bya'o// lam log par 'gro ba las bzlog pa'i yid can du byas la rjesu yi rang ba dang mthun par 'di la khyed kyis byas na bzang gi/ de ltar mi brtan par bya ba'i mi rigaso// ci'i phyir
35b1(skyes rabs): zhe na// nor ni gcig pus spyad pa ma yin la// slong ba 'ang nyin re rtag tu 'ong ma yin// slong ba 'di lta bu dang phrad pa ni// lha dag mnyes par byas kyang mi grub na// spyong ba 'di lta bu yang 'ongs gyur cing // lus kyang chung za mi bde'i gnas gyur la//
35b2(skyes rabs): the tsom za na byung rgya cher mi 'gyur na// 'jungs shing zhum pa mun pa'i mchog yin no// dri ltar rgyal po des rang gi 'khor rnams la khyed kyis de ltar dA la dgags pa'i mI rigs so zhes tshig 'jim pos bsgo nas// sman pa rnams bos nas rang gi la
35b3(skyes rabs): la rtsa lnga bkros te gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa// de yi lus 'di khyer nas ni// chos kyi grogs kyang bya ba dang yang rab tu dgar 'gyur ba// khyed kyis nga ni bya ba'i rigs// de dag gis de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas// rgyal ba'i khrag tsan+dan dmar po'i//
35b4(skyes rabs): khu ba 'dri ba snyim pa bzed de btung bar chas so// rgyal po de'i lus gser mdog 'dra ba la// mtshan mo spyod pa rnams ni khrag mthung ba// ri rab lhun po'i rI la mtshams dus kyi// char sprin smug pos nye bar bskor ba bzhin// dga' ba mchog ldan brtan
35b5(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa dang // lus kyi yon tan ldan pas rgyal po de// lus kyang ma nyams sems kyang rgyal ba med// khrog gi rgyun kyang zad par yong ma gyur// gnod sbyin de dag skom gyis gdungs pa zhe nas da ni 'dis 'tshal to zhes rgyal po lnga smraso// sdug bsngal
35b6(skyes rabs): mang po 'byung ba'i gnas kyi lus// rtag tu byas mi gzo yang rgyal po do// slong ba dag la sbyin pa'i don grub pas// rab tu dga' dang rjes 'thun bzung por gyur// de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' bas bskul bas mig dang gzhan gyi mdangs lhag
36a1(skyes rabs): bar gsal bar gyur nas// ut+pa la mthing gA'i 'dab ma ltar mdog sngo ba'i ral gyi rnon po rdo rin po ches spras pa'i 'od kyis mdzes pa blangs te bdag gi sha bcad cing bcad cing de dag la byin no// sbyin la dga' bas yang
36a2(skyes rabs): dang yang // skabs ni ma med par byas pas na// bcad pa'i sdug bsngal de yid la// dmigs par byed de ni mi nus so// ril gyi rnon po bcad pas drangs pa dang // dga' bas phyir yang ring du bskrad pa dang // de yi sdug bsngal skyo zhing ngal ba bzhin// yid
36a3(skyes rabs): la 'jug par byed pa chung bar gyur// rang gi sha yis gnod sbyin de dag ni// tshim par byas pas de ni de bzhin dga'// de dag sems ni khro ba'i rang bzhin yang // de ltar byas pas 'jam zhing nges par gyur// chos las dga' zhing snying rje'i dbang gyur te/
36a4(skyes rabs): gzhan gyis don du bdag lus ces btang bas// zhe sdang mi yis bsregs pa'i yid rnams kyang // rab tu dang zhing mdog kyang gsal bar bya// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po rang gI sha gcod pa la 'bad cing shwa bcad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis
36a5(skyes rabs): gzhin mdangs ma gyur pa dang / mi g.yo bar de bzhin du 'dug pa mthong nas rab tu dang zhing ngo mtshar cher gyur to// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad byung 'di dag ci// bden nam brdzun zhes spyod cing dga' ba skyes// rgyal la mi bzod zhi nas yid kyang dang /
36a6(skyes rabs): de la bstod cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar gyur// lha nyid kyi sku'o rgyal bar mdzad pa gtang du gsol// bdag ceg kyang tshim par bgyis lags kyis skye bo slong ba yad dga' bar bgyid pa shin tu rmad du byung ba khyod kyi spyod pa 'dis da 'tshal gyis
36b1(skyes rabs): gtang du gsol zhes rgyal po la gus pa dang bcas phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas par rab tu dang zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis bltas nas yang smras pa// gus pa'i dbang gi skye bo khyod kyi grags pa sgrogs pa thog tu bab// dpal yang pad+ma'i nags tshal
36b2(skyes rabs): btang ste khyod la brten pa thog tu bab// brgya byin mgon du gyur kyang khyod kyi mthus bskyabs pa yi lha mo 'di// mtho ris kyi mthong smon par nges te gal te mi smon bslus su zad// mang du smos kyang ci dgos te// skye bo 'di lta bus mngon par bzung ba'i mi
36b3(skyes rabs): 'jig rten 'di dag ni skal pa dang ldan pa'o// khyed de lta bu'o rgyal bar bgyis pa 'dis ni bdag cag bsregs kyis ma mchiso// de 'di ltar gyur pa las kyang skye bo khyod lta bu la brten nas bdag cag thar bar nus grang / bdag cag gis nongs pa
36b4(skyes rabs): bgyis pa gso ba'i slad du zhu bar 'tshal lo// bde ba brnyes par gyur pa dang // rgyal po'o dpal yang bor nas ni// 'di lta bu yi spyod pa yis// rmad du byung ba'i gnas ci bzhed// thams cad sa yi bdag po 'am// nor gyi phyug pa 'am dbang po
36b5(skyes rabs): 'am/ tshangs pa 'am rnam par grol ba dag/ dka' thub 'di yis bzhed lags sam// 'di lta bu yi stsol phod pas// bzhed pa'i don ni mi ring ste// gal te bdag cag thos rung na// bdag cag la ni bka' stsal rigs// rgyal pos smras pa//
36b6(skyes rabs): ci'i phyir nga 'di ltar byed pa nyon cig/ rnyed par dka' la 'jig par sla ba dang // chog pa'i bde med rab tu zhi med pa'i// srid pa'i longs spyod bde ba nga mi 'dod// lha dbang dpal yang 'dod pa ma yin na// de las gzhan pa smos kyang ci zhig dgos
37a1(skyes rabs): bdag gi sdug bsngal zad pa tsam gyi phyir// nga yi yid ni mgu bar 'gyur ma yin// sdug bsngal mi bzad nad kyis nyen pa yi// lus can mgon med 'di rnams ngas bltas nas// bsod nams 'dis ni thams cad
37a2(skyes rabs): gzigs pa yi// go 'phang 'thob cing sbyin gyi dgra btul nos// rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i rlabs 'khrugs pa'i// srid pa'i mtsho las skye bo 'don par 'dod// de nas gnod sbyin de dag rab tu dga' zhing ba spu langs nas rgyal po la phyag btsal te
37a3(skyes rabs): smras pa/ 'di lta bu'i rtsol ba khyad par can gyi las 'di ni rigs te// de bas na khyod lta bu'i dgongs pa 'grub pa 'di ni ring po mi thog so snyam du yid la nges par bsams nas gsol ba btab pa// khyod kyi mdzad pa 'di kun ni// 'jig rten phan pa'i
37a4(skyes rabs): phyir lags kyang // bdag cag rang la phan 'tshal bas// de tshe bdag cag dgongs su gsol// ma 'tshal bas na bdag cag gis// bdag gi don yang ma mthong bas// de ltar khyod ni 'o rgyal ba// de yang bzod pa mdzad du gsol// khyod kyi da
37a5(skyes rabs): yang bdag cag la// rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur gyur pa// blon po dag la bgyi ba bzhin// 'dzem pa med par stsal ba'i rigs// de nas rgyal po des de dag gi sems rab tu dang zhing 'jam par gyur par rig nas smras pa// 'di ni nga l-i phan pa
37a6(skyes rabs): yin gyi gnod pa ma yin pas mi bzod du dogs pa ma skyed cig/ gzhan yang chos kyi lam la 'di ltar grogs byed pa// byang chub thob nas brjed par ga la 'gyur// rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi los// khyed cag nyid la thog
37b1(skyes rabs): mar bgo bar bya// nga ni de dga' bar shes byas nas// srog gcod khyed kyis dug bzhin spang bar byos// gzhan nor chung ma dag la chags pa dang / brdzun du smra dang chang gi sdig pa spongs// de nas gnod sbyin de dag de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes de la
37b2(skyes rabs): mnyan nas de la bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// sems dpa' chen po des na bdag gi sha dang khrag nges par sbyin par byas pa de nyid kyi tshe// sa ni rnam pa mang por g.yos par gyur// gser gyi ri bo rnam par
37b3(skyes rabs): 'gul bar gyur// de na gnas pa'i rnga rnams sgra yang 'byin// shing rnams 'gul bas me tog lhags par gyur// de dag rdzis bskyod mkha' la sprin ltar chags// la lar bla re bris shing bya brgyus bzhin// kha cig tu ni phreng ba brgyus pa
37b4(skyes rabs): bzhin// mi yu~M bdag po'i 'khor yug mnyam par lhags// rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bango ba'i rlabs// rang bzhin lhas ni lhags po'i rishugs dang sgras// 'gro la brtun pa'i lus ni gzi mdas can// sa yi bdag pos bzlogapa bzhin
37b5(skyes rabs): du byung // de nas lha yi bdag po 'di ci zhes// brtad par gyur nas de yi rgyu rtog cing // rgyal po nyes par dogs te rab myur bar// rgyal po'i pho brang mya ngan 'khrugs par 'ongs// sa yi bdag po de ltar gyur na yang // gzi mdog gsal
37b6(skyes rabs): bas lhag par yaM mtshan skyes// thad du 'ongs nas snyan pa'i tshig rnams kyis// dang zhing dga' bas de ya spyod pa bstod// oM ma ho skyes bu dam pa'i chos re bzang // e ma ho yon tan bsgos pa rgya re che// e ma'o gzhan la
38a1(skyes rabs): phan pa'i blo re des// sa 'di khyod la gtad pas mgon dang bcas zhes bstod nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi'i sman gyi khyad par rma sar pa sos par byed nus pa rnams kyis de'i lus sngon bzhin du sdug
38a2(skyes rabs): bsngal med par byas nas// rgyal po des kyang mthun pa dang gus pa'i yo byad kyis slar mchod pa byas nas de nyid kyi gnas su slar dong do// de ltar snying rje chen po rnams ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhing bdag gi bde ba la mi
38a3(skyes rabs): lta ba yin no// nor tsam la'ang chags nas gtong mi phod pa lta bu zhig yod ces skye bo sbyin pa byed pa dag gzing bstod pa dang / snying n+d+he'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa che ba bstan pa dang / bsti stang du byas te chos
38a4(skyes rabs): mnyan pa la yang brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po 'di dag ni mdo du byed pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa de yang 'di las dgongs// de'i tshe na gnod sbyin lnga por gyur pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar zhal gyis
38a5(skyes rabs): bzhes pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi byin pa yin no// byams pa'i stobs kyi skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni sems can phal ba rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba tsam yang legs par mi nus
38a6(skyes rabs): na kun tu spyad pa lta ga la nus// de yang 'di skad thos to// dbang po thul ba goms par gyur pa/ dpa' ba dang tshul dang dul ba phun sum tshogs pas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal thob pa rgan pa la bsnyen bkur nges par byas pas rig byed gsum
38b1(skyes rabs): dang brtag pa'i don gyi de kho na nyid thugasu chud pa/ nang gi 'khor rang gi chos dang las la 'bad pa// yid 'byung zhing bde bar 'tsho ba/ snying nye ba rnams kyis bka' khrims bzang po bsgrags pa/ 'tsho tshes bya ba legs par 'byor pa// yul shi bi pa rnams
38b2(skyes rabs): kyi rgyal po kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yon tan ldan pas mi yi bdag po'i dpal// rigs ldan chung ma bzhin du snying nye ba// ri phug seng ges bsrungs pa'i ri dges bzhin// sa yi bdag po gzhan rnams glags mi lha// dka'
38b3(skyes rabs): thub rnams dang rigs dang sgyu rtsa l-i la// gang gi 'khor gyis goms par byas pa rnams// 'ongs na rim gro lhag par che bar gyur// bkur sti byas pas gtso bo yin par snang // de rgyal srid thob ma thag tu de'i bu thams cad sgrol ba zhes bya ba yon tan
38b4(skyes rabs): mang po rtag tu grags pa zhig rgyal tshab tu gyur te// de'i tshe rgyal tshab de bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yino// gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la dga'// gzi brjid che yang bzod cing nges pa'i ngang // mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med
38b5(skyes rabs): dpal dang ldan zhing 'byor kyang dregs pa med// de yi glags pas 'jig rten gsum khyab pas// phyogs rnams rab tu rgya chen mthong gyur kyang // gzhan gyi grags pa cung zad yod pa rnams// 'phro ba'i skabs kyang med pa bzhin du gyur// skye bo
38b6(skyes rabs): rnams la sdug bsngal dbang byed pa// de yi ma bzod snying rje'i gzhu drag dang // sbyin pa'i mnga' rnams char bzhin 'bebs pa yis// de dang lhan cig g.yul chen 'gyed pa 'dra// de nyid re zhing slong ba lhags pa rnams la bslangs pa bas kyang lhag
39a1(skyes rabs): par tsun mongs par nor gtong zhing / tshig 'jam po dang gus pa dang yid du 'ong bas rab tu tshim par byed par gyur to// dus mtshams kyi nyi ma dag la yang gso sbyong la nges par gnas pa dang rab tu zhi bas brgyun te/ mgo khrus
39a2(skyes rabs): byas shing gos dkar po bgos nas glang po che'i mchog gangs ri 'dra ba// dregs pa'i rdul gyis gdong brgyan pa// mtshan nyid dang / dul ba dang / mgyogs pa dang / snying stobs tsho ba phun sum tshogs pa/ grags pa/ gzhon par 'os pa'i
39a3(skyes rabs): spos kyis glang po che mchog zhon nas grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug na bdag gi sbyin gtong gi khang pa skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi rdzing bu dang 'dra ba bshams te// bzhag pa rnams nyul du song ngo // dga' ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par
39a4(skyes rabs): gyur te// phongs pa rnams la sbyin 'dod pa'i// dga' ba gang dag skye ba ni// khyim ni gnas pa'i longs spyod la// de tsam du ni dga' ba med// de nas re zhig cig de de ltar sbyin pa byed pa la snying rab tu dga' ba'i slong mo rnams kyis kun tu
39a5(skyes rabs): bsgrags pa thos nas de'i mo ho 'og gi rgyal po gzhan zhig goso bsamaso pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa la dgo' ba'i dbang du gyur pas slu bar nus so snyam nas// glang ze che'i mchog bslang ba'i phyir bram ze dag cig btang ngo // de nas thams
39a6(skyes rabs): cad sgrol rang gi sbyin gtong gi khang pa nyul zhing rab tu dga' bas bzhin gyi mdangs bzang blo bram ze de dag gis rgyal ba dang shis pa brjod nas lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng ste bstod nas mdun du bsdad pa dang / des glang po che'i mchog de kha
39b1(skyes rabs): bzung nas zhe sa dang bcas par ci bzhed gsungs shig ces ci'i phyir lhags pa dris so// bram ze rnams kyis smras pa// khyod ni sbyin la dpa' ba dang / khyod kyi glang po chen po 'di// 'gros bzang 'gying zhing 'gro ba yi// yon tan 'tshal
39b2(skyes rabs): phyir bdag cag mchis// te se'i gangs dang 'dra ba yi// glang chen 'di ni sprul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag ya mtshan gyis// yid ni rab tu ngom par mdzod ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying dga' bas kun tu rgyas par gyur
39b3(skyes rabs): nos yun ring mo zhig na gdod slongs mo pa'i skye bo rlabs cher slong phod pa mthong bar gyur to snyam du bsams// bram ze 'di dag la ni glang po che'i rgyal po 'di lta bu dag cang mi dgos kyi// gdom mi za bar 'di ni bskam pa dang / phrag dog gi
39b4(skyes rabs): skyon gyis yid dkrugs pa'i rgyal po 'ga' zhig gi 'dod chen gyis sbyar te btangango snyam du nges so// grags dang chos la'ang ma bltas par// nga la phan bzhin gang byed pa// rgyal po de yi bsams pa dag/ rI thag chad par mi bya'o// de ltar
39b5(skyes rabs): nges par byas nas bdag nyid chen po de glang po che'i mchog de las myur du babs te/ bzhi su gsol shes nas gser gyi ril ba btud de dag gi mdun du 'dug/ nor sgrub ngor ni chos lam mi mthun pa'i// rgyal ba'i btsug lag dag
39b6(skyes rabs): la mkhas gyur kyang // chos la dga' bas de nas glang chen byin// tshul dang 'gal bas de ni g.yos ma gyur// glang chen gser gyi dra ba mdzes pas legs brgyan pa// ston ka'i sprin tshogs glog gyu 'dra ba de byin nas/ mi yi dbang po'i
40a1(skyes rabs): sras te rab tu dga' bar gyur// tshul gyi phyogs la dga' bas grong khyer pa rnams 'khrugs// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po de byin pa thos nas yul sha bi'i bram ze rgan po dang // blon po bka' la gtogs pa dang / dmag
40a2(skyes rabs): mi dang / grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams ca ci'i sgra phyung nas// rgyal po kun tu rgyal ba de'i drung du lcags te// rtab rtab por gyur nas mi bzod cing rngam ste zhes btang nas rko long du smras pa// lha rgyal srid dpal 'di ltar chab stsal kyang yal bar dor ba
40a3(skyes rabs): 'di ci lags// lha nyid kyi rgyal srid 'di ltar nyams par gyur pa bzod par mdzad pa'o mi rigs so// rgyal pos rangs rings skad du 'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang / yang smras pa/ ci lha mi mkhyen tam/ gang gi 'gram pa bung ba sgra sgrogs pa/
40a4(skyes rabs): rdul gyi dri zhim rlung gis rigs pa yis// gzhan gyi gang po myos shing regs pa rnams// rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal med par zil gnon pa// gang gi gzi yis khyed kyi dgra po rnams// mthu stobs mnan cing dregs pa med byas pa// thams
40a5(skyes rabs): cade sgrol gyis glang po de byin nas// khyod kyi rgyal ba gzugs can gzhan yul song // ba dang gser deng gos dang gza' ba dag/ rgyal po bram ze rnams la sbyin par 'os// gang la dpal dang rgyal ba nges yod pa'i// glang tshon btang ba sbyin la
40a6(skyes rabs): chas so// tshul dang 'gal ba'i lam du song ba 'di// rgyal pa'i dpal ni ji ltar 'go bar 'gyur// 'di ni yal par bor na khyod la gnod// khyod kyi dgra ni mdun nas dga' bar byed// de skad thos nas rgyal po da bu la byams pas de dge nyid
40b1(skyes rabs): la cung zad yid mi dga' bar gyur nas// dgos pa'i dbang gis mi dga' ba bzhin du de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yul shi bi pa rnams la yid bzhos te smras pa/ thams cad sgrol 'di sbyin pa la zhugs shing tshul gyi rim pa la mi lta ba ngas
40b2(skyes rabs): shes te/ rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug pa ni de ltar bya ba'i yang mi rigs mod kyi// 'das kyang rang gi glang po che byin zin pas skyugs pa 'dra bar bor ba lta la su zhig sla 'phrog/ 'on kyang ngas 'di ci nas kyang sbyin pa la chod shes par byas//
40b3(skyes rabs): khyed 'di ltar 'khrugs par mi byed cig/ shi bi pa rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po thams cad sgrol 'di ni don 'di lta bu dag la gtams pa tsam gyis mchi su btub pa ma lagaso// kun tu rgyal bas smras pa/ 'o na de la gzhan ngos ci
40b4(skyes rabs): cig bya// nyes pa spyod la gang zhig mi dga' zhing // yon tan bsten la skyon du bzung ngam ci// glang po de yi phyir ni bdag gi bu// bsad dam gzung ngam 'on te ci zhig bya// de bas na khyed la rngam zhing 'khrug pa ma byed cig dang / ngas thams
40b5(skyes rabs): cad skyil 'di lta bu dag byed du mi gzhug go/ de nas yul shi bi pa rnams khros nas rgyal po la smras pa/ mi'i dbang po khyod kyi sras de la// bsad dam cing ngam brdeg par su zhig 'tshal chos la zhen la snying rje'i bdag nyid pas/ 'dis ni
40b6(skyes rabs): rgyal srid gzung bar yong mi nus// 'khor gsum bsten la mkhas shing gzi che la/ grogs pa thob pas seng ge'i khri l-i 'os// tshul la mi lta chos la rab dga' bas// 'di ni dka' thub nags na gnas par 'os// sa yi bdag po
41a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyi tshul nyes skyon// de la brten pa rnams la 'byung mod kyi// 'on kyang de dag bco su rung ba mchis// sa bdag gtso bo nyams na bcos su yod mi rung // 'di la mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te// khyod
41a2(skyes rabs): kyi srid nyams mi bzod shi bi pa// 'di rnams kyis ni 'di ltar nges par bcad// mi rje sras 'di dka' thub 'phel ba'i phyir// grub pas bsten pa'i ri bo bang dkar btang // tshul ma yin pas nyam su dogs shing phan par dga'
41a3(skyes rabs): ba'i skye bo de dag gis ngo zlog ma phod par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal po dbu dang bral pas sems gdungs pas khang dngangs shing ngo tsha bzhin du mgo smad de nyam nga nga ltar shugs nar zhes phyung nas byams shing spobs pa dang yid gcugs
41a4(skyes rabs): pa'i dbang gis yul shi bi pe rnams la smras pa/ khyed de ltar 'di la gal gyis chu na re zhig nyin zhag gcig tsam zhig spro srings shig dang / ngas sung nang par khyed kyis bsams pa ba zhin du thams cad sgrol byed du gzhug/ yul
41a5(skyes rabs): shi bi pa rnams kyi de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas bsgo ba mnyan pa dang / rgyal po des gsol ka ba la khyod sdong la 'di ltar gyur pa thams cad sgrol la sbron cig ces bka' stsal to// des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ mya ngan
41a6(skyes rabs): gyi mchi mas gdod khebs shing thams cad sgrol rang gi khang pa na 'dug pa'i drung du song ste/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyi shugs kyis skad phyung ste ngus nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ thams cad sgrol gyi sa bortabs
41b1(skyes rabs): brtabs ltar// a ma'o rgyal po thugs bde'am zhes dris pa dang / mi dga' buR+Sha tshig mi gsal bar de la rgyal po ni thugs bde'o zhes smras so// 'o na ci'i phyir de ltar mi brtan par gyur ces thams cad sgrol gyis yang dris pa dang // /
41b2(skyes rabs): gsol ka ba mchims brnangs shing skad mdzer la dbugs kyis brnangs pa'i tshig mi gsal bas bcom chung ngasu smras pa// shi bi pa rnams mi srun pa// 'khrug par gyur nas rgyal ba'i bka'// 'jam por sprul ba'am mAM rkyen
41b3(skyes rabs): par// rgyal po khyod ni yul nas 'byin// thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ci'i phyir 'khrug nas nga skad// 'dul dang 'gal ba'i lam mi 'gro// bag med pa la'ang nga mi 'ga'// nyes pa byas pa ma mthong na// shi bi pa
41b4(skyes rabs): rnams ci'i phyir 'khrugs/ gsol kau bas smras pa/ hA cang rlabs ches pas lan no// khyod ni chags pa med la dga' bar 'gyur// slong ba rnams kyi yid ni chags la dga'// glang po'i rgyal po khyod kyis byin pa'i phyir// shi bi pa rnams 'khrugs
41b5(skyes rabs): nas bstan po nyams// de bas rang gi chos byor te// khyed la tsham tshem med par ni// gang du spyugs sar mi dong ba'i// lam der khyod kyang song zhes zer// de nas byang chub sems dpa' snying brtsol goms pa'i shos che ba dang / skye bo slong ba
41b6(skyes rabs): byams pa dang / rang gi bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ni mi bstan pa'i rang bzhin can te/ nga'i rang bzhin mi shes pa ltar byed mod/ 'jig rten don du nga'i lus 'di 'dzin na/ phyi rol nor lha smos kyang ci zhig/
42a1(skyes rabs): dgos// rang gi mig dang mgo yang ngas sbyin na// phyi rol nor sbyin smos kyang ci zhig dgos// slong ba rnams kyis bslang ba'i tshig rnams la// rang gi lus kyang gtong bar sems pa la// skrag par byas na mi sbyin snyam sems pa//
42a2(skyes rabs): byis pa rnams kyi mi bstan ston du zad// shi bi pa rnams thams cad kyis// da nI bsod dam skyugs kyang rung // mi sbyin par ni nga mi byed// dka' thub tshal du 'gror zang mod// de nas byang chub sems dpas btsun mo gtang ngan thos te bzhin gyur pa la/ shi bi pa
42a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis 'dir ji ltar nges par byas pa khyod kyis thos sam// nga las khyod kyi ci thob dang // gang yang khyod kyi pho ma yi// nor rnams cung zad rtsi yod pa// de dag khyod kyis gtor du spros// mang dris smras pa// lha 'di dag ga gter du smra bar bgyi// thams
42a4(skyes rabs): ca sgrol gyis smras pa/ rtag par tshul khrims ldan pa lnga// sbyin pa bkur stis brgyan pa byin// nor rnams de ltar gter bcug pa// rjesu 'gro zhing dbrog tu med// gyos sgyug gnyis ni dga' bar byos// bus pa gnyis kyang yongasu sbyong // chos la
42a5(skyes rabs): gcig tu bag yod byos// nga med mya ngan ma byed cig/ mang dris de thos nas snying rab tu gdudus kyang khrim thab mi dga' ba spang ba'i phyir mya ngan dang mi dga' ba btang ste smrasas pa/ rgyal po chen po nyog gcig pu/ nags su gshegs pa chos ma
42a6(skyes rabs): mchis// rgyal rigs gang du gshegs pa dor// bdag kyang de bas mchi bar 'tshal// lha bdag gis ni nags tshal na gnas pa mi bdo bar ma mthong lagaso// ci'i slad du zhe na// mi srun mi med shing dang chu mang sbyar// bya rnams sna tshogs sgra
42b1(skyes rabs): 'byin ri dgas mang // neru sing sngon po yid 'ong bai DUr 'dra// skyed mos tshal bas dka' thub nags tshal dgyes// lha gzhan nags tshal lcug mA'i khrod dag na// gzhon nu 'di gnyis phreng ba yis// brgyan cing rtse ba gzigs na ni// rgyal
42b2(skyes rabs): srid dag kyang dgongs mi 'gyur// dus kyi dbang gis gyur pa yis// nags tshal mdzes pa sar pa dang // sman ljongs 'bab tshur bcas pa yi// nags tshal dag na dgyes par gyur// dga' ba tshal ba'i bya rnams ni// sna tshogs sgra 'byin
42b3(skyes rabs): sil spyan bzhin// 'dod chags bdo ba'i slob dpon gyis// bstan pa'i rma byA gar yang bgyid// blung blor na chung glu len pa// rab tu sman cing ma smad pa'ang // nags tshal dag na glu gar gyis// khyod kyi thugs ni dgyes par bgyid// nags tshal
42b4(skyes rabs): dag na mtshan mo'iri zla 'od ni// ras dkar bzang pos g.yogs pa'i rdo le bo dang // me tog shing gau d+hi nim bsgris pa yi// nags tshal ser bus bsil yab g.yob par bgyid// 'bab chu'i na chungs gor mas bskyod pa yis// chab sgra
42b5(skyes rabs): sman pa ljang lhung smra sgrogs pa// rgyun gyi sgra rnams sil khrol myachi ba bzhin// khyod kyi thugs ni rab tu dgyes par bgyid// de de lta btsun mo gnang skyon gyi yis gnos pa dang / nags tshul du 'gro ba la sems spro bar gyur nas skye
42b6(skyes rabs): bo slong mo po rnams la bltas te// sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa la zhug so// de nas thamaso cing sgrol de ltar btang bar gyur pa thos nas rgyal po'i pho brang na ngung mo'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// skye bo slong se mo pa rnams kyang mya ngan gyis gdu
43a1(skyes rabs): ba'i shugs kyis brgyal ba bzhin du gyur cing // skyo bla can du gyur pa bzhin du smre sngags rnam pa mang po 'don par gyur to// 'bras bu zhim po yod pa'i grib shing dag/ bcad pa'i phyir ni sta res gzas pa rnams// 'dzin
43a2(skyes rabs): 'i sa ni ngo mtshar ma gyur pa// 'di ni sems pa med par gsol par mngo na// chu gtsong zhing po bsil bas gang ba yi// rdzing bu 'dral pa bdag kyang mi 'gog na// 'jig rten skyong rnams ming ni don med 'gyur// grags pa zad ngam gal te gung du dong //
43a3(skyes rabs): gang na rgyal po thams cad sgrol// rang gi srid las phyung ba na// kye ma'o chos min gnyid ma log/ chos ni gnyid log yang na shi/ bdag cag phongs pa slong mo pa// nyes pa cung zad med pa la// srog la sgrol ba mi srun pa// de las phud byed mkhas
43a4(skyes rabs): pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che dang // gser dang dngul gyis gang ba'i mdzod 'bum phrag du ma dang // nor dang 'bru mang po dang ldan pa'i bang mdzod rnams dang // bran po dang bran mo dang theg pa dang gzhon pa dang gos dang yo byad
43a5(skyes rabs): la sogs pa thams cad phongs pa'i rnams la ji ltar rigs par byin te// pha ma mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis bstan pa zil gyis non pa gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas// bu dang chung mar bcas te shing rta'i mchog la zhon nas bsod
43a6(skyes rabs): nams kyi nyin par gyi sgra bzhin du skye bo mang po che nga 'don pa'i sgra sgrogs shing grong khyer gyi mchog gi nang nas phyir byung ste/ rjes su chags pa'i dbang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i skye bo mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i mchi mas gdong g.yogs pa rnam
43b1(skyes rabs): nan gyis slar bzlog ste bkye nas// bdag nyid kyis srab skyogs bzung ste ri 'bang ka gang na ba der song ngo // grong khyer gyi mchog gi nyen kor skyed mos tshal bzang po yid du 'ong ba dngar ba 'das nas kyang / yid la 'khrug pa med par mthar gyis
43b2(skyes rabs): grib shing nyung zhing skye bo 'dul ba'i rgyun chad pa/ ri dgas mang po rab tu rgyu ba// phyogs gsal bar snang ba// tshung bye'u ca co'i sgra grags pa'i dgon pa zhig tu phyin to// de nas bram ze 'khyams pa dag cig gis de la shing rta 'dren pa'i rta bslang so// dpag
43b3(skyes rabs): tshad du ma'i lam du de lus la// bu smang bcas shing grogs ni med gyur kyang // sprin la dga'i bas phyi rjes mi lta bar// bram ze rnams la rta zhing byin par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis shing rta drang bar bsams nas leg
43b4(skyes rabs): par chas pa dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu bzhi zhig ri dgas dmar po'i gzugasu bsgyur nas/ rta bzang po rab tu dul ba bzhin du bdag cag nyid kyis shing rta'i gnya' shing gnya' bar thogs par gyur to// de mthong ba dang mang dri dga' zhing ngo mtshar du
43b5(skyes rabs): gyur pas mig dgrang pa la byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gang na 'di ltar rdo glo bur 'ongs pa la// byams pa'i rtsa zug ri dgas mchog 'khor nags// dka' thub can gyis gnas bcus bkur ba yi// mthu chen khyad par 'phags
43b6(skyes rabs): pa 'di la ltos// mang dris smras pa/ dam pa rnams kyi yon tan dag/ rab tu goms kyang mi 'dra bas// bdag gis bsams na mthu chen 'di// rgyal po khyod kyi lags pa snyam// mtsho'i nang na skar ma'i gzugs brnyan rnams// ku mud
44a1(skyes rabs): rgyas pas lhag par mdzes gyur pa// zla ba'i 'od zer ltad mo lta ba bzhin// 'dir mchis pa rnams rgyur gyur lags pa snyam// de ltar de dag phan tshun rjes su mthun pas gcig la gcig spyan par smra zhing lam du
44a2(skyes rabs): zhugs te dong ba las// bram ze zhig 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' la shing rta bslangaso// slong ba dga' ba'i gnyen gyur pa// bdag gi bde la pa chags des// shing rta byin pas bram ze de'i/ ra pa yongs su rdzogs par byas// de
44a3(skyes rabs): nas byang chub sems dpa' yid dga' bzhin du bdag gi bu smad shing rta las phab ste shing rta'i mchog bram ze la byin nas// gzhon nu dra ba can pang du thogs te rkang pas lam du zhugs// mang dri yang yid la mi dga' ba med par gzhon nu ma kri sna
44a4(skyes rabs): 'dzin pang du thogs te de dang 'grogs te song ngo // ljon pa'i shing rnams 'bras bu bzang po yis// rtse mo btung nas mgron du gnyer ba bzhin// bsod nams mthu yis mngon du lta byed cing // slob ma dul ba phyag kyang 'tshal ba 'dra// gang du
44a5(skyes rabs): chu 'dod gyur pa de dag tu// dang mo'i dpung dgos pad+ma skyod pa yi// ze ba lhags pas ser por gsal gyur pa'i// mtsho rnams de la rab tu byung bar gyur// sprin rnams kyis kyang bla re bzang po bros// ser ba bde ba dri zhim dad kyang ljang //
44a6(skyes rabs): ngang ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba mi bzod pas// gnod sbyin rnams kyis de'i lam yang bsnyungs// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi nang nas 'gro ba bzhin du 'chag na dga' ba'i bde ba rjesu myong zhing lam gyis dub pa'i sdug
44b1(skyes rabs): bsngal ma myong bar bu spyad dang bcas te phyin nas 'bang ka'i ri mthong bar gyur to// de nas yang me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan pa'i shing ljon pa snum snum ltar 'dug pa rnam pa du mas gang ba// bya mang po 'dod pas myos shing dga' ba'i
44b2(skyes rabs): sgra 'byin pa/ rma bya mang po gar byed pas mdzes par gyur pa// ri dwags kyi rigs du mas rgya ba// mtsho chu sngon po gtsang mas ched du bskor ba lhor 'dug pa/ me tog gi 'dris bsgos pa'i ser bu'i dang lgang ba'i dka' thub kyi nags tshal du nags tshal na rgyab
44b3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis lam mtshon te zhugs pa dang / de nas yang brgya byin gyis bka' stsal te/ las sna tshogs byed pa nyid kyis byas pa shing lo'i khang pa mthong na yid du 'ong ba dus thams cad du bde ba de lta bu zhig tu gnas bcas te 'dug go// nags
44b4(skyes rabs): tshal de na chung ma sdug pas bkur sti byas// bdag gi byis pa'i snyan dngags mu bsgribs snyan pa nyan// skyed mos tshal na 'dug bzhin rgyal srid bsams pa med// lo phyed lhag tsam de ni dka' thub spyod par gyur// de nas re zhig rgyal ba'i btsun mo
44b5(skyes rabs): rtsa ba dang 'bras bu tshol du song ba'i 'og tu byis pa gnyis bskyang ba'i phyir rgyal po'i bu gnas bsrung zhing 'dug pa na// bram ze lam gyi rdul gyis rkang pa dang byin pa rtsub rtsu ba ltar 'dug pa/ ngal bzhin me ga dang mig rtswa nyams pa/ ril pa spyi blugs dbyug
44b6(skyes rabs): pa la btags pa phrag pa la thogs pa/ chung mas g.yog khrid de shog cig par ched cher spring ba zhig phyogs der 'ongs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpes yun ring mo zhig na gdong phongs pa 'ongs par mthong nas yid rab tu dang pos mig dang
45a1(skyes rabs): bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu gsal bar gyur nas// bsu ste 'ongs pa legs zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig sman pa brjod do// dkar thub kyi nags kyi nang na bzhag nas glo bur du 'ongs pa la bkur sti bya ba byas te ci'i phyir
45a2(skyes rabs): 'ongs pa dris// de nas bram ze de chung ma la byams pas brten pa dang ngo rgyu ba por zhing bsrung pa 'ba'i zhig tu chas pas don 'di lta bu smra so// gang na gnang zhing nyams pa'i lam yod pa// 'jig rten 'di dag der 'dod nyam ngar mon// 'gro ba 'di
45a3(skyes rabs): dag phal cher ser snas bsgribs// bdag gis gzhan du bslang ba'i tshig mi phyin// sbyin la dpa' ba'i grags dang dpal dag gis// mthar dbyung ma lus khyod kyis mthar phyin pas// de phyir bdag ni slong mo bgyid par gyur// de bas sras
45a4(skyes rabs): gnyis g.yog tu bdag la stsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sbyin pa la dga' ba goms byas shing // slar bzlog pa ni ma bskyobs pas// rab tu sdug pa'i bu gnyis kyang // tsham chom med par
45a5(skyes rabs): sbyin zhes smras// bde legs su gyur cig/ da 'di na mchis tau ci bgyi zhes bram zes smras pa dang // bu gnyis kyis byin pa'i gtam thos pas skrag pa'i mig rig rig por gyur pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
45a6(skyes rabs): po'i shugs kyis snying gdungs par gyur pas smras pa/ khyod la 'di gnyis ngas byin na// 'di gnyis ma ni nags tshal du// rtsa ba 'bras bu 'chol du song // de yang de ring 'dir 'ong gau/ 'dir ni zhag gcig ngal so la// de dang phrad nas
45b1(skyes rabs): 'o byas pas// rgyun gyis brgyan cing phreng ba can// nga yi bu gnyis sad khyed cig/ bram zes smras pa/ khyod 'di dus kyis 'grub 'di mthong zhig/ bud med rnams ni mi drang bas// ming ni g.yon can zhes su btags// khyod kyi sbyin pa'i bgegs byud kyi//
45b2(skyes rabs): de bas bdag ni 'dug mi 'dod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sbyin pa'i bgegs su gyur par mi dgos shig/ de ni de'i chos spyod pa'i grogs yin mod kyi// 'on kyang 'di la khyod ci dgar zad do// gzhan yang bram ze chen po// rab tu gzhon
45b3(skyes rabs): nizhing byis pa la// g.yog gi bya po mi mkhas pas// 'di gnyis khyod kyi bran byed kyang // ji lta bur na mgu bar 'gyur// shi bi'i rgyal po nga yi yab// 'di gnyis 'di ltar gyur mthong na// 'di gnyis bslu ba'i nor dag ni// ci 'dong khyod la
45b4(skyes rabs): nges par ster// de bas de'i yul bu ni// 'di gnyis khrid na legs par gyur// de ltar byas na nor chen dang // chos rnams dang yang ldan pa du/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po sbrul gdug pa dang 'dra ba'i drung du mi dga' ba'i skyes 'tshal to 'chi ba'i
45b5(skyes rabs): rngo mi thog go/ rgyal pos bdag la 'di gnyis 'phrog/ yang na chad pas gcod kyang srid// de bas 'di gnyis bram ze mo'o// g.yag tu bdag ni khrid mchi/ de nas byang chub sems dpas don yongasu ma rdzogs par 'o na da ci dgar zad ces smras
45b6(skyes rabs): nas// bu gnyis la rjes su chags pa dang bcas par g.yog legs par byos shig ces rjesu gtams nas len du gzhug pa'i phyir bram ze'i lag pa brkyang pa la ril ba spyi blugs btung // de yis bsgrims pa'i mthu dag gis// ril
46a1(skyes rabs): ba las ni chu byung na// mig ni pad+ma dmar 'dra la// ma bsgrims par yang mchi ma byung // de nas bram ze de brkam pas ha cang yang dga' ches nas brtabs pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bu dbrog
46a2(skyes rabs): par rings pas shis par brjod pa'i cho ga mdor smras nas// tshig drag po rtsub pos phyir byung zhes smras nas// gzhon nu gnyis dka' thub kyi nags nas phyir phyung ngo // de nas gzhon nu gnyis bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis snying gdungs pas
46a3(skyes rabs): pha la phyag 'tshal nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du smras pa/ yab gcig yum dang slad rol byung // khyod kyang bdag cag btang bar bzhed// de nas bdag cag khyod kyis stsol// de nas bram ze des bsams pa// 'di gnyis kyis ma yang
46a4(skyes rabs): de'u re 'di na tshur 'ong la 'di yang bu la byams pas 'gyod pa skye yang srid snyam nas pad+ma'i bam po bcings pa bzhin du de gnyis kyi lag pa lcug mas bcings pa dang / de gnyis gcig la gcig 'khri zhing pa la bzhin slar phyogs te lha ba
46a5(skyes rabs): rab tu gzhon pa'i gzhon nu gzhon sha can gnyis bsdigs shing khri // de nas gzhon nu ma krisna 'dzin sdug bsngal mang po myong ba des skad phyung ste ngu zhing pha la smras pa/ yab gcig bdag la bram ze 'di// brtse ba med par lcog mas 'adz+ra/
46a6(skyes rabs): bram ze chos dang ldan zhes gda'// 'di ni bram ze ma lags nges// gnod sbyin bram zer bsgyur nas ni// nges par bza' ba'i phyir khrid do// sha zas bdag cag khrid gyur na// yab kyis ci'i phyir yal bar dor// de nas gzhon nu dra ba can ma'i/
46b1(skyes rabs): smre sngags 'don cing smras pa/ bram ze bdag la brdeg pa 'di// de tsam sdug bsngal mi che yi// de ring yum dang ma 'jal ba// de yis bdag ni bkas pa bzhin// dka' thub nags tshal stong pa na// yum ni nges par yun ring bshums// nyon
46b2(skyes rabs): mongs bu yi sdug bsngal gyis// byi'u phrug bsad pa'i ma mo bzhin// bdag cag phyir ni nags tshal nas// rtsa ba shing rtog mang po rnams// bsnams te byon nas gnas stong 'di// gzigs nas yum ni ji ltar 'gyur// yab gcig chib
46b3(skyes rabs): rta 'di rnams dang // gleng chen shing rta gang mchis las// phyed tsam yum la phul na ni// de yis thugs ngan chung yang srid// phrin gyis yum la phyag 'tshal zhing // thugs ngan mdzad las bzlog tu gsol// yab gcig khyod dang yum
46b4(skyes rabs): de yi// zhal ni mthong bar rab tu dka'// krisnA tshur shog bdog cag 'dong // bram ze bran g.yog 'dod pa la// yab kyis bdag cag byin zin gyis// bdag cag gson yang ci zhig rung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu smre sngags 'don pa
46b5(skyes rabs): snying rje rje skad zer ba des blo rab tu bskyod byin zin pas nga 'gyod kyang ci phan snyam nas mya ngan gyi me bzlog dka' bas snying bcos te// dgu langs pas brgyal ba bzhin du sems blong blong por gyur nas de nyid du 'dug/ ser bu bsil ba'i
46b6(skyes rabs): rlung yab kyis 'du shes slar rnyed pa dang / sgra ci yang mi grag cing bu mi 'khod pa'i gnas mthong nas mgrin pa dbugs kyis brnangs bzhin du rang la rang gis smras pa/ nga'i snying bu zhes btags pa la// 'dzem dogs med par mngon
47a1(skyes rabs): sum du// mtshon gyis 'debs pa ji ltar na// bram ze ngan pa ngo ma tshe// lham yang med par rkang gis dong // rab tu gzhon pas ngal mi bzod// ji ltar lam du zhugs te dong // da ltar de yi bran g.yog byed// lam
47a2(skyes rabs): gyi ngal zhing dub pa la// su zhig de ring ngal sor 'jug/ bkres skom sdug bsngal nyen pa gnyis// bslang ba'i gnas kyang su zhig yod// bdag ni brtan par byed 'dod kyang // 'di lta bur ni sdug bsngal na// nga'i bu bde bar bskyed pa gnyis/
47a3(skyes rabs): gnas skabs ji ltar gyur cing 'khod// e ma'o bu dang bral ba yi// sdug bsngal mes ni bdag sems bsregs// dam pa rnams ni chos dran nas// su zhig rjes su 'gyod par byed// de nas med dri mi dga' ba 'byung ba'i ltas ngan pa
47a4(skyes rabs): rnams kyis yid mi dga' bar gyur bzhin du rtsu ba dang 'bras bu khyer te rab tu myur bar 'ong 'dod kyang gcan gzan khro bo rnams kyis lam chod pas ring zhig lon nas dka' thub kyi nagasu ni phyin nas// sur 'ong ran pa'i sa dang rtsed mo rtsa ba'i
47a5(skyes rabs): sa dag na yang bu gnyis mi snang ba dang rab tu mi dga' ba'i dbang du gyur to// ltas ngan byung bas dogs pa skyes par gyur// de nas bu btsal phyir ni mig kyang lta// yang yang bos te de gnyis lan med pas// mya ngan gdungs nas smre
47a6(skyes rabs): sngags 'don par gyur// bus pa smra ba'i sgra grags nags tshal 'di// sngon ni bdag la mang po tshogs bzhin snang // de gnyis mi snang de nyid de ring ni/ bdag la mgon pa bzhin du skyabs med snang // kye ma'o gzhon nu 'di nyis ci nyes
47b1(skyes rabs): kye// rtse rtse ngal nas gnyis kyis log gyur tam// nags tshal stug por brlag gam 'on te nyal// bdag 'ongs 'phyis pas ma mgu 'chus gyur tam// byis par gyur pas gang zhig gab cing 'khod// gal te de bsad mthong nas
47b2(skyes rabs): 'khrug nas ni// bya 'di kun kyang ci ste sgra mi 'byin// 'bab chu drag po rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi// chu yi gal te de gnyis khyer gyur tam// 'on kyang da ni bdag gi log par rtog pa 'di ltar ma gyur cig/ rgyal po yab slas bde legs
47b3(skyes rabs): su gyur cig/ ltas ngan mtshan ma ngan pa ston pa yang bdag gi lus la smin par gyur cig/ bdag gis snying 'di yang lhas ngan pas dga' ba ni bzlog mi dga' ba ni mun pas khebs nas gas pa bzhin gyur tam ci// bdag gi lus kyang lha
47b4(skyes rabs): tshigs 'bral ba snyam byed// phyogs rnams kyang 'khrugs pa snyam byed// nags tshal 'di yang dpal nyams shing g.yo ba snyam byed par gyur to// de nas dka' thub kyi nags kyi nang du 'ongs nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams phyogs gcig tu
47b5(skyes rabs): bzhag ste zhe sa dang bcas par khyim tha ba la bu gnyis gar mchis zhes dris// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma ni bu la byams pas snying stobs chung ba dang / mi dga' ba'i tshig brjod dka' bar shes nas de la cung zad kyang sgyu ma nus// dga'
47b6(skyes rabs): par bya rigs skye bo la// mi dga' smra ba'i me dag gis// ched kar yid ni gdung bya ba// snying rje can gyis rab tu dka'// de nas mad dris bsams pa// 'di 'di ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs nas cang mi smra ba dang sbyar na// bdag gi bu gnyis
48a1(skyes rabs): gdon mi za bar ma rungs par gyur to snyam nas// dka' thub kyi nags kun tu brtags na bu gnyis mi snang bas mchi mas brnangs nas yang smras pa/ byis pa gnyis kyang yong mi snang // khyod kyang bdag la cang mi gsung
48a2(skyes rabs): mi dgar 'gyur mi gsung bas// kyi hud bdag ni bsad kyis med// de skad ces smras nas// mya ngan gyis mes snying bsregs pas lcug ma rtsu ba nas bcad pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de 'gyel ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas bslang
48a3(skyes rabs): nas rtswa'i stan la bzhag ste chu grang mos btab nas slar sad pa dang // dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smyos pa/ byams pa'i yid kyis mi bzo de la// brtan pa med du dogs pas na// mad dri khyod la da yis ni// sdug bsngal myur du ma smras so// /
48a4(skyes rabs): rgas shing dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// nyen pa'i bram ze da gan 'ongs// de la nga yis bu gnyis byin// mya ngan ma byed spro sgyings la/ bu la ma sems nga la ltos// bu yi mya ngan gdungs snying la// mtshon gyis 'a bas pa bzhin
48a5(skyes rabs): ma byed// bslangs par gyur na srog dag kyang // mi sbyin par ni ji ltar nus// de bas nga yi sbyin pa la// bzang mo rjesu yi rang byos// mang dris de thos nas bu shir dogs te snying btsos pa las// bu gnyis gson pa'i gtam thos pas
48a6(skyes rabs): mya ngan chung ngu gyur nas khyim thab mya ngan bsad ba'i phyir mig gnyis mchi ma phyis te yo mtshan che bar bltas nas khyim thob la smras pa/ mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te ngo mtshar che'o// 'di ltar khyod kyi thugs la ni// 'jungs
48b1(skyes rabs): 'i skabs kyang ma rnyed pa// lha yi sems kyang nges par ni// ya mtshan ba'i dbang du gyur// khyod kyi grags pa'i tshig bsngangs sgra grag pa// lha'i rnga chen brdungs pa'i sgra rnams kyis// drug cha'i sgra yis phyogs rnams thams cad du/
48b2(skyes rabs): tshig 'bru gsal bas na mkha' khyab par gyur// sa bzhi ri yi nu ma g.yo ba can// 'dod chags langs pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos// gser gyi me tog rnams kyang mkha' la lhags// glog 'gyu'i 'od kyis na mkha' gsal gyur bzhin// de
48b3(skyes rabs): bas thugs ngan ma mdzad par// rtsal bas thugs ni dgyes par mdzad// 'jig rten rnams la btung chu bzhin// slan chad kyang ni sbyin bdag mdzod// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa gzhi ga yas par ri'i rgyulnga po ra rab 'grel ba dang //
48b4(skyes rabs): 'di ci zhig ces rtog pa skyes pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba ya mtshan skyes pas mig dgod pa rnams so g.yos pa'i rgyu thams cad sgrol gyi sbyin pa yin par rtogs nas sems rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan mo namaM nangs pa dang /
48b5(skyes rabs): brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas slongs mo pa 'dra bar byas te thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ong so// byang chub sems dpas blo bur 'ongs pa la bkur sti byas nas ci 'dod ces skabs phye ba dang / de la chung ma spangs so// mtsho chen
48b6(skyes rabs): dag la chu ni mi zad bzhin// pad+ma rnamams la sbyin pa'i chos mi zad // de bas lha 'dra khyod la 'phags ma slong // btsun mo 'di ni bdag la stsal ba'i rigs// byang chub sems dpa' yid mi dga' ba med pa nyid du de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas
49a1(skyes rabs): nas smyon par byas// de nas des ni lag g.yon mang dri bzung // g.yas pas ril pa bzung nas ni// de yi lag g.yas rtswal chu spyad na// 'dod m+WA ra sems nA mya ngan ma yi tshig/ de yi rang bzhin phan sems shes nus ni//
49a2(skyes rabs): sems kyang ma 'khrugs dus kyang ma ngus na// sngon med sdug bsngal khur gyis non gyur nas// de la mi tshugs lta zhing bris bzhin 'dug/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de mthong nas snying la ngo mtshar rab tu che bar gyur te sems dpa' chen po de la
49a3(skyes rabs): bstod nas smras pa// ya rabs ma rabs chos gnyis ni// e me khyad par re che ge/ bdag nyid ma sbyangs pa rnams ni// sus kyang yid chos mi nus so// 'dod chags bral bar ma gyur par// bu smad rab tu sdug po dag/ de ltar ma chags sbyin byed
49a4(skyes rabs): pa// 'di 'dra'i rlabs chen su la yod// khyod kyi yon tan chags pa'i gtam dag gis// khyod kyi grags pa phyogs su bsgrags par nges// nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'od gzhan zil mnan bzhin// gzhan gyi dpal grags zil gyis non por gyur/
49a5(skyes rabs): khyod kyi spyod pa mi las 'das// 'di la gnod sbyin dri za dang // ltos 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum la// brgya byin bcas pa yi rang 'gyur// brgya byin gyis de skad smras te// bdag gi lus 'od gsal bar 'dug pa bstan nas bdag ni brgya byin
49a6(skyes rabs): logaso zhes smras te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ zla ba btang ste zla 'od rnams// gzhan du 'gro ba'i mi rigs kyis// khyod kyi btsun mo mang dri 'di// khyod bdag nyid la bdag dbul lo// bstan pa rnams ni bslangs na stor//
49b1(skyes rabs): seng ge'i chung ma lce spyad la// byin yang de yis ci zhig bya// de ni seng ge nyid la 'os// mthon po rnams dang dman pa la// rgyal ba'i myu gu 'dra bar sems// de bas de yi spyod pa des// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// de bas bu dang 'bral bar
49b2(skyes rabs): ma sems shig/ rgyal srid nyams pa'i mya ngan ma byed cig/ khyod kyi yab ni tsha byug gnyis dang 'grogs// khyod kyi mgon byas dgon bcas rgyal srid byed// de skad ces smras nas// brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// brgya byin gyi mthus
49b3(skyes rabs): bram ze de yang byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis yul shi bir khrid de song ngo // de nas yul shi bi pa rnams dang // yul shi bi'i rgyal po kun tu rgyal bsau byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu snying rje ba shin tu bya dka' ba thos nas snying brlan
49b4(skyes rabs): par gyur te// bram ze las byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis blus nas thams cad sgrol mgu bar byas te bos nas rgyal byed du bcugo/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu rmad du byung ba yin pas de la phyogs pa'i sems can khyad
49b5(skyes rabs): par can rnams lnga brnyas pa 'am gnod pa mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags po dang bkur sti bskyod de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rab te dgu pa'o// /
49b6(skyes rabs): sa pa'i rabs kyi rgyud bam po bzhi pa// bsam pa dge ba rnams ni sdig pa byed du gzhug par bslar mi tshugs te// de bas na bsam pa dag par bya ba la 'bad par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams
50a1(skyes rabs): kyai mthu thob pa/ rgyal phran thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba// bdag dang gzhan gyi 'khor la sogs pa'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bas 'tshe ba med pa/ gdugs zla med pa/ bgo skal rim gyi rim pas thob pa'i sa skyong zhing 'dus/
50a2(skyes rabs): go zhes grag go/ dbang po'i sgra thul de ni so yi mgon// 'bras bu smin pa spyod la ma chags shing // dngos po kun gyis 'gro la phan byed pa// thub pa bzhin du chos don gcig tu byed// skye dgu rnams ni gtso bo'i rjes spyod par// 'jig rten /
50a3(skyes rabs): rang bzhin de ye shes gyur nas// skye bo rnams ni dge la gzung ba'i phyir// khyad par du ni chos la spyod par 'gyur// nor yang byin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa gnos// bzod pa bsten cing 'gro ba'i don yang byed// 'gro la phan sems mthong
50a4(skyes rabs): na zhi bar snang // gzugs can chos sprin de ni rnam par mdzes// de nas re zhig cig de'i mthus de'i yul bskyabs kyang ma phan to// sems can rnams kyi las kyi nyes pa dang / lha'i bu char 'bebs pa'i lasu bskos pa rnams bag med par
50a5(skyes rabs): gyur pa'i dbang gis// kha cig tu than pa byung bas 'khrug cing gnod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po des bsams pa// 'di ni bdag gam skye dgu rnams kyis chos legs par ma spyod pa'i lan gyis ma rung bar gyur to snyam du slong nges par
50a6(skyes rabs): gyur to// skye dgu rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa che ba dang / de'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pas chos kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par bkur ba mdunan 'don pa'i gtso bo bram ze rgan po rnams dang / blon po rnams la de las thar bar bya ba'i thabs
50b1(skyes rabs): dris so// de nas de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi cho ga rig byed las 'byung ba// srog chags du mu gsod pa// 'jigs 'jigs spyad zer byas na char legs par 'bab par 'gyur bar bsams nas cho ga de de la gsol to// rgyal po des
50b2(skyes rabs): mchod sbyin las 'byung ba'i cho ga srog chags gsod pa'i rgyur shes nas snying rje'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag gi tshig de yid la 'bab par 'gyur te// 'dul ba'i rje su mthun par de dag la ngo zlog phod pa'i tshig rtsu ba po ma smras
50b3(skyes rabs): par skabs gzhan gyi de dag gi gtam de khyad du gsod // de dag yang rgyal po de la chos kyi gtam bye ba'i skabs rnyed nas// de'i bsam pa zab cing brtag dka' ba ma shes nas// mchod sbyin bya ba'i gros 'debaso// rgyal bos
50b4(skyes rabs): bgyi ba nges pa gang lags pa// sa gzhi thob dang yongasu bskyang ba ste/ de dag khyod ni dus las 'da' mi mdzod// de dag go rims chos dang bde ba bzhin// 'khor gsum ston la mkhas par gyur pa dang // 'phangs la phan phyir sna ma ru bsnams
50b5(skyes rabs): pa ste// mchod sbyin cho ga mtho ris them skas lnga// ji ltar khyod thugs bag med dbang du gyur// khyod kyi bka' ni rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis// 'di ni dngos grub mngon du grub yin zhes// 'brangs dang 'dra bar rab tu gus mnod na// mchod sbyin de dag
50b6(skyes rabs): gis grags 'bar legs pa dag/ da ni khyod kyi mdzad pa'i dus la bab// sbyin pa mdzad cing sdom la gnas pa yis// rtag par khyod ni khyod ni dbang bkur lags gyur kyang // 'on kyang rig byed grags pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// lha yi bu lon
51a1(skyes rabs): bral bar mdzad pa'i rigs// mchod sbyin legs par bgyis pas lha mnyes na// char pa 'bab pas 'byung po mgu bar bgying // de bas 'bangs dang bdag la phan pa'i phyir// grags par 'gyur ba'i mchod sbyin cho ga mdzod//
51a2(skyes rabs): des bsams pa// kye ma'o gzhan gyi dring la 'jog cing blo chung la spyod mi nus pa// chos tsam la dga' zhing dad pa skye ba'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni shin tu ma legs par bstan to// gang na 'di ltar/ 'jig rten dag la gang la bskyabs btsal ba// de
51a3(skyes rabs): ngag gsad pas chos su 'gyur ba ni// de yis bstan pa'i skye bo lom ngan song // ngan song mi bde dog pa'i nang ni 'khod// phyugs rnams bsad pa'i chos 'gyur zhing // lha yi 'jig rten skye ba dang / lha yang mnyes par 'gyur ba dag/ ji lta/
51a4(skyes rabs): bur na spyad par 'gyur// phyugs rnams bsad pa'i bsngags kyi mthu yis ni// mtho ris 'gro phyir de bas bsad na// chos su 'gyur zhes zer ba de yang brdzun// gzhan gyis byas pas pha rol su zhig 'thob// log par spyod las yid
51a5(skyes rabs): ni ma zlog cing // dge ba'i las la nges par ma byas pa'i// phyugs rnams mchod cing bdag las bsad gyur kyang // bdag byas bzhi med ji ltar mtho ris skyo// mchod sbyin la bsang mtho ris 'gro na ni// bram ze bdag nyid phyugasu
51a6(skyes rabs): sbyar la rag/ gang phyir tshul 'di gang na'ang mi gnang bas// dera'i phyir de dag tshig ni su zhig nyan// mtshungs med mthu bsrung ro dang gzir ldan pa'i// bdud rtsi zas mchog lha mos phul ba dag/ bor nas phyugs bsad sha khrag la
51b1(skyes rabs): sogs pas// lha rnams mgu bar 'gyur ba ga la srid// rgyal po des da ni 'dir 'di ltar bya dgos so snyam du bsams nas mchod sbyin bya ba la mos pa 'dra bar byas te// de dag gis tshig de mnyan nas de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag 'di
51b2(skyes rabs): la der bdag la phan par sems pa ni bdag mgon dang bcas shing phan 'dogs pa dang ldan par gyur to// de bas na bdag ni mi stong gis mchod sbyin byed 'dod kyis ji ltar bskos pa'i blon po rnams de yi yo byad sbyor du chug shig/ bkang sa brtsig tu
51b3(skyes rabs): rung ba'i sa phyogs dang / de dang mthun pa'i tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang / sbyor ba yang rtogs shig/ de nas de la mdun na 'don gyis smras pa// 'dod pa'i don grub par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po chen po
51b4(skyes rabs): shig khrus mdzod cig dang / mchod sbyin gcig bgyis lags nas slad ma rnams rim gyis tsam mo// cig car mi stong bzung na khyod kyi 'bangs rnams gdon mo 'tshal bar yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze rnams kyis kyang
51b5(skyes rabs): de med do zhes smras so// rgyal po des de dag la smras pa/ khyed 'bangs rnams 'khrugs par 'gyur du ma dogs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang 'bangs rnams yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de nas rgyal po nges grong
51b6(skyes rabs): khyer gyi mi rnams bsdus nas smras pa/ nga ni mi steng gis mchod sbyin byed 'dod na/ nyes pa med par mi 'dod bzhin du su yang phyugasu byar ngas mi nus kyis/ de bas na deng phan chad khyed cag las gang dang gang tshul dang bka' khrims
52a1(skyes rabs): las 'gal bar byed cing nga'i bka' gcog pa de dang de dag nga'i rtog chen gyi mig bag med pa'i gnyid kyang ma log cing dri ma med pas brtag par bya'o// rang gi rigs la gnod pa dang / yul na gnod pa byed pa dag
52a2(skyes rabs): yod na ngas phyugs kyi gor gzung bar khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ de nas de dag gi nang na gtso bo rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te// de la smras pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa thams cad 'bangs la phan par gzhol// mi rje lhas mdzad de la 'gal ba
52a3(skyes rabs): ga la bgyid// khyod kyi spyod la tshangs pa'ang rjes su yi rang 'os// khyod ni legs par tshad ma'i nang na tshad ma'i mchog/ lha cig dgyes pa gang lags pa// bdag cag kun kyang de la dga'// 'o skol dgyes shing smin pa las// dgyes pa gud
52a4(skyes rabs): na gzhan ma mchis// de ltar grong khyer gyi 'bangs rnams kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan pa dang / rgyal po des blon po thugs ches pa rnams skye bo mang pos mthong bar 'gyur ba'i yo lang chen po dang bcas par ljongs dang grong khyer rnamasu sdig
52a5(skyes rabs): byed pa'i mi rnams 'dzin du bkye'o// kho ra khor yug tu yang nyin re zhing 'di skad bsgo'o// brtan zhing gtsang la tshul khrims nor ldan mi mchog la// rgyal po mi 'jigs sbyin pa mi 'jigs sbyin par mdzad// 'bangs la phan phyir tshul min
52a6(skyes rabs): byed pa'i mi rnams ni// phyugs su bsgyur ba stong gis mchod sbyin mdzad par bzhed// de bas de ring phyin chad gang zhig tshul min rjes spyod cing // rgyal po'i bka' lungs skyong blon pos bkur dang 'gal byed pa/ de ni rang gi las kyi mchod sbyin
52b1(skyes rabs): phyugs su byas gyur nas// mchod sdong lus btags gram zhing skams pa skye bos mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas yul de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis mchod sbyin gyi phyugs su bya ba'i phyir rgyal po tshul bzhin mi byed pa'i mi tshol du bcug pa dang /
52b2(skyes rabs): cin re zhing 'jigs 'jigs skad bsgo ba de thos pa dang / rgyal po'i mi rnams sdig byed pa'i mi gzung ba'i phyir thams cad du tshol zhing 'ong ba mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin par byed pa la dga' ba ni btang / tshul khrims dang sdom pa yang dag
52b3(skyes rabs): par blang ba la ni 'bad// dgrar 'dzin pa la ni phyir phyogs// gcig la gcig dga' ba dang gus par ni byed// 'thab pa dang rtsod pa ni rab tu zhi// bla ma'i ngag nyan cing rje su mthun par ni byed// bgo bsha' byed pa la ni bag tsha ba med//
52b4(skyes rabs): glo bur du 'ongs pa la ni dga'// dul ba dang gus par bya ba la ni 'bad par gyur te rdzogs ldan gyis dus bzhin du gyur to// shi bas 'jigs shing 'jig rten pha rol sems// rigs kyis nga rgyal dregs pa srung ba dang // bsam pa dag
52b5(skyes rabs): cing ngo mtshor shes pa yis// skye bo rang gi tshul khrims dri med brgyan// ji lta ji ltar skye bo ches 'bad pa// de lta de ltar srungs ma khyad par du// tshul bzhin mi byed skye bo 'chol bar gyur// de nas chos las su yang g.yos ma gyur// /
52b6(skyes rabs): rang gi yul ni de ltar gyur thos nas// rgyal po dga' ba'i khyad par brgyan pa ni// dga' ba'i gtam snyan rgya cher bsgrags pa yis// blon po mgu bar byas nas bka' stsal pa// nga ni 'bangs rnams bsrungs par rab tu sems
53a1(skyes rabs): danams na rnon pa sa gyur/ sa kya sbyin byung 'dang ces bsams nas// mtshad sbyin phyi ni na rdzas bsngags pa // gang nas bang ba bstod pa na dag yang // du skye rgyams da
53a2(skyes rabs): bdo byung // 'di ma rung mi yul na gaman // dngul ba phul nas na ni med par gyur// 'gas rnams bskyung bar sems dpa' nga 'dug cing // grogs ldan yo byad phun sum tshogs bzhin du// skyeb pangs byed nga ni sgra
53a3(skyes rabs): bzang pos// nga yi sems ni yang yang bsregs pa bzhin// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams leg s+ho snyam nas de'i tshig mnyan te// grong dang ljongs dang / gleng khyer sems cad dang / lam gyi ram sa ze'i phyogs thams cad du sbyin
53a4(skyes rabs): gtang gi khang pa brtsigs nas rgyal pos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyin re zhing phongs pa rnams ci 'dod pa'i nor gyis mgu bar byas so// de na su skye bo de dag dbul bor te// sa bdag las ni mthun par nor thub nas// rnam ma
53a5(skyes rabs): glos pa sna tshogs rgyun gyis b+h+r-irgyun// dga' sngon b+h+yo ga~Mn+da du bzang gis brgyan par gyur// phongs pa rab tu dga' bas bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal po'i grags pa phyogs su rgyas gyur pa// mtshon pong+ge ges phye ma dag/
53a6(skyes rabs): kyis bskyod de kun tu khyab pa bzhin// de ltar rgyal po'i tshul bzang yon tan gnyis// skye bo ma lus legs par spyod gyur par// dge ba chen pos gnod pa rnams kyi mthus// zil gyis mnan nas chags med zad par gyur/
53b1(skyes rabs): dus tshigs rnams kyang dus bzhin mthun par bde// rgyal po bzhin du chos la gzhol bar gyur// sa gzhi 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye bar 'gyur// chu gzhi chu gtsang sngon po pad+ma bcas// 'gro ba nad chen dag gis mi 'debs gyur//
53b2(skyes rabs): sman rnams yon tan rab tu che bar gyur// dus tshigs dbang gis ser bu'i ngad kyang ldang // bza' rnams lam ni bzang por rgyu bar gyur// gzhan gyi dmag gi 'jigs pa med par gyur// phan tshun gnod dang gnam gyi 'jigs pa
53b3(skyes rabs): 'ang med// skye bo nges par chos spyod dul gyur pas// rdzogs ldan dus bzhin phun sum tshogs par gyur// de nas rgyal pos po chos kyi mchod sbyin de ltar byas pa dang // skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngalnga dang gnod pa ni rab tu
53b4(skyes rabs): zhi bar gyur// sa gzhi ni skye bo rab tu dga' ba mang pos gang zhig mngon par mtho bar nyams dga' bar ni snang // 'jig rten pa rnams ni rgyal po'i shes par brjod pa 'ba' zhig kha ton du byed// rgyal por grags pa ni thams
53b5(skyes rabs): cad du rgyas par gyur pa dang / blon po'i gtso bo gcig rab tu dga' bar gyur nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi// dgos pa rtag tu gzigs pas na// dbang phyug rnams kyi blo dag ni//
53b6(skyes rabs): gong nas gong du spyod par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu legs par smras pa lagaso// 'di ltar lha'i zhal snga nas phyugs dgum pa'i skyon ma mchis par chos kyi mchod sbyin gyis 'bangs rnams 'jig rten gnyi ga la phan par
54a1(skyes rabs): bgyis so// gnod pa dang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar gyur to// mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te// 'bangs de dag ni skal ba dang ldan pa lagaso// zla ba bzhin du sku la krisna 'dzin ma gsol zhing // dbang
54a2(skyes rabs): bskur bsdams pas rang bzhin mdzes pa'i spyod pa yong ma zhum// spyi bo gdugs dang 'dra ba'i dbu mdzes bskyal ba de bzhin gnas// khyod kyi gtong bas brgya byin grags pa rmad byung zil gyis non// 'jig rten mchod sbyin phal cher gsod
54a3(skyes rabs): cing dman// 'bras bu 'tshal bas mchod sbyin ma lags kyi// khyod kyi mchod sbyin grags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// tshul khrims skyon med yid du 'ong dang mthun// gang na sgrub pa khyod bzhugs pa'i// skye dgu de rnams skal dang ldan// bu rnams
54a4(skyes rabs): la yang pha dag ni// nges par de ltar skyob mo 'gyur// gzhan zhig gis smras pa// sbyin zhes bya ba nor yod ster ba'i skye bo de'i dbang du gyur// tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang 'jig rten bde la chags shing mtho ris 'dod la chags// gzhan gyi don
54a5(skyes rabs): grub phyir ni de gnyis de bzhin spyod pa gang lags pa// mkhas pa ma lags sems stobs mi ljon pa la de dag yod mi mchis// de lta bas na bsam pa dag pa rnams ni sdig pa byed du gzhug par slu mi tshugs pas bsam pa dag par bya ba
54a6(skyes rabs): la 'bod par bya'o// de bas 'bangs la phan brtson pa// legs dang grags dang bde ba 'thob// de bas rgyal po'i tshul de las// 'gal bar bya ba'i yong mi rigs// de bzhin du rgyal po'i gdams ngag la yang brjod par bya'o// chos
54b1(skyes rabs): la goms par byas pa ni skye dgu rnams longs spyod che bar 'gyur bas nA// longs spyod che bar 'dod pas chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes de ltar yang sbyar bya'o// mngon par mtho ba ni sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa la gnas pas thob
