54b2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur gyi// phyugs bsad pas ni nam yang mngon par mtho bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na de 'dod pas sbyin pas sogs pa lo 'bad par bya'o zhes ngo yang sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ni sku tshe snga ma la yang 'jig rten gyi don
54b3(skyes rabs): spyod pa la thugs gzhol ba yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o// mchod sbyin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu pa'o// / sdom la stag mo shaM bi kro sal bdag/ tshong dpon gnyis
54b4(skyes rabs): dang ri bong dang // a ka ta dang sha byin dang // thams cad sgrol dang mchod sbyin byin// bdag nyid chen po rnams ni rgyad par gyur tam// dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang rung ste sems can rnams la snying rje brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur/
54b5(skyes rabs): de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas bsod nams spyod la rab tu goms shing // sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa dang snying rje la 'dris par gyur pa// gzhan la phan par spyod pa khyad par spyan la nges par spyod de re zhig
54b6(skyes rabs): cig lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur to zhes grag go/ lha dbang dpal ni de la brten bcas pas// gzi byin chen pos lhag par mdzes gyur pa// yang thog rdo thal gsal du bskus pa la// zla ba'i 'od zer byung bas gsal
55a1(skyes rabs): pa bzhin// gang phyir lha ma yin rnams tsham chom med par ni// phyogs kyi glang chen mche ba lto las zed 'ongs pa// skal pa che bas bde ba thob pa'i dpal de ni// de'i snying dregs pa'i dri ma can du byed par
55a2(skyes rabs): gyur// de'i lha'i yul dang mi'i yul legs par bskyangs pa las gyur pa'i grags pa phun sum tshogs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mtha' klas pa rma du byung ba'i dpal de lta mya yin rnams kyis ma bzod nas// glang po che dang shIng rta dang /
55a3(skyes rabs): rta pa dang / rkang thang gi dmigs bshams pa chas pa rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar snang ba// sgra 'jigs 'jigs skad sgrogs pas rgya mtsho 'khrugs par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang go cha dri med par phyis pa 'bar 'bar ltar 'dug pa/
55a4(skyes rabs): mig mi bzod pa'i dpung gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ de la dmag rgol du lhags so// chos kyi bdag nyid yin yang de la gzhan bsngo ba// rol pa'i bgegs 'gyur yid 'byung 'gro ba 'jigs par 'gyur// gzi brjid can gyis tshul bzhin
55a5(skyes rabs): bya ba'i rigs pas na// snying ni dmag drang g.yeng la mngon par phyogs par gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po de gser gyi shing rta dam pa rta bzang po stong dang sbyar ge gos bzang po 'os pas pa ngan mdzes par phyar ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/
55a6(skyes rabs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsal bar snang ba/ lus 'bar po rgyan gdags pa'i go rims nges par byas pa ngos gnyis mtshon cha rnon po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar bas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i gos dkor po can gyi steng du 'dug nas
55b1(skyes rabs): rta dang / glang po che dang // shing rta dang / rkang thang rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i dmag gi dpung chen pos yongs su bskor nas lha ma yin gyi dmag gi tshogs de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du thug par bsu'o// de nas der ni g.yul bsres pa/
55b2(skyes rabs): sngar ma rnams ni sgeg par byed// phan tshun mtshon 'debs che bar lhags// go cha rnams ni ral par gyur// nga ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du// mthong bzhin thar bar ga la 'gyur// thong zhig 'di ni med zin to// de ltar phan tshun dmyal sngor
55b3(skyes rabs): gyur// de nas mtshon cha 'khrugs pa yi// sgra chen g.yul ni bsres pa dang // rnga brdungs sgra ni grags pa yi// na mkha'i ngos ni ral pa bzhin// brag ltar 'jigs pa'i glang chen dag/ phan tshun thab mo 'gyed pa yi// rdul gyi dri ni mi bzod/
55b4(skyes rabs): pas// dus mtha'i rlung gis g.yos pa bzhin// glog ltar 'gyu ba'i ba dan can// shing rta'i sgra chen grags pa ni// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab gyur pa// sprin chen glo bur langs pa bzhin// phan tshun mda' rnams 'phangs pa yis//
55b5(skyes rabs): lha dang lha min dpa' bo dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan go tshe dang // cod pan dag ni 'gyel bar gyur// de nas lha min mongs 'phangs bdas pa dang // lha dbang dpung ni 'jigs pas byer bar gyur/ dgra yi dpung ni shing rtas rnam bcil
55b6(skyes rabs): nas// lha dbang gcig pu g.yul ngor 'then par gyur// de nas lha ma yin gyi dpung rab tu dga' bas shin tu bango bar gyur te ca tsi'i sgra chen po seng ge'i sgra chen po bzhin du sgrog pa mthong ba dang // lha'i dbang ba'i kha lo pa ma ta lis
56a1(skyes rabs): bdag cag gi dpung bros par gyur pa mthong nas// da ni slar ldog pa'i dus la bab po snyam nas lha'i dbang po'i shing rta'i slar ldog go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shing shal ma li lA nA mkha' lding
56a2(skyes rabs): gi tshangs bcas pa dag cig shing rta drangs pa'i gnye' shing gi rtse mos phyogs par 'gyur ba'i lam du bab par mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu sems snying rje la dmigs pas kha lo pa ma ta li la 'di skad ces smras// shal ma li yi shing la bye
56a3(skyes rabs): tshang dag/ bab pa'i nang na bya phrug ma tshar ba// 'khod pa 'di dag shing rti'i gnya' shing gis// phog nas mi ltung bar ni shing rta drongs// ma ta lis smras pa/ 'phags pa lha ma yin gyi dmag 'di dag nga cung slar me ldog go// brgya byin gyis smras pa//
56a4(skyes rabs): 'o na ci nyes na mkha' lding gi tshing 'di dag las legs par zur cig legs par zur cig/ ma ta lis yang smras pa// shing rta 'di ni slad du bzlog ni gdong // bya rnams la ni rab tu phan 'gyur na// lha rnams la ni gna' nas skabs brnyed pa'o//
56a5(skyes rabs): dgra yi dmag tshogs 'di dag mngon phyogs mchi// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin snying rje'i dbang gis rang gi lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can dang snying stobs kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ sems can 'jigs pas nyes pa 'di
56a6(skyes rabs): bstan phyir// smad pa'i gtam ngan phog cing gson pa bas// lha min mtshon gyis phog ste shi yang blas// de bas shing rta sma ru bzlog par byos// de nas ma ta lis de ltar bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas// de'i shing rta rta stong dang ldan pa slar ldog/
56b1(skyes rabs): dgra rnams kyis ni de'i mthu sngar mthong zhing // shing rta gA yul ngor slar log mthong ba dang // char sprin nag po rlung gis gtor ba bzhin// skrag nas rngubs bzhin rab tu mgyogs par byed// bdag gi dmag tshogs pham yang slar log cing //
56b2(skyes rabs): dgra yi dmag tshogs lam ni bkag ste 'then// gcig pur gyur kyang rab tu dpa' srid pas// dgra rnams dpa' ni rab tu gong bar gyur// lha min dpung ste pham par gyur mthong nas// lha dbang dpung yang de nas slar log gyur// lha yi dag
56b3(skyes rabs): rnams 'jigs nas byer gyur pa// de dag slar ldog phod par yong ma gyur// lha rnams dga' zhing ngo yang tsha bzhin du// lha yi bdag po la ni gsag kyang byed // rgyal ba'i dpal gyis lus mdzes mdangs gsal zhing // slas rnam
56b4(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i mkhar gyi nong du dong // de ltar de nyid de'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal bar gyur to// de bas na gsungs pa/ ngan pa rnams ni snying rje med par sdig po spyod// blo 'bring rnams ni 'phongs na snying rjer bcas shing spyod// skye bo dge ba
56b5(skyes rabs): rnams ni srog dang bral gyur kyang // rgya mtsho'o dus bzhin rang gi tshul dang 'gal mi byed// de ltar lha'i rgyal srid dang srog kyang bor te// bcom ldan 'das kyi yun ring po nas sems can yongasu bskyangs pas na shes rab can gyi de dag la
56b6(skyes rabs): 'dir ngan sems bskyed pa'i yang mi rigs na/ gnod par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos// de bas na 'phags pa rnams kyis ni srog chags rnams la snying rje dang ldan par bya ba'i rig so// de lta bas ni chos spyod pa rnams ni chos nyid srung bar byed
57a1(skyes rabs): zhes gsungs pa dang yang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o// brgya byin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gcig pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa rnams
57a2(skyes rabs): ni bdag ngo tsha ba nyid kyi spyod tshul gyi sde dus las mi 'da'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bram ze'i rigs chen po rus dang spyod pa ma smad pa// rang gi chos spyod pa'i sgra grags pa// 'dul ba dang spyod tshul bzang po zhig tu skye ba yongs su
57a3(skyes rabs): bzung bar gyur to zhes grogo/ de go rims bzhin du skyes bu'i khrus bya ba dang / skra mtshams dbye ba dang / btsas pa'i cho ga bya ba la sogs pas yongasu sbyangs nas// rig byed bslab pa'i phyir bla ma thos pa dang / rigs btsun pa dang / spyod tshul
57a4(skyes rabs): phun sum tshogs pa zhig la bcar te gnas par gyur to// de ni thos pa la lob cing 'dzin gsal dang // rang rig grags dang gus dang dul ba dang // lang tsho'i tshe yang zhi zhing chos bzang bas// de la bla ma byams shing dga' bar 'gyur// yon
57a5(skyes rabs): tan dbang du byed pa'i sngags// rtag tu mi nyams mthu dang ldan// zhe sdang 'khrugs pa'ang dbang byed na// tha mal sems lta smos ci dgos// de nas de'i mkhan po slob ma thams cad kyi ngang tshul brtag po'i phyir gsang dus dag tu bdag nyid
57a6(skyes rabs): dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rtag tu sgrog so// dbul ba 'bras bu re ba med// bdag gi mi la'ang smrar med cing // dga' ston tshe yang dga' mi myong // kye hud sbyin pa'i gtam yang gzhan// sma 'bab gnas gyur nyon mongs ngal ba'i gzhi// bde ba
57b1(skyes rabs): yongs spangs shin tu mi brjid pa// nyam nyes bzhin du rtag tu mya ngan byed// nor med gyur pa shin tu 'jig su rung // de nas de'i slob ma de dag rta bzang po lcag gis bskul ba bzhin du bla ma la byams pas mi dga' bar gyur te// bsod
57b2(skyes rabs): snyoms rab tu bzang zhing shin tu mang du blangs// des de dag la smras po/ bsod snyoms kyis su'i dbul phongs pa yang phyid par mi 'gyur gyis// khyed cag nyon mongs par byed pa 'di thong shig/ nga nyon mongs pa mi bzod na khyed kyis nor
57b3(skyes rabs): brku ba la 'bad par bya ba 'di ni rigs so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ bkres skom zan dang chu yis phyir// sman bcas sngags kyis nad sos 'gyur// rgyun gnas nor gyis dbul por 'gyur// thabs kyis nor btsal dbul ba ngor// slob ma
57b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag skal ba chung bas 'di tsam lhag par rngo mi thog na ji ltar bgyi/ gzhan yang mkhan po nor yang bsod snyoms bzhin// gal te rnyed par 'gyur na no// khyed kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'di// de ltar bdag
57b5(skyes rabs): cag ga la bzod// bram ze rnams kyi nor bsgrub tu// sla ba'i thabs ni rab tu chung // skye bo 'di yang sbyin mi phong // de bas thabs med bdag cag phung // mkhan pos smras pa/ bram ze rnams la ni nor bsgrub pa'i thebs gtsug lag las
57b6(skyes rabs): byung ba gzhan dag kyang yod na// bdag ni rgas pas mthu med par gyur te de bsgrub mi nus so// slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/ slob dpon bdag cag ni ma rgas pas mthu nyams par ma gyur na/ gal te gtsug lag las 'byung ba'i thabs
58a1(skyes rabs): de dag bdag cag gis bsgrub tu rung bar dgongs nas gsungs shig dang / bdag cag la chos 'chad pa'i drin la lan glan par bgyi'o// mkhan pos smras pa/ gzhan yang snying la rtsol mi phod pa rnams kyis ni 'di lta
58a2(skyes rabs): bu'i nor bsgrub par dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de ltar khyed dus kyi mchun legs kyis nyon cig/ nor bsgrub pa'i rim pa gcig cig yod pa de yang gang zhe na bram ze rgung tshe rku ba chos su bshad// 'jig rten na yang nor med rgud pa'i mchog med
58a3(skyes rabs): bas gzhan nor ma mthong blang bar gyis// 'di dag kun kyang bram ze'i nor yin no// ngo 'thon du ni nor 'phrog nus gyur kyang // bdag gi grags pa bsrung bar bya dgos pas// khyed cag lta bus 'di ltar byar mi rung // de bas de ltar ma mthong bsgrub/
58a4(skyes rabs): par bya// de ltar des bsdams pa lhod pa dang // slob ma de dag gis de'i tshig de mi rigs pa bzhin du de ltar bgyi'o zhes nyan te// byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ni ma gtog so// de ni rang bzhin dge bas na// de la rjes su yi mi rang //
58a5(skyes rabs): ngag gis ni ma brtags par// byar rung bzhin du khas blangaso// byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo tsha bas mgo smad de cung zad cig shugs nar gyis phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de nas de dag gi mkhan pa byang chub sems dpa' cho ga bstan pa de
58a6(skyes rabs): la dga' bar yang ma gyur/ slar ldog par yang ma gyur pa mthong nas sems dpa' chen po de la yon tan zhig yed par bsams nas/ 'di ci stsol mi phod dam/ nga la mi byams sam/ 'on te chos kyi 'du shes kyis rkun po byed du mi btub
58b1(skyes rabs): bam snyam nas de'i rang bzhin brtag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po// bram ze 'di rnams nga rgud mi bzod pas// mi rnams dpa' bo'i lam la brten par gyur// khyod ni spro ba med cing blun par mngon// nga rgud pas ni nges
58b2(skyes rabs): par ma gdungaso// nga yi sdug bsngal rgya cher rab bsgrags shing // tshig tu'ang smras pas ma bcabs bstan gyur kyang // khyod ni ji ltar mi sgrim bstan gyur nas// de ltar tha mal bzhin du smras par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas gus pa dang
58b3(skyes rabs): bcas par phyag byas te/ mkhan po la smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig/ bdag ni mi byams shing snying smra ba'i phyir bla ma'i sdug bsngal gyis ma gdungs te 'di ltar mchis pa ma lags kyi/ mkhan pos bstan po'i rim pa 'di mi srid pa'i
58b4(skyes rabs): phyir 'di ltar mtsho so// sus kyang ma mthong bar sdig pa spyad du rung ba ni gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dben pa ni mi srid pa'i slad du'o// sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa na/ 'jig rten na ni dben pa med// mi snang bar ni 'byung po
58b5(skyes rabs): rnams// mi rnams la ni lte bar byed// lha yi spyan ni phye ba yi// thub pa bdag nyid sbyangs pa rnams// de yis ma mthong dben snyam nas// byis pa sdig pa spyod la 'jug/ bdag gis gang na'ang stong pa ni// cung zad mchis par ma
58b6(skyes rabs): mthong ste// gang na gzhan dag mi snang ba// de na bdag gis stong ma lags// nyes byas gzhan gyis mthong ba dang // gang yang bdag gis mthong ba dag/ bdag gis mthong ba gang yin pa// de ni legs par mthong ba yin// bdag gi
59a1(skyes rabs): dgos pas yid ni g.yengs gyur phyir// pha rol spyod pa gzhan gyis mi mthong srid// bdag ni chags pas rtse gcig yid gyur phyir// sdig pa byed pa nges par rig par 'gyur// de'i slad du bdag da ltar mchis par gyur to// /
59a2(skyes rabs): de nas byang chub sems dpas mkhan po yid dga' bar gyur par rig nas yang smras pa/ khyod ni de ltar nor gyi phyir zhugs par// bdag gi yid la nges par mi 'dzin to// skyon yang yon tan bye brag shes gyur pa// su zhig nor phyir yon
59a3(skyes rabs): tan chud gzon byed// lha dbang phyir yang ngo tsha bor nas ni// yid la chos dang 'gal bar byed pa bas// gyo mo'o'i snod thogs gos ngan gyon nas ni// ngag yi khyim du 'byor pa mthong yang bla// de nas de'i mkhan po de'i snying rab tu dga' zhing
59a4(skyes rabs): ya mtshan du gyur nas stan las langs te de la lag pas 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu legaso legs so bram ze chen po legs so// khyod kyi shes rab rab tu zhi bas brgyan pa 'di la ni de rigs so// byis pa rnams ni mtshan ma cung zad la// /
59a5(skyes rabs): brten nas rang gi chos lam 'dor bar byed// dka' thub thos dang shes pa'i nor ldan pa// dge ba rnams ni phongs kyang mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyi rang rig dri med brgyan pra ni// ston zla shar bas na mkha' brgyun pa bzhin// khyod kyi thos pa rnams phyug
59a6(skyes rabs): dor dang ldan// nga mi 'thang ba don yod legs pa byung // de bsan skyes bungs pa rnams ni de lta bdag/ ngo ma pa nyid kyi spyid tshul gyi su las 'di ma khyod// rdo dzinan du phags pa nyin thos rnams kyi b+h+yo sha
59b1(skyes rabs): dang ldan par bya ba'i rigs// de bzhin du 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni ngo tsha shes pa'i 'obs kyis bskor bas mi dge ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngo tsha shes pa bsngags pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang / 'jig rten la dbang byed pa'i
59b2(skyes rabs): mdo sde dag l-i yang sbyar bar bya'o// bram zer skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gnyis pa'o// // skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag rang sran thub pas bstan pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzod pas gdungs kyang lam ngan par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro//
59b3(skyes rabs): de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can rnams kyis 'jig rten la phan par brtson pa de re zhig cig yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te zhes grago/
59b4(skyes rabs): chos dang 'dul ba mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin du skye dgu rnams la pha dang 'dra bar phan 'dogs nus par gyur to// nyes par spyod las rnam par zlog pa dang // yon tan 'phel la rab tu 'grod pa'i phyir// rgyal po des ni pha yi bu dga' bzhin
59b5(skyes rabs): 'jig rten gnyis dkar mi rnams dga' bar gyur// nang gi mi dang phyi mi 'dra bar snyoms// de yi bka' khrims chos dang rje su mthun// skye bo'i chos min lam ni bsgribs nas su// mtho ris lam ni tham skos rim pa bzhin// 'jig rten
59b6(skyes rabs): phan pa chos ldan des mthong nas// ma rnams skyong ba chos nyid dpa' zhig spyod// rnam pa kun tu chos kyi lam la dga'// gzhan gyi chos la gnod byas yong mi bzod// rgyal po de'i blon po chen po'i bu mo dpal mo gzugs dang ldan pa
60a1(skyes rabs): bzhin/ dga' ba mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin// lha'i bu mo bzhin gzugs dang gzi mdangs mchog dang ldan pa/ blta na rab tu sdug pa zud med rin po cher bkur ba zhig yod par gyur to// 'dod chags ma bral ba yis
60a2(skyes rabs): de yi lus// ji srid mthong bar gyur pa de srid du/ de'i gzugs dang yon tan rnams la chags// de yi lta ba bzlog par yong mi nus// de bas ni gi nyen rnams kyis kyang de'i ming myos byed ma zhes btags// de nas de'i phas rgyal po la
60a3(skyes rabs): bangs par gsol ba/ lha khyod kyi yul du bud med rin po che zhig byung bar gyur na phyag tu bzhes sam mi bzhes pa ni lha nyid mkhyen te zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal po des bud med kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i bram ze rnams la 'di cing
60a4(skyes rabs): la 'os pa yin nam ma yin khyed kyis rtogs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas bu ma deri phas bram ze de dag rang gi khyim du khrid nas myos byed ma la bzang mo khyod rang gi bram ze rnams la kha zas brims shig ces smras pa dang / bu mo ngas
60a5(skyes rabs): de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nos// bram ze rnams la go rims bzhin du kha zla brimaso// de nas bram ze de dag/ de'i gdong du mig mi 'dzum par lta// 'dod chags kyis ni brtan pa nyams par gyur// mig dang yid la dbang yang med par gyur// /
60a6(skyes rabs): 'dod chas myos nas 'du shes nyams par gyur// gang gi tshe brtan zhing mi g.yo bar 'khod pa yang mnags ma nus par gyur pa de'i tshe kha zas bza' bar lta ga la nus te/ de nas khyim bdag nges rang gi bu me de dag gi mig lam du mi
60b1(skyes rabs): snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi bram ze rnams la kha zas byims te slar bkye'o// de nas de dag gis bsams pa/ 'di ni bcos ma'i gzugs bzhin te// bu mo 'di'i byad gzugs ni yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig go sbrum+b+ha nus// 'di ni
60b2(skyes rabs): rgyal pos gzigs par yang bya ba'i mi rigs na btsun mor dbul du lta ga la rung / 'di byed bzhin bzang chos pas gdon mi za bar rgyal po de sems myos nas chos dang srid kyi don grub pa la g.yel bar 'gyur zhing / rgyal po'i don sgrub
60b3(skyes rabs): pa dus las yol bas 'bangs rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba 'byung ba'i lam chad de 'di phung bar 'gyuraro// 'di ni mthong bar gyur pa tsam gyis kyang // drang srong rnams la'ang dngos grub bgegs gyur na// 'dod chags can gyi mig
60b4(skyes rabs): lha lang tshor ldan// rgyal po bde bar gnas pa smos ci dgos// de bas na da ni dul la bab po snyam nas skabs shig tu rgyal po'i spyan sngar drong ste/ rgyal po chen po bu mo de bdag cag gis mtho nga ste/ de'i byang gzugs ni rab tu
60b5(skyes rabs): bzang na mtshan ngan te dpal dang ma ldan pa zhig legs pas rgyal po chen po 'di gzigasu yang mi rung na khab tu bgyir lte ga la rung / smad pa'i bud med khyim ni gnyis kar yang // grags pa dang ni 'byor pa med par byed// mtshan
60b6(skyes rabs): mo'i zla ba sprin rum mun pa ni// gnam sa'i bye brag mdzes pa med pa bzhin// rgyal po des de'i don thos nas bu mo de mtshan ngan ces grags pas nga'i rigs dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas de nas de la chags pa med par gyur to// /
61a1(skyes rabs): rgyal po mi bzhed par shes nas khyim bdag des bu mo de nyid kyi blon po zhig la sbyin// de nas re zhig cig rgyal po de mthar gyi bdag rang gi grong khyer na me tog ku mu da'i dga' ston bzang po byung ba lta bar 'dod nas
61a2(skyes rabs): shing rta mchog la zhon to// lam po che grong khyer gyi srang dang tshong khang phyag dar byas shing chag chag btab pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ sa'i steng thog thag me tog sil ma bkram pa/ glu gar dang / bzhad gang
61a3(skyes rabs): dang / rtsed mo dang / sil snyan sgrogs pa/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / phreng ba dang / khrus dang / byug spos kyi ngang bsung zhim po'i ngad ldang ba/ tshong zong rnam pa mang po bkram pa/ grong khyer gyi mi dar cing dga' la chas
61a4(skyes rabs): rab tu bzang ba rnams kyis gang ba'i grong khyer mchog gi nang nas song song ba las// blon po de'i khyim dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang // de nas myos byed mas bsams pa// bdag ni rgyal po 'dis mtshan ngan ces btags nas spangaso/
61a5(skyes rabs): snyam ste snying na bzhin du rgyal po lta 'dod pa 'dra bar byas nas lus byad mdzes pa bstan nas sprin gyi steng na glog 'gyu ba bzhin du yang thog gi steng na rab tu gsal bar snang bar byas te 'dug go// nga bdag lta bu mtshan ngan pa mtho/
61a6(skyes rabs): na 'odis dran pa rnam par g.yo ba dag rang gis 'dzimanas sam mi nus blta'o snyam nas// denas rgyal grong khyer gyi mchog brgyan pa lnga lta ba las// bu mo dmigs na snang por 'dug 'jig pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas rgyal
61b1(skyes rabs): po de/ pho brang gnas kyi na chung bzang mo yi// lus bzang chas pa tshim par mthong gyur cing // chos lam rjes su dga' bas ma phyar na/ dbang po thul bar byed lnga brtson gyur cing // bstan pa'i pa'i yon tan che la ngo tsha shes// gzhan gyi bud
61b2(skyes rabs): med lta la ma mos kyang // 'dod chags langs shing ya mtshan cher gyur nas// bud med de la mig gis ring zhig bltas// 'di ci ku mu da yin nam// 'on te khyim 'di yi lha yin nam// lha 'am lha min chung ma yin// 'di ni mi lus ma yin/
61b3(skyes rabs): snyam nas rgyal po des de ltar dpyod dpyod nas de la lta bas tshim par ma gyur bzhin du shing rta de phyogs de nas thal du byed pa dang yid la mi 'bab par gyur to// de nas rgyal po de'i snying stor ba bzhin du de la sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing
61b4(skyes rabs): bdag gi gnas su phyin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi brtan pa med par gyur pa dang // kha lo sbyor ba rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la gsang ste smras pa/ phyir dkar pos bskor ba yi// khyim de su'i yin khyod shes sngam/ sprin dkar steng na glog
61b5(skyes rabs): bzhin du// de nas mdzes pa su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha nyid kyi blon po oM.a b+hi pA ra ka zhes bgyi bo zhig mchis te/ khyim do ni de'i lag so// bu ma de yang de nyid kyis mchis b+h+r-ing lags te/ ki rI ta bad sa zhes
61b6(skyes rabs): bgyi ba'i bu mo myos byed ma zhes bgyi ba lags// rgyal po des de skad ces thos nas gzhan gyi chung ma yin snyam ste/ re thag bcang nas sems khong du chud cing mig rtsa dang mdangs nyams shing shugs nar zhes phyung nas// de la
62a1(skyes rabs): sems chags bzhin du dal bus bdag rang la smras pa/ e ma'o 'di ming 'di ltar btags pa 'di// don dang rjes su mthun zhing tshig kyang snyan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar myos byed ma zhes pa/ 'di ltar bdag ni myos
62a2(skyes rabs): pa bzhin du byed// de ni brjed par bdag 'dod ni// sems kyis mthong ba bzhin du gyur// bdag gi sems ni de la gnas// sems de de yi dbang du gyur// gzhan gyi chung ma yin pa la// bdag kyang de ltar mi bstan pa// de ni myos tengango
62a3(skyes rabs): tsha dang / bral ba bzhin du gnyid dang bral// de yi lus bzangs chas shing 'greng dang lta ba la// chags pas rtse gcig yid du gyur cing 'dug pa'i tshe// don sgrub go rims sbron pa'i chab chod sgra grags pa'i// tshab chod da ni nga yi sems
62a4(skyes rabs): la zhe sdang ldang // de ltar rgyal po de 'dod pas myos pa'i mthus brtan pa ni nyams// bdag rang gis mnags te bor yang mdangs ni ser skyar gyur cing lus kyang sha bri srab mor gyur/ sems khong du chud cing shugs nar zhes
62a5(skyes rabs): 'byung la/ glal yang dang yang du ni 'byung // 'dod chags kyis myos par gyur pa'i rnam pa ni rab tu mngon par gyur to// brtan pa chen pos gnags shing bsgrims byas kyang // rgyal po de yi yid ni gyur pa de// sems khong chud
62a6(skyes rabs): pa'i mig dang bzhin mdangs dang / shi bri srab mor gyur pas rab tu mngon par gyur// de nas blon po a b+hi pA ra kaM bad+ha dang mtshan ma la mkhas pa de rgyal po de de ltar gyur par shes nas/ snying nye bas rgyal po de ma rung bar gyur
62b1(skyes rabs): dogs pa dang // 'dod chags kyang mthu che bar shes nas rgyalnga po la zhus te nang du mchi bar gnang ba dang / dben par gasdang ste gsol pa/ nga nang bdag ni lha mchod bgyid pa'i tshe// gnod sbyin gcig cig mngon sum mchis nas ni//
62b2(skyes rabs): myos byed ma la rgyal po'i thugs chags pa// khyod kyis mi shes sam zhes bdag la mchi// de skad sbrams mong la mi snang gyur// bdag ni rtog pa skyes nas 'dir mchi lags// de ltar mong na lha cig 'di lta bus// ci yi slad du
62b3(skyes rabs): bdag la bka' mi sprul// de bas na lha bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bu mo 'di phyag tu bzhes pa'i rigaso// de nas rgyal po de lhas kyi bskul bas ngo tsha ste// mgo smad nas 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur kyang chos la sems
62b4(skyes rabs): rab tu goms pa'i phyir brtan pa nyams par mi 'dod pa'i tshigs gsal bas de la smras pa/ de mi rigaso// ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams nyams gyur bdag kyang mi 'chi min// bdag gi sdig 'di'ang gzhan gyis shes par
62b5(skyes rabs): gyur// de dang bral bas 'dod par gyur pa'i mes// khyod kyi sems kyang rtswa bzhin bsre rigs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka la// bdag cag gnyis la de ltar gnod pa'i las// gang phyir mi mkhas ston
62b6(skyes rabs): par byed 'gyur ba// de phyir mkhas pa bsten par yong mi byed// a b+hi pA ra kas smras pa/ lha chos dang 'gal bar dogs mi mdzad du gsol// sbyin pa bgyid pa'i grogs bgyid pas// khyod la bsod nams nyid du 'gyur/
63a1(skyes rabs): de ni bdag las ma bzhes na// sbyin pa bgegs pas chos min 'gyur// lha la bka' mchid ngan pa'i skabs kyang ma mthong ngo // ci'i slad zhe na/ 'o sgrol gnyis las ma gtogs pa// gzhan ni su zhig 'di shes
63a2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// de bas mi yi khrel 'gyur bas thugs la rigs pa ma mdzad cig/ de ltar bgyis nas bdag la sman yon btags par 'gyur gyi gnod par ni mi 'gyuraro// rje'i don du spyad pas mgu ba yis// sems la khyab par gyur
63a3(skyes rabs): nA ga la gnod// de bas thugs la bzhed pa don bcas mdzod// bdag la gnod par dogs pa khyod dam mdzod// rgyal po sa smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig/ nga la rab tu byams pa'i phyir// khyod kyis 'di ni ma brtags so//
63a4(skyes rabs): 'di ltar sbyin pa thams cadadu// chos sgrub pa'i grogs ma yin// rab tu byams pas nga yi phyir// srog kyang phangs par mi lta bas// gnyen pas lhag pa de lta bu'i// grogs po'i chung ma grogs mo yin// de bas na nga 'di
63a5(skyes rabs): ltar byeng du gzhug pa mi rigaso// gang yang 'dra gzhan sus kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de yang 'di ci sdig tu mi 'gyur ram// ma mthong bar ni sdig pa byas pa dag/ dug zos bzhin bde bar ji ltar 'gyur//
63a6(skyes rabs): lha dang rnal 'byor can gyi mi dag ni// rnam dag mig gis mi mthong mi srid do// gzhan yang / de ni khyod la mi phangs zhe 'am// de ni btang ma thag tu yang // sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes// su zhig de la yid
63b1(skyes rabs): cheng 'gyur// a b+hi pA ra kas smras pa/ bdag ni thu smad bcas par 'bangs// khyod ni bdag gi rje dang lha// de bas bran mo 'di lta la// chos dang 'gal ba ci zhig mchis// 'di bdag la phangs zhes bgyi ba de yang phangs nas phangasu pas
63b2(skyes rabs): modo// 'di ni bdag la phangs pa lags mod kyi// de'i slad du 'di ni khyod la 'bul// phangs pa byin ni tshe rabs phyi ma la// rab tu dga' zhing phangs pa thob par 'gyur// lha de bas na 'di bzhes su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar byar mi
63b3(skyes rabs): rung gis de skad ma zar cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos spyod pa las dpal ni thob gyur na// de nyid la yang gnod pa byed pa bas// bdag ni mtshon cha rnon pos btab pa 'am// me stag 'phro ba'i me nang zhugs kyang bla// a b+hi pA ra kas smras pa/ gal
63b4(skyes rabs): te 'di gzhan gyi mchis brang lags pa'i slad du lha mo bzhed na yang // 'di dag gis skye bo thams ca dkyi bau tu su rung bar smad tshong ma'i tshul 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshalo// de nas lha 'di bzhes su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod smos
63b5(skyes rabs): sam ci// skyon med chung me bor na ni// nga yis chad pa bcad nga re// smad pa'i gnasu khyod gyur na// 'di dang pha rol bsreg par 'gyur// de bas na byar mi ru ba la dus ma che bar rig pa la dga' bar gyis shig/ a b+hi pA ra kas smras pa/ khyod
63b6(skyes rabs): la bde bas bdag nyid bder gyur na// gal te chos dang 'gal bar gyur kyang rung // skye bos smad cing bde bar nyams kyang rung // de dag thams cad ldo bas bzed par bgyid// sa bdag chen po 'jig rten 'di na ni// khyod las lhag pa'i
64a1(skyes rabs): mgron mchog gzhan ma mthong // bdag gi bsod nams phyir ni myos byed ma// dus tshigs mchod pa'i phyir yod bzhin bzhes gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de la rab tu byams pa'i phyir bdag la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba/
64a2(skyes rabs): la yang mi lta bar khyod 'di ltar 'byung ba ni nga yi don du spyod pa yin pos po phyir yang khyod lkog+sa pA ru yal bar dor du mi 'dra ngo // 'jig rten pas smad pa la yang 'dzem pa med por bya bya'i sgo rigs so// ltos shig// 'jig rten spong
64a3(skyes rabs): pas 'dzem pa med pa dang // chos dang phyi ma'i 'bras bu mi lta ba// gang yin de la spro ba yid mi ches// lha dang dpal gyis rab tu spangs par 'gyur// de bas na nga khyod la nga smra'o// srog gi phyir yang chos dang ni// 'gal bar 'gyur
64a4(skyes rabs): ba dga' ma byed// nyes pa cher 'gyur gdon mi za// legs 'byung chos la rogs dang bcas// gzhan yang / dam pa rnams ni pha rol smad la sogs// sdug bsngal byas nas pha rol bde mi sgrub// de bas ngas ni gcig la'ang mi gnod//
64a5(skyes rabs): par// chosau la gnas nas bdag gi don sgrub bo// a b+hi pA ra kas smras pa/ rje'i don du gus pa'i dbang gis spyad pa 'di la bdag chos ma lags pa'i skabs ci zhig mchis/ 'di bdag gi phul pa lhas bzhes pa la yang nongs pa
64a6(skyes rabs): ci mchis/ de'i slad du yul shi bi pa'i mi ljongs kyi mi dang bcas pas kyang 'di la chos mi legs par spang gangag su ci zhig mchis// de bsan lha 'di ban su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ni nga'i don du spyad pa la rab tu gan
64b1(skyes rabs): bar nges mod kyi 'di la 'u bu cug gnyis dang / yul shrI bi pa'i mi ljongs kyi mi dang bcas pa'i nang na su chos shes pa'i mchog yin pa 'di ni dpyad dgos so// de nas a b+hi pA rakas gus pa dang bcas par rgyal po lnga smras pa/ rgan pa bste/
64b2(skyes rabs): bskur bya ba byas pa dang // thos pa mang zhing blo yang rno ba dang // 'khor gsum don gyi de nyid rig pa ni// lha cig khyod dang bdag po che la mchis// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bas na 'di la nga bslu ba'i mi rigs so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
64b3(skyes rabs): rten pa la phan dang gnod pa ni// rgyal po rnams kyi spyod la rag lus te/ de bas 'bangs rnams snying nye bsams nas ni// gtam snyan 'byung ba'i lam gyi mchog la dga'// khyu mchog 'gro ba drang ngam yo ba bzhin// rjes su 'gro/
64b4(skyes rabs): ba'i ba rnams dogs mad cing // 'khrul pa med par rjes su 'brang ba bzhin// 'bangs kyang de bzhin rgyal po'i rjesu 'brang // gzhan yang khyod ltos shig/ nga bdag rang yang bsrung bar ni// gang tshe nus par ma gyur na// de'i tshe nga yi bsrung
64b5(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i// skye bo rnams ni ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar 'bangs lha phan par lta ba dang // bdag gi chos dang grags pa dri med la// bltas ni sems kyi dbang du du mi 'gro/ khyu mchog bzhin du nga ni 'bangs kyi mgon// de nas blon po a
64b6(skyes rabs): b+hi ba ra ka rgyal pos sran btsugs pa des mgu nas rgyal po la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ gang rnams srung ba rgyal po khyod bzhugs pa// e ma'o 'bangs rnams phun sum tshogs// chos la dgyes shing bde
65a1(skyes rabs): la ma chags pa// de lta bu ni dka' thub nags na'ang dkon// rgyal po chen po chen po'i sgra// 'di ni rgyal po khyod la mdzes// yon tan med la yon tan brjod// smad cing rtsub pa'i tshig tu gyur// rgya mtsho rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin
65a2(skyes rabs): yon tan 'byung gnas khyod lags pas// khyod ni de ltar zhir gyur pa// de la ngo mtshar cher mi 'dzin// de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams// bdag rang sran thub pas brtan pa dang / chos kyi 'du shes rab tu goms par byas pa'i phyir sdug bsngal
65a3(skyes rabs): mi bzad pas gdungs kyang lam ngan par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na sran thub par bya ba dang / chos la goms par bya ba la brtson par bya'o// myos byed ma'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gsum pa'o// // skyes pa rabs
65a4(skyes rabs): kyi rgyud bam po lnga pA/ chos la gnas na bden pa'i tshig tsam gyis kyang mA rang bar 'gyur ba las thar bar 'gyur na de'i 'bras bu lta smyos kyang ci dgaso// de bas na chos kyi rje su 'jug par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems
65a5(skyes rabs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo rab tu rno ba glu'i kha lo sgyur ba zhig tu gyur to zhes grago/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyi shes rab rno bas btsug lag khyad par can gong dang gang slob par 'dod pa dang / sgyu rtsal
65a6(skyes rabs): khyad par can gang dang gang slob par 'dod pa de dang / de dag la shes rab rno zhing skye bo gnas pas lhag par gyur to// bdag nyid chen po de skar ma rgyu ba la mkhas pas phyogs kyi bye brag la blo ma rmongs shing // nar ma dang glo po bur du
65b1(skyes rabs): 'byung ba'i lhas shes la// mtshan ma la mkhas shing dus dang ma yin pa'i go rims la mkhas pas nya dang chu'i kha dog dang / sa'i bye brag dang / bya dang ri dgas la sogs pa'i mtshan mas rgya mtsho'i phyogs ni legs par rtogs/ dran
65b2(skyes rabs): pa dang ldan zhing le lo dang gnyid ni chung grang ba dang tshwa ba dang char 'bab pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal la ni ci mi snyam/ bag che lo bstan pa dang ni ldan// drang ba dang bzlog pa la sogs pa mkhas po'i phyir tshong pa rnams 'dod pa'i
65b3(skyes rabs): yul du phyin par byed pa zhig tu gyur to// de 'gro ba'i don rab tu sgrub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ming yang legs par pha rol tu phyin par byed pa zhes bya'o// de gnas pa'i yul gyi ming yang legs par pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gragaso// deng
65b4(skyes rabs): sang ni spr-i pa ra zhes bya'o// de la rab tu bkra shis pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir rgas par gyur kyang rgya mtshor 'dong pa'i tshong po don grub par 'dod pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa dang bkur sti cher byos te gru bo che'i nang du
65b5(skyes rabs): 'jog par byed// de nas re zhig cig yul b+hA ru kang tsha nas tshong pa gser gling du 'dong ba don grub par 'dod pa dag cig yul legs par pha rol tu phyin par lhag nas sems dpa' chen po de gru bo che'i nang du gzhug pa'i phyir
65b6(skyes rabs): gsol ba btib bo// des de dag la smras pa/ rgas pa'i dbang gis lta ba nyams gyur cing // zho sha chung bas dran pa rab tu nyams// bdag gi lus kyi bya ba'ang nyam chung na// bdag la grogs byar re ba ga la srid// tshong pa rnams//
66a1(skyes rabs): kyis smras pa/ khyod kyi lus kyi gnas skabs ci 'dra ba bdag cag gis 'tshal te/ khyod la drag shul spyod pa'i mthu mchis su lags kyang bdag cag ni khyod la phrin las bgyi bar mi gsol gyi// gzhan du na/ khyod kyi
66a2(skyes rabs): zhabs ni pad+ma la brten pa'i// rdul g+hi glu 'di bkra shis ldan gyur na// mtsho yi nang nas rab tu bgrod dka' yang // bde bar thar 'gyur slad du bdag cag mchis// de nas bdag nyid chen po de de dag la snying rtse ba'i phyir rgas pas lus shig
66a3(skyes rabs): shig por gyur du zin kyang gru bo tshe de'i nang du zhugs so// di gI'i nang du zhugs pa dang tshong pa de dag thams cad kyis bsams pa/ da ni gdon mi za bar bdag cag don gyi mchog 'grub par 'gyuraro snyam nas sems rab tu dga' bar gyur
66a4(skyes rabs): to// de nas mthar gyi rgya mchi chen po nya'i rogs rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ chu rlabs can gyi sgra chen po grag pa// rlung gi bskyod pa'i chu rlabs mang po gnyer ba// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sa'i kha dog gi khyad par myang
66a5(skyes rabs): pos mdog bsgyur ba/ dbu ba sbrengs pas me tog gi phreng ba bzhin du mdzes par byas pa/ lha ma yin dang klu mchog rnams kyi gnasu gyur pa/ gting dpag dka' ba chu tshad med pa'i nang du zhugaso// de nas an+d+ra rnyil gyi 'od ltar
66a6(skyes rabs): sngo// nyi ma'i ci 'od kyis gnam sngon bzhu ba bzhin// kho ra khor yug chu 'gram ltar mi snang // gting dpag dka' ba'i mtsho 'dzings nang du zhugs// de nas de dag der phyin pa dang / phyi dro'i dus su nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni
66b1(skyes rabs): chung ngu gyur// glo bur du ltas ngan chen po rab tu 'jig su rung ba zhig byung ba dang // rlabs ni rnam par 'khrug cing dbu ma 'thor// drag pa'i rlung gis skyong ba'i 'jigs sku 'byin// chu kun tha mal 'dug las rab tu g.yos// rgya mtsho de

66b6(skyes rabs): pa rnam par ston// de nas tshong pa de dag rlung dang chu'i shugs kyis bdas pa'i gru bo ches g.yengs nas nyin zhag du mar yang chu'i 'gram ma mthong zhing // rgya mtsho'i mtshan ma ji ltar 'dod pa yang ma mthong //
67a1(skyes rabs): lA/ rgya mtsho'i mtshan ma sngon ma mthong ba sha stag mthong bas phyi phyir zhing sems mi dga' la/ jigs shing bag tshwa bas ci bya gtol med par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' legs par bya
67a2(skyes rabs): rol tu phyin pas de dag sgro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa rnams lo ltos ngan glo bur du byung bas 'khrugs shing nyon mongs par gyur pa 'di lta bu ngo mtshar mi ches/ khyed cag bag che bar ma byed cig/ zhum pas phongs
67a3(skyes rabs): las thor la mi phan gyis// de nas mu ngan+da gdus par ma byed par// dgos pa'i don sgrub mkhas la brten byas na// rab tu dka' ba'ang sla mas thar bar 'gyur// de bas 'jigs shing mi dga' ma byed par// ji ltar bya ba'i thang
67a4(skyes rabs): kyis dgos pa sgrub// mkhas pa'i gzi brjid brten pas gzong bstod nas// don rnams thams cad 'grub pa lags na yod// de ltar bdag nyid chen po des tshang ba de dag sems brtan par byas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram

67b5(skyes rabs): tu ring du chus khyer bas shin tu dka'o// 'o mA'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ste// 'di ni zho phreng rgyu mtsho yin// gal+yA te bzlog par nus na ni// 'di las thal te 'gror mi rlung // tshong ba rnams kyis smras pa// gru bo tshe rab tu mgyogs pa dang // rlung yang drag
67b6(skyes rabs): tu langs pas gru dal bus gtang bar yang mi nus na// slar bzlog pa lta ga la nus// de nas rgya mtsho yang 'das pa dang // yang rgya mtsho gzhan zhig rlabs kyi phreng ba rab tu 'khrug pa gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// chu'i mdog me 'bar ba 'dra ba
68a1(skyes rabs): mthong nas/ tshong pa de dag ya mtshan dang ngo mtshar cher gyur te legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la dris pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i kha dog 'dra ba la// sngon po ma yin chu rlabs gnam du brgal// me chen rab tu 'bar ba 'dra ba yi// mtsho 'di'i ming
68a2(skyes rabs): ci 'di ltar ci las gyur// legs par pha rol tu phyin pas smras pa// 'di ltar snang ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// me yi phreng ba zhes grags te// de bas 'di las bzlog nus ni// khyed la rab tu legs par 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid chen po des ming tsam zhig bstan/
68a3(skyes rabs): nas rgyang ring du lta bas chu'i kha dog gyur pa'i gtan tshigs ni ma bstan no// de nas yang tshong pa de dag rgya mtshad las kyang phal ba dang / yang rgya mtsho gzhan chu'i kha dog rin po che sbur len dang / an+da rnyil gyi mdog kyang 'dra la// rtswa ku sha
68a4(skyes rabs): smin pa'i kha dog kyang 'dra ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la dris pa/ ku sa smin pa'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mdog/ drag tu langs pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa'i rlabs// dbu pa bkram pa me tog bcas pa bzhin// 'di ltar gda'

68a6(skyes rabs): ba'i chu 'bab pa// bdag cag dga' ba 'phrog par byed// de nas tshong ba de dag gis rab tu 'bad kyang gru bo che bzlog ma nus nas// rgya mtsho de las thal te// chu mdog sngon po smyig ma'i mdog dang bai DUr+ya'i 'od 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho gzhan zhig mthong nas
68b1(skyes rabs): legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la dris pa// rin chen ma rgad mdog ltar sngo ba'i chu// ne'u sing sngon po mdzes pa bzhin du 'bab// ku mu dA dang 'dra ba'i dbu bas brgyan// de ltar gda' ba'i rgya mtsho 'di gang lags// de nas bdag nyid chen po do

68b3(skyes rabs): bu'i phreng // tshong pa de dag gis de skad thos nas mi dga' zhing sems ni zhum// lus kyi tshogs ni shig shig por gyur shugs nar zhes 'byin pa tsamra la brten cing de nyid du chems shes 'khod do// rgya mtsho de las kyang thal nas phyi dro'i dus la
68b4(skyes rabs): bab cing nyi ma'i 'od zer je chung je chung ngu gyur te// nyi ma yang rgya mtsho'i nang du nub par 'gyur ba 'dra// rgya mtsho yang bla 'og bzlog pa 'dra zhing // rgya mtsho'i chu yang ser ba drag po 'bab pa dang // smyig mi'i tshal mes tshig te tog yar gyis 'gengs
68b5(skyes rabs): pa dang 'dra bar sgra che zhing rab tu 'jigs par byed pa thos par gyur to// de thos nas kyang rab tu skrag cing snying 'dar bzhin du la gor du langs nas kun tu bltas nas chu'i 'dzings chen po de dag ga yangs dang gcong rong gi nang du 'bab par 'dra ba
68b6(skyes rabs): mthong ngo // de lta bu mthong nas rab tu blong blong por gyur te// legs par pha rol tu phyin pa'i drung du lhags nas smras pa// bdag cag rna ba gas shing snying yang 'jigs pas dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur/ chu yi bdag po khros pa 'dra ba'i sgra
69a1(skyes rabs): 'di rgyang ring nas kyang grag/ chu 'di thams cad gcong rong 'jigs pa'i nang du mdun na 'bab pa 'dra// rgya mtsho 'di 'dra ci lags khyod kyang 'di la ci ltar bgyi bar dgongs// de nas bdag nyid chen po do r+N+Na ba rtsub por gyur/
69a2(skyes rabs): nus// e ma'o mtshar byas mtshar byas zhes smras te// rgya mtsho la bltas nas yang smras pa// gang du phyin na slar mi ldog/ 'chi bdag khar ni mngon song bzhin// bdag cag ma rangs gyur gyis med// rgya mtsho'i glong ni 'di yin no//

69a4(skyes rabs): 'bod// kha cig ci yang byed ma nus// kha cig skrag nas sems kyang stor// phongs par gyur pa'i yid kyis rab bskul nas// kha cig lha dbang gus par phyag kyang 'tshal// kha cig nyi ma tha skar drug po dang // nor lha rgya mtsho nyid la skyabs
69a5(skyes rabs): su dong // la la dag ni gsang sngags bzlas brjod byed// gzhan dag lha mo nyid la phyag 'tshal gyur// legs pa rA pha rol phyin la kha cig gis// drung du 'ongs nas bskor te smre sngags bton// phongs par gyur la 'jigs pa med byed pa// /

70b1(skyes rabs): yin pas khyed gdon mi za bar rnyed pa grub par 'gyur ro// legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la yid dga' zhing gus par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i gling rnams las// de dag gi bye ma dang rdo ba yin snyam pa'i blos b+heDUr+ya la sogs
70b2(skyes rabs): pa rin po che rnams blangs nas gru bo che'i nang du brdzangaso// de nyid kyi mtshan mo la gr-i dri yul b+ha ru kad tshar phyin to// de nas nang par dngul dang an+da rnyil// baiDUr+ya dang gser gyi glu bkang ste// de dge bdag yul chu 'gram phyin gyur nas//

70b5(skyes rabs): bcu bzhi pa'o// // tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams ni tshe 'dri nyid la yang dge ba'i bsam pa grub par 'gyur na tshe rabs gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgoso// de bas na tshul khrims rnam par dag po la 'bad par
70b6(skyes rabs): bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i re zhig cig mtsho mi che ba me tog ka la ltar dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la rnams kyis chu bzang pos brgyan pa/ ngang pa dang / bya ka lan+ta ka dang / ngur pa shugs
71a1(skyes rabs): tu 'grogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa// chu 'gram na shing ljon pa dang / me tog mang po yod pa zhig na nya'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur to zhes grago// tshe rabs mang por gzhan gyi don spyad pa la goms par byas
71a2(skyes rabs): pas de na gnas pa'i tshe yang gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba byed po 'ba' zhig tu gyur to// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams goms byas na// mi rnams la ni 'dris pa nyid du gyur// de lta bu dang ched du ma bsgribs kyang // tshe rabs gzhon la rmyi
71a3(skyes rabs): lam bzhin du spyod// sems dpa' chen po de nyid rnams la bdag gi bu sdug pa bu rnams la byams pa bzhin du sbyin pa dang tshig 'jam po dang / don spyod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rab tu phan 'dogs par gyur to// phan tshun gnod pa byed
71a4(skyes rabs): la sa rab tu zlog/ gcig la gcig ni byams pa rab tu bskyed// thabs la mkhas shing rim pas de dag lo// nywa yi chos tshul rab tu brjod par byed// de yis de dag legs par bsgyangs pasna na// nya rigs de dag rab tu dang bar
71a5(skyes rabs): gyur// mi yi bdag po tshul bzhin spyod pa yis// 'bangs rnams bskyungs pa gnod pa med pa bzhin// de nas re zhig cig sems can rnams bskal po med par gyur pa dang / char 'bebs pa'i lha'i sgra rnams bag med par gyur pas
71a6(skyes rabs): chatshar legs par ma bab par gyur to// de ltar char legs par ma bab pa dang mchod me tog rgyas pa dkar po dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas sngon bzhin du gang bar ma gyur to// de nas rim gyis dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang // ngal zhing le
71b1(skyes rabs): lo'i dbang gis dbul bar gyur pa 'dra ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer rno zhing tsha bas sa gzhi mngon par gdungs zhing 'bar bar gyur pa'i rjesu 'brang ba'i rlung skom pa'i dbang gis bsil bar 'dod pas nyin re zhing 'thungs pa bzhin du mtsho do lteng ka bzhin du gyur
71b2(skyes rabs): to// dpyid kyi dus kyi nyi ma 'bar ba dang // 'bar ba'i rjes 'brang rlung ni drag po dang // rims nad gdungs 'bra ri sa gzhi tsha ba yis// khros pa bzhin du chu ni bskams par byas// de nas byang chub sems dpas nya mang mo rnams khwa rnams kyis
71b3(skyes rabs): kyang glags lta bar gyur na chu 'gram rgya ba'i bya rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dpa' grong zhing mi dga' ba'i dbang du mi gyur// cung zad 'gul nus pa tsam la bltas nas snying rje bzhin du bsams pa/ kye hud kye nya 'di rnams ni ma rungs
71b4(skyes rabs): par gyur gyis med do snyam nas/ chu ya nga nyin ra bri bar 'gyur// tshe zad pa dang 'gran pa bzhin// char sprin 'du bar gyur pa yang // nga cung rab tu dka' pa 'dra// bros te 'dod pa'i lam yang med// gzhan du khyer ba 'ang su yang med// bdag/
71b5(skyes rabs): cag brlag par dga' ba yi// nged kyi dgra yang de'u re 'ong // chu yi lhag ma 'di skams na// gdon mi za bar g.yo bzhin yang // bdag gi mngon sum mthong bzhin du// dgra rnams kyis ni zos yang dag/ de la 'dir ji ltar byas na rung snyam
71b6(skyes rabs): du bdag nyid chen po des rnam par brtags na// bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'ba' zhig gis phongs pa la phan thogs par mthong ngo // snying rjes kyang sems gdungs pas shugs nar zhes phyung ste gnam du bltas nas smras pa/ rab tu phongs par
72a1(skyes rabs): gyur kyang bdag gis ni// bsams bzhin srog chags bsad pa mi dran te// bden pa 'dis ni lha yi rgyal po rnams// char pa 'bebs shing mtsho ni gang bar gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po de yis bsod nams bsags pa'i yon
72a2(skyes rabs): tAtan+da dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang // de la dga' bar gyur pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi mthus ras ma yin pa'i sprin chus gang ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra snyan pa zab mo ni sgrog/ glog 'gyu bas nI brgyan// sprin mgo sngon
72a3(skyes rabs): po rgya chen po rab tu phro bo ni kha glal ba bzhin/ sprin gyis rtse mo phan tshun 'dus pa ni log pas 'khyud pa 'dra ba sprin nag po rnams byung bar gyur to// nag po'i sprin rnams ri ba'o gri bi ma bzhin// phyogs kyi thag gu'i tshad ni 'jom pa 'dra// sprin
72a4(skyes rabs): mgo nag pos mun nug sbal ba bzhin// me long nang bzhin na mkha'i dkyil na mdzes// rma bya rab dga' ze ba 'brel pa rnams// glu gar mdzes pas rab tu bstod pa bzhin// sprin tshogs de dag dpa' bo dgod pa bzhin// rgyun chags zab mo
72a5(skyes rabs): sgra 'byin rnam par mdzes// de yis char bab mu tIg gtor ba bzhin// chu rgyun bab pas rdulo rnams rab tu zhi// char sprin langs pa'i rlung gis rnams bskyod pas// sa gzhi dri zhim dad kyis khyab par gyur// dpyid kyi dus la bab pas rnam spel kyang
72a6(skyes rabs): nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba med par gyur// dbu ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pas bskor ba yi// chu rnams shong bu dma' bar 'bab par gyur// 'brug gi rnga sgros rab tu dgar gyur nas// glog phran 'gyu ba bro gar byed pa bzhin// yang dang yang du gser
72b1(skyes rabs): 'od gsal ba yi// 'od zer phreng bas phyogs rnams khyab par gyur// de nas char pa'i rgyun mdog sgyu bo kun tu khyab par bab pas mcho gang bar gyur te// char gyi rgyun bab ma thag tu bya khru la sogs pa bya mang po rnams ni byer/ nya mang po rnams ni
72b2(skyes rabs): gson du re ba'i bsams pa grub cing rab tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying rab tu dga' bar gyur kyang char chad dogs nas yang char sprin la smras pa/ tshar sprin 'brug sgra zabo cing brtan pa sgrogaso// khA rnams rab tu dag
72b3(skyes rabs): ba med par mdzod// glog rgyun 'bar ba rgyu ba'i 'od zer bzhin// tshar po'i rgyun rnams rin chen 'dra ba pho ba// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas yid la ya mtshan rab tu che bar gyur te// de'i drung du mngon sum du 'ongs nas mgu bar
72b4(skyes rabs): byas te smras pa/ char sprin 'brug sgra snyan pa rab sgrog cing // bum pa btud pa bzhin du gang 'bab pa// 'di ni nya dbang mthu chen khyod nyid kyi// bden pa khyad par can gyi mthu yin te// 'jig rten don la brtson par gyur pa'i yid// skyes bu khyod
72b5(skyes rabs): lta bu yi spyod pa la// dam grogs bya ba bdag gis ma byas pas// bdag gis bag med 'khrul pa mtshar cig byas// skyes bu dam pa'i grogs ni bdag bgyid kyis// de ring slan chad de ltar khyod ma dgongs// yul phyogs 'di yang khyod
72b6(skyes rabs): kyi yon tan bzhis// slan chad 'di ltar phongs par yang mi 'gyur// de ltar tshig snyan pas mgu bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// mtsho de yang chus gang zhing rab tu 'byor par gyur to// de ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams//
73a1(skyes rabs): ni tshe 'di nyid la yang dge ba'i bsam pa 'grub par gyur na rabs gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la 'byung bar bya'o// nya'i skyes pa'i rlabs te bcwo lnga pa'o//
73a2(skyes rabs): bden pa'i tshig bsgom na me yang 'da' byur byed mi nus// de bas nA bden pa'i tshig la brtson par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa'i gnas shig na// bya sreg pa'i drug gu zhig tu gyur to zhes grago/ de yang sgo nga'i
73a3(skyes rabs): sbubs nas byung nas zhag grangs mang po ni mau lon// spu gsar pa ni gdod skye// rab tu rid pas yan lag dang // nying lag gi phyogs rnams ni gsal bar mngon// pha ma gnyis kyi rtse dang ldum bu stug po'i nang du tshad bcas pa'i nang na// phrug
73a4(skyes rabs): gu mang po'i spu dang lha cig tu 'khod do// de lta bu'i gnas skabs na yang chos kyi 'du shes ma nyams pa'i phyir pha ma gnyis kyis nyod par srog chags khyer te 'ongs pa ni zar mi btub kyi// gang rtswa'i sa bon dang shing n+ya gro de'i 'bras bu
73a5(skyes rabs): khyer te 'ongs pa de 'ba' zhig za ste/ pha ma gnyis kyis kyang de 'ba' zhig gis gso so// de kha zas rtsub cing chung ba des lus rtas par ma gyur cing 'dab shog kyang ma rdzogaso// bya sres pa'i phrug gu gzhan rnams ni kho zas ci 'ongs pa
73a6(skyes rabs): zos pas mthu che shing 'dab shog rnams kyang rgyas par gyur to// 'di ni chos nyid yin te// 'di ltar chos dang chos min mi 'jim zhing // thams cad za ba bde bar gnas// chos dang ldan pa'i tshul 'dod na// cho ga'i zas za bzhin du sdug
73b1(skyes rabs): bcom ldan 'das kyis cadad+ma// ngo rgya mi shes pa ni bde bar 'tshar zhes tshigs bcad pa gnyis gsungs te// de yang 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i gzhung las 'byung ba/ brkam zhing bya rog ltar dpa' ba// nga tsha med pa lags par 'am/
73b2(skyes rabs): brnab cing spyi brtol che ba yi// 'tsho ba shin tu nyon mongs ldan// rtag tu skyon med tshol ba dang // zhum zhing bgra dang bcas pa dang // 'tsho ba skyon med lta ba dang // ngo tsha shes pa'i 'tsho mi bde// de dag gis gnas dang mi ring ba zhig nA
73b3(skyes rabs): nags tshalo me chen pos tshig ste// 'jig su rung ba'i sgra ni 'u 'ur zer// dungad pa'i tshogs ni 'khyil me lce g.yo ba khrigs shing me stag ni rnam par 'phro// nags tshal na rgyu ba rnams ni skrag par byed pa// nags tshal stug po rnams ni
73b4(skyes rabs): 'jigs par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de ni rlung gis bskyod pas rnam par 'phro// me lce 'khrug pa'i ldeg pa gar mdzesu byed// dud pa 'khrigs pa'i sgra ni gsig pa bzhin// sgra dang bcas pas de dag 'jigs pa bskyed// drag
73b5(skyes rabs): pa'i rlung gis bskyod pas rab tu g.yos// nags tshil rtswa rnams 'jigs pa nyen pa 'dra// me de rngam pa bzhin du mngon par 'ongs// mye stag 'phro ba mang pos khyab par sreg/ bya tsho gas mang po skrag nas rab tu 'byer// ri dgas
73b6(skyes rabs): 'jigs pas dkyo zhing kun tu 'bros// dud pa'i nang na me sgra drag po grag/ de yis skrag nas nags tshal ngu ba 'dra// me de rlung drag pos bdas pas gnod pa bzhin du rtswa stug po la ched nas de dag gi tshad dang nye bar 'ongs// de nas
74a1(skyes rabs): sreg pa'i phrug gu 'jigs shing skrag pa'i 'khrug pa'i sgra mi snyan pa 'byin cing gcig la gcig mi lta bar rtabs bzhin du 'phur skye dong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni nyam chung ba dang 'dab shog ma rdzogs pas
74a2(skyes rabs): 'phur bar ma stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bdag gi mthu stobs shes pas ma 'khrul pa nyid du med de brtsan thabs su 'ongs pa 'dra ba la tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ bdag gi rkang pa ming don med cing 'dab ma med//
74a3(skyes rabs): bdag gi pha ma gnyis kyang khyod kyis skrag nas byer// khyod la 'gron byar rung ba'ang 'di na ci yang med// de bas me khyod 'di nas slar ni ldog pa'i rigs// sems dpa' chen po des bden pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i tshig gis de skad smras
74a4(skyes rabs): pa dang / rtswa rnams tshang tshing skam po 'dab chags la// me de rlung gi rab tu sbar gyur kyang // 'bab chu klung chen 'brug dang phrad pa bzhi ni// de yi tshig de thos ma thag tu zhi// deng sang du yang gangs ri khrod nas sa phyogs der// dgon
74a5(skyes rabs): pa'i me lce rlung gis bskyod de dgod pa yang // mgo mangs sbrul ni sngags kyi btab ste bzlog pa bzhin// me lce g.yo ba del zhing zhi bar 'gyur zhes grag/ ci'i phyir 'di bstan ce na smras pa// rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs rab tu g.yo ba'i
74a6(skyes rabs): gdengs can dang // bdag la phan 'dod thub dbang bstan pa'i bo slab pa bzhin// bden pa'i bdag nyid can gyis gang dag bsgo ba na// me yang mi 'dar de bas bden pa mi btang ngo // de ltar bden pa yongasu bsoms pa'i tshig ni
74b1(skyes rabs): med kyang 'da' bar mi nus te/ de bas na bden pa'i tshig la brtson par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o// bya sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu drug pa'o// // chang 'thung ba ni
74b2(skyes rabs): nyes pa du ma 'byung zhing shin tu ma 'dus par 'gyur ba'i phyir dag pa rnams ni gzhan dag kyang 'di las bzlog par byed na bdag nyid lta smos kyang ci dgos// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po yongasu bsgoms pa'i blo can//
74b3(skyes rabs): gzhan la phan zhing bde ba byed pa la dga' ba// sbyin pa dang dul ba dang zhi ba la sogs pas bsod nams spel ba nyim su len pa de ro zhig cig lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur to zhes grag/ de lha'i longs spyod kyi bde ba rnams phun
74b4(skyes rabs): sum tshogs kyang snying rje'i dbang du gyur kyang 'jig rten gyi don bya ba la brtson pa lhong par ma gyur to// 'jig rten yongs kyis phal cher dpal ldan na// chang gis myos bzhin bdag gi don kyang 'dor// bag yod rnams ni gzhan gyi
74b5(skyes rabs): don la yang / lha dbang dpal dang ldan yang des mi myos// sdug bsngal mang pos gdungs pa'i sems can la// gnyen bshes sdug pa rnams la byams pa bzhin// brtan zhing dpal gyis rang bzhin shes pa na// de ni gzhan gyi
74b6(skyes rabs): don spyod yong mi brjed// de nas re zhig bdag nyid chen po ngo mo yi 'jig rten nyul ba'i tshe snying brtse ba dang byams shing mthu che ba'i mig gis mthong ba ni thams cad kyi mdza' bo zhes bya ba'i rgyal po zhig mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
75a1(skyes rabs): la brten pa'i skyon gyis blon po dang 'brangs su bcas par chad 'thung ba lnga dga' byar gyur te// de la skyon du yang myi lta bar gyur pA la// chung 'thung ba yang skyon che bar mthong nas bdag nyid chen po de snyid rje chen
75a2(skyes rabs): pos snying mi dga' bar gyur te bsams pa// kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di dag ni rab tu ma rungs par gyur cing 'khod do snyam nas// 'thung na thog mar rab tu zhim// skyon du lta ba rmongs por 'gyur// legs par 'gyur pa med par byas//
75a3(skyes rabs): log pa'i lam ni bzang po bzhin// de la 'dir ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa dang // mthong ba yod do snyam nus// gtso bor gyur pa rnam pa gang spyod pa// skye bo rnams kyang de yi rjesu 'jug/ de bas 'dir ni rgyal po nyid bcos na// 'jig
75a4(skyes rabs): rten dag na dge sdig de las 'byung de ltar rnam par nges par byas nas sems dpa' chen po do gser btso ma'i mdog ltar yid du 'ong ba// skye'i thor tshugs cung zad rtsub pa khyil ba can// shing gi shun pags pa dang / ri dgas a d+hi
75a5(skyes rabs): na'i pags pa gyon pa// tshangs pa'i lus gzi byin dang ldan pa zhig tu mngon par sprul nas// chang gis gang ba'i bum pa ha cang mi che ba zhig ni ljags pa g.yon pa ni thogs te 'ongs pa dang / de nas thams cad kyi mdza' bo'i rgyal po
75a6(skyes rabs): 'khor gyi nang du 'dus te// chang dang sbrang chang dang / bu ram shing gi chang dang / chang ba cos ma dang / rkun chang gi gtam gyi skabs gleng bslang ba'i tshe mdun gyi na mkha' la byung ste 'dug par gyur to// de nas skye bo de dag ngo mtshor che
75b1(skyes rabs): zhing rab tu gus pas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rim gro skyed pa dang // char spyon 'brug sgra zab mo'i sgra 'byin pa bzhin du gsang bstod de smras pa/ me tog phreng ba mgul nA bkod// mgrin pa man chad rab tu gang // bum pa rgyan gyis
75b2(skyes rabs): brgyan pa yi// bum pa 'di ni su nyo 'dod// me tog phreng pos gdu bu btags pa bzhin// bum pa'i kha rgyan ldum bus brgyan pa dag/ rlung gis bskyod pas rab tu g.yo ba yi// bum pa 'di ni rim gyi su nyo 'dod// de nas de la rgyal po dA ya
75b3(skyes rabs): mtshon dang ngo mtshar cher gyur te rab tu gus par lta zhing thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ gzi chen nyi ma 'char 'dra mdzes pa zla ba bzhin// khyod kyi sku tshe thub po 'ga' zhig lags pas gda'// de nas 'jig rten kun gyis 'tshal bar gsung ba yi//
75b4(skyes rabs): khyod kyi yon tan mtshar cig mchis par bdag cag re// brgya byin gyi sgras bA/ nga ni su yin phyis kyang shes 'gyur gyis// khyed cag 'jig rten gzhan la mi 'jigs shing // tshe 'di la yang brlag pas mi 'jigs na// bum pa 'di ni nga las
75b5(skyes rabs): nyonye bar gyis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ e ma'o khyod kyi tshong zong gcod pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba zhog go// 'jig rten na ni tshong zong rnams// ga la na yang yon tan brjod// nyes pa'i skyon ni bcab pa yin// tshong zong btsong ba de ltar grags/
75b6(skyes rabs): brdzun du smra bas 'jigs pa rnams// khyod lta bu yi tshul 'dzin te// dge ba rnams ni bden pa dag/ phongs par gyur kyang mi btong na// bum pa 'di ni ci yi gang // khe spogs tshon po ci yod na// khyod lta bu yang nged la tshong // bdag nyid
76a1(skyes rabs): chen po de smros shig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gson cig/ 'di ni chu dang zho dang dar ba 'am mu stegs chu yi gang ba min// ge sar dri zhim khu ba'i chang dang mar gyis gang ba'ang ma yin la/ ku mu dang sprin med zla 'od 'dra
76a2(skyes rabs): ba'i 'o mas gang ba'ang min// sdig pa'i rang bzhin can gyis gang ba'i bum pa 'di yi yon tan nyon/ gang zhig 'thungs na ra ro song nas gom pa dbang med 'dor zhing 'gro/ yul phyogs ma 'dris par yang 'khyam zhing rtag chos dran pa nyams
76a3(skyes rabs): par gyur// bza' dang mi bza' dpyad pa med par de dang de dag zar 'gyur ba/ de dang de yis rab tu gang ba'i bum pa thang shal 'di nyos shig/ gang gis bdag gi sems la dbang med blo nyams rnam par 'khyam/ phyug dang 'dra bar blun
76a4(skyes rabs): cing dgra bos 'phyangs kyang byas par 'gyur// gang gis mdun sbyar ger byed 'gyur zhing rang gi 'khar rnga brdung // dge ba med pa bum pa'i chang 'di khyed kyi nyo ba'i rigs// 'thungs na gang gis bdag gi ngo tsha 'os par 'dor// gos dang bral
76a5(skyes rabs): zhing gcer bur byung yang mi dgar med// grong khyer skye bo mang po'o lam du yid rton 'gro/ bum pa 'dir ni btsong bar 'os pa 'dir blugaso// gang mthungs na ni skyugs pa'i zas kyis gos 'gyur zhing // khyi yis kha yang dogs pa med par
76a6(skyes rabs): bldags par 'gyur// dran pa med par lam po chen 'ang nyal bar 'gyur// btsong na brim pa de ni bum pa 'dir blugaso// gang zhig 'thungs na myos te dbang med pa'ir// pha ma dag kyang shing la 'ching bar byed// nor gyi bdag po dag kyang khyad du
76b1(skyes rabs): gsod// phan rlag de ni bum pa 'dir blug so// gang zhig 'thungs na myos pa dran rlag ste/ 'dri na an+d+ra dag kyang dam byung nas// dbyug chen thogs te/ phan tshun thal mar phyung // myos 'gyur 'di ni bum pa 'dir blugaso// gang la tshugs na dpal
76b2(skyes rabs): gyi gzhir gyur rigs// je mtho je mthor 'gyur ba'ang brlag par 'gyur// nor gyi dbyig ldan rigs kyang phyung 'gyur ba// gtsang rgyu 'di ni bum pa 'di na 'dug/ blo bur ngu zhing 'dug la dgod cing ma nges smra// gdon gyis zin pa bzhin du
76b3(skyes rabs): mig ni mchi mas gang // smad cing brnyas par 'gyur ba'i gnasu nges par 'gyur/ blo nyams 'gyur pa de ni bum pa 'di na yod// rgas par gyur kyang gang gis sems nyams shing // bdag la phan pa'i lam du mi 'jug la/ ma brtags
76b4(skyes rabs): mang du smra bar nges 'gyur ba// gcod rgyu 'di ni bum pa 'di na yod// gang gi bre bas sngon gyi lha rnams myos// lha'i rgyal pos dpal ni nyams byas nas// skyabs 'dod phyir ni rgya mtsho'i nang du gab// de yis gang ba'i bum pa 'di nyos shig/
76b5(skyes rabs): mi bden pa yang mi bden bzhin du ngo so na smra// mi bya ba yang bya ba bzhin du dga' bzhin byed// gang gi len gyis yod med phyin ci log tu shos// de ni dri mod pa'i lus bzhin bum pa 'di na 'dug/ myos 'gyur rig sngags sdug bsngal
76b6(skyes rabs): rgyur 'gyur ba// sdig pa'i ma mo byung ngan mngon sumo bzhin// rtsod pa'i lam dang tha dad ma yin pa// snying gi mun pa mi bzad de nyos shig/ gang gis bla ni rab tu nyams gyur nas// pha ma nyes pa med pa'ang gsod 'gyur zhing // bde la
77a1(skyes rabs): ma chags dka' thub can yang gsod// gcong ba'i cho gas rgyal la phul ba zhes// mi yi bdag po chung 'di de 'dra yang // 'jig rten na ni lha zhes rab tu grags// yon tan la ni gang dag mi dga' ba// de dag chang 'di nyo
77a2(skyes rabs): lnga 'bad par gyis// gang zhig bsten na ngan pa spyod par 'gyur// rab tu 'jigs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung // dud 'gro'i gnas dang yi dgas dbul 'gyur ba// mthong bar 'dod pa'ang de ni su zhig yod// chang de nyung ngu 'thungs kyang rnam par
77a3(skyes rabs): smin pa ni// mi yi gnas su skyes kyang tshul khrims lta ba nyams// gang gis phyis kyang mnar me 'bar bas sreg par 'gro// yi dwags yul dang dud 'gro dman par 'gyur// tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur zhing gtam ngan mngon du 'byung // ngo tsha
77a4(skyes rabs): med cing blo gros dri ma can du 'gyur// gang zhig 'thungs na yon tAn de dang de dag nyams// de bas rgyal po khyod kyi chang btung gA la rigs// de nas rgyal po de snying la 'bab pa'i tshig rnams kyis chang 'thung ba'i nyes pa khong du chud par byas pa dang //
77a5(skyes rabs): chang 'thung ba la ma chags shing zhen pa med par gyur nas brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// byams pa'i pha ma 'am dul bas nye byas bla ma bzhin// tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa'i thub pas smras pa bzhin// khyod kyis bdag la phani phyir legs
77a6(skyes rabs): bar gdams pa de// spyod pas nyam su blangs te tshul bzhin mnyes par bgyi'o// legs par smras pa'i lam du mchod po 'di dag las khyod kyis bzhes pa'i rigaso// yul gru chen po lnga yang khyod la dbul// bran mo brgya dang ba bzhon
77b1(skyes rabs): lnga brgya dngul// rta mchog sbyar ba'i shing rta 'di bcu bzhes// bdag gi bla ma phan pa ston par gyur// gzhan yang bdag gis gang dang gang bgyi ba 'dir spring zhing spyan chad kyang badrug la spyan ras kyis btsa rA gsol// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ yul gu
77b2(skyes rabs): mchog la sogs pa nga mi 'dod// lha dbang yin na rgyal pos shes par byos// lha dbang dpal yang nga la dgos pa med// phan par smra la mchod par bya ba ni// bsgo ba'i tshig bzhi nyam su len pa yin// grag sgo dang dpal gyi lam ni 'di
77b3(skyes rabs): yin te// tshe rabs gzhan la bde ba de yang 'thob// de bas chang la chags pa rab spong la// chos la gnas pas nga yi yul la bsten// de skad ces smras nas/ brgya byin de nyid mi snang bar gyur to// rgyal po de yang blon po dang 'bangs su
77b4(skyes rabs): bcas par chang mi 'thung bar gyur to// de ltar na chang 'thung ba ni nyes pa du ma 'byung zhing shin tu ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dge ba rnams ni gzhan dag kyang 'di las zlog par byed bdag nyid lta smos kyang ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das de tshe rabs
77b5(skyes rabs): snga ma la yang 'jig rten la phan pa 'ba' zhig mdzad pa'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o// bum pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu bdun pa'o// / khyim ni gnas pa ni tshul
77b6(skyes rabs): khrims kyi gnyen por 'gyur zhing gnod pa'i phyir bdag la phan par 'dod pa rnams kyi khyim na gnas pa yongs su gtong ngo // de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' re zhig cig rgyal rigs phyug po'i rigs 'tsho ba'i tshul dang spyod pa
78a1(skyes rabs): phun sum tshogs pa/ tshe rigs mthon po la dga' ba rnams kyis gnyen bya bar gsol ba btab pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi re ba'i gnasu gyur pa/ bang mdzod rnams ni gnyen bshes dang thun mong du spyod pa/
78a2(skyes rabs): phongs shing slong ba rnams ni mngon par 'khor ba// lag bzo rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i gnasu gyur pa/ dpal gyi gzhir gyur pa/ rgyal pos bkur sti bya zhing phan gdags par gyur pa/ 'jig rten pas mngon par bkur ba'i khyim zhig tu
78a3(skyes rabs): skyes par gyur to// zhes grago// de'i rim gyis nar son par gyur pa dang 'jig rten pas bsngags pa'i rig pa'i gnas rnams ni bslabs// sgyu rtsal gyi thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la ni blo gsal bar gyur/ lus byad bzang po skye b.rI mig
78a4(skyes rabs): tu sdug pa dang chos dang mi 'gal bar 'jig rten gyi tshul la mkhas pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi nang mi bzhin du snying la chags par 'gyur to// nang mi rnams ni nang mi zhes// lhag par dga' bar 'gyur ba med// phyi mi rnams
78a5(skyes rabs): kyang phyi mi zhes// nang mi dag kyang gzhan du min// skyon dang yon tan la brtags nas// nang mi 'am yang ni phyi mi'ang rung // 'jig rten ni ni bkur sti dang // smad par bya ba'i lngasu 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po do sngon rab tu byung ba
78a6(skyes rabs): la goms par byas pas// khyim na gnas pa tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang // chos dang 'gal bar rab tu shes gyur cing // dka' thub nag tshal bde 'byung gnas rig nas// khyim gyi bde la yid ni chags ma gyur// de pha ma gnyis tshe
78b1(skyes rabs): 'das pas snying mi dga' bar gyur te/ khyim rdzas dang dbyig brgya stong du ma yod pa lnga yang gnyen bshes dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la ji ltar rigs par byin nas rab tu byung bar gyur to//
78b2(skyes rabs): de rim gyis glong dang ljongs dang pho brang 'khor du rgyu zhing song song ba las// grong khyer zhig tu brten te nags tshal gyi gnas shig tu gnas par gyur to// de bsam gtan gyi yon tan la goms pas tshul bcos pa ma yin par dbang
78b3(skyes rabs): po rang bzhin gyis drang ba dang / ma khengs pa dang / rnyed pa lnga re ba'i brkam pa dang zhum pa med pa dang / dul zhing gzi byin che ba dang // ji ltar rigs par 'jam por smra zhing gsol ba dang // chos dang chos ma yin pa rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas
78b4(skyes rabs): pa dang / rna ba dang snying tshim par byed pa'i tshig mkhas pa yin par mngon par smra ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i spyod tshul bzang po dang / ya rlabs rnams dga' ba'i spyod pas de na yang rab tu grags par gyur to// skye bo rtog spyod can rnams
78b5(skyes rabs): kyis kyang de tshe rigs btsun pa las rab tu byung bar shes nas// de na 'jig gi rten pa rnams kyi bkuri tshor byas par gyur to// rigs dang gzugs kyi yon tan las// yon tan rab tu brjid par 'gyuraro// sa gzhi rab tu bzang
78b6(skyes rabs): po la// zla ba'i 'od zer shar ba bzhin// de nas der 'ongs par de'i pha'i mdzara' bos shes nas de'i drung du 'ongs te yon tan brjod cing gus par nad dris nas// de la bdag de'i pha'i mdza' bo yin par yang shes par byas te gtam
79a1(skyes rabs): gyi gleng bslangs nas de la tshig 'jam por smras pa/ na tshod 'di tsam la tshe rigs la yang mI lta bar 'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni btsun pa khyod kyis mi brtan pa bzhin du byaso// khyim na 'dug gam dgon par
79a2(skyes rabs): song yang rung // legs par sgrub pas chos ni mnyes 'gyur na// khyim bzang dpal dang ldan pa bor nas ni// ci'i phyir khyod blo dgon par dga' bar gyur// gzhan gyi dring la bltos shing slong mo spyod// ngan pa bzhin du skye bo
79a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis smad// ngan pa'i gos gyon gnyen bshes rnams dang bral// bas mtha'i sa na lus ni bsgyur te bor// dbul ba'i lus ni nye bar blangs pa bzhin// khyod kyi gnas skabs 'di la bltas ni ni// dgu yi mig kyang
79a4(skyes rabs): mchi mas gang 'gyur na// mya ngan dbang du ji ltar ma gyur kye// de bas khyod kyi pha yi khyim du song // thos pa'i don ni khyod kyis yod par byos// bu mchog khyod kyis der ni gnas bcas nas// chos dang yid la bsams
79a5(skyes rabs): pa grub par gyis// 'jig rten na yang 'di skad du glags te// gzhan gyi las byed po dag kyang // bdag gi khyim ni re gnas bde// 'byor pa'i dpal ni 'bar 'gyur pa// bde ba thob pa smos ci dgos// de nas byang chub
79a6(skyes rabs): sems dpa' dben pa na gnas pa bde ba'i bdud rtsis blo goms par byas pas snying de la gzhol bar gyur pa// khyim na gnas pa dang nags tshal na gnas pa'i bye brag shes par gyur pa/ lto 'drangs zin pa la kha zas kyi
79b1(skyes rabs): gtam zer ba yid du mi 'ongs pa bzhin du 'dod pa la stobs pa yid du mi 'ongs par gyur nas smras pa/ khyod kyi tshig 'di byams pa yis// smras pas nyes pa chung mod kyis// brtson ra 'dra ba'i khyim la ni// nams kyang bde bar ma
79b2(skyes rabs): sems shig/ phyag gam yang na dbul yang rung // khyim na gnas pa nad du che// gcig ni bsrung bas nyon mongs la// gnyis pa tshol bas sha thang ngo // phyug gam yang na dbul yang rung // gang yang bde ba med gyur pa// de la dga'
79b3(skyes rabs): bar rmongs pa ni// sdig pa'i 'bras bu smin pa nyid// khyim na gnas pas kyang chos 'di brnyes par byar ru zhes gang zer ba de yang khyim ni chos kyi snying po dang / 'dom pa dang / las su bya ba mang ches pas rab tu dka'o// khyod ltos
79b4(skyes rabs): shig khyim gyi son me bya na ni// brdzun du mi smrar mi rung zhing // pha rol nyes pa byed pa la// nan tur mi byar mi rung ngo // de lta bas na skye bo 'di dag khyim gyi bde ba la snying chags nas de sgrub pa la 'bad pa ni// gal te chos spyad khyim
79b5(skyes rabs): gyi so nam 'chor// khyim la phyogs na chos kyang ga la 'grub// chos kyi lam ni rab tu zhi ba yin// khyim gyi don ni drag shul can gyis 'grub// de bas chos dang 'gal ba'i skyon yod phyir// bdag la phan 'dod su zhig khyim na/
79b6(skyes rabs): gnas// chos ni bde la chags pa spong ba yin// bde ba 'grub pa'ang nges par yod ma yin// gdon mi za bar grags pa med par 'gyur// yid la gdung ba skye zhing ngan 'gror ltung // de bas chos dang 'gal ba bde ba'i thabs//
80a1(skyes rabs): tshul la mkhas pa rnams ni mi sgrub bo// gzhan yang khyim na gnas pa bde'o zhes bya ba 'di yang dad pas yid ches par bya ba yin par bdag gis ma mthong ngo // bsgrub cing bsrung la sogs par sdug bsngal des// bcing zhing
80a2(skyes rabs): bsad pa'i sdug bsngal gzhir gyur pa// rgyal po dag kyang 'byor pas mchog mi shis// 'bab chu 'bab pas rgya mtsho mi gang bzhin// yongs su rtog pa'i dbang du ma gyur na// 'di la ji ltar nam zhig ga la bde// rmongs pas 'dod chags nye bar spyod pa
80a3(skyes rabs): yang / rma g.ya' phrugs pa'i bde ba bzhin du zad// gzhan yang phal cher ni 'di lta bu yino// khyim ni 'byor na phal cher rgyags par 'gyur// rigs btsun nga rgyal che zhing stobs kyis snyems// sdug lnga khro zhing rgud na zhum par 'gyur// de na nam
80a4(skyes rabs): zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// de bas nA 'dir btsun pa khyod la gdam ngag tu bya ba ni// dregs dang nga rgyal gauti mug sbrul gyi tshang // rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bde 'jig pa// sdug bsngal mi bzad med po'i gnas gyur khyim// khung dang 'dra bar
80a5(skyes rabs): su zhig gnas par byed// skye bo tshogs shes rnams kyi khyim// rab tu bde po dben pa'i tshul// ji ltar sems ni dag 'gyur ba// de 'dra lta mi yul na'ang med// de bas tshal ni ngan pa'i gos gyon te// gzhan gyi ring la 'jog cing mtsho yang
80a6(skyes rabs): rung // bdag la phan 'dod drug can mi za bzhin// chos min 'dres pa'i bde ba mi 'dong ngo // de ltar ngos yid 'ong ba'i tshig gis pa'i mdza' bo yid ches par byas pa dang / sems dpa' chen po de la rab tu gus shing bkur sti bya ba khyad par can
80b1(skyes rabs): gyis rab tu mgu bar byas// de lta bas khyim na gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang rab tu zhi ba'i gnyen por gyur pa la gnod pa yin pas bdag la phan par 'dod pa yongasu gtong ngo // rab tu dben pa'i ro myong na 'dod pa las slar ldog go zhes rab tu dbye
80b2(skyes rabs): ba'i gtam bya ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ rgyal rigs phyug po'i skyes pa'i rabs te bco brgyad pa'o// / skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud bam po drug pa/ rab tu dben pa'i bde bI ro myongs pa rnams ni 'dod pa la 'phyes kyi gnas dang gnod pa
80b3(skyes rabs): lta bur mi mthun par semaso// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' re zhig cig bram ze'i rigs chen po yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas pa/ 'phyas su bya ba'i skyon med pa zhig tu skyes par gyur to zhes glago/ de la nu bo drug cig yod pa de yang
80b4(skyes rabs): de'i gzugs dang yon tan dang mthun pa dang / byamos shing gus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba dag cig dang sring mo dang bdun 'khod pa las// de ni rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa dang nye ba'i rig byed dang bcas pa ni lobs// ma
80b5(skyes rabs): pa'i grags pa ni thob// skye bo rnams kyis ni bkur sti byas// pha ma gnyis la ni lce bzhin du rab tu gus par bsnyen bkur byed// nu bo de rnams la ni slob dpon dang pha bzhin du rig pa slob cing sbyong / tshul dang 'dul ba la mkhas par byas nas
80b6(skyes rabs): khyim na gnas// de yun ring zhig na pha ma gnyis dus byas pa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las// pha ma gnyis kyi shing byas zin te mya ngan byed pa'i nyin zhag 'das pa dang / nu bo de dag bsogs nas/ yun ring lhan cig 'khod 'khod kyang /
81a1(skyes rabs): 'chi bas so sor 'bral 'gyur zhing // mya ngan chen pos gdungs 'gyur ba// de ni 'jig rten 'di na nges// bdag ni khyim la chags bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dgra yis de'u res bsad// de bas phan pa'i lam bzang pos// bdag
81a2(skyes rabs): ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod// de bas na khyed thams cad shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khyim 'di na chos kyi lam gyi rnyed pa'i longs spyod tsam yod de// 'dis 'tsho ba 'byor gyis// de bas na khyed kun phan tshun byams pa dang bkur sti ni byed// tshul khrims
81a3(skyes rabs): dang gtsang sbra spyad pa la ni 'bad// rig byed slob pa la ni 'grus// mdza' bo dang mgron dang banyen bshes dang slong ba rnams ni re thag mi gcod// chos la ni gzhol bar byas la khyim na legs par 'khod cig/ 'dul ba la ni rtag tu 'bad// kha
81a4(skyes rabs): ton slob pa dog la 'grus// sbyin pa logs par rab sbyin zhing // khyim gyi dka' thub spyad par gyis// de ltar spyad na khyed la grags pa 'phel// chos dang srid dang bde ba'ang rab tu 'phel// 'jig rten phyi ma la yang phan par 'gyur// de bas
81a5(skyes rabs): bag yod khyim na gnas par gyis// de nas de'i nu bo rnams kyis de rab tu 'byung zhes zer ba thos nas bral du dogs pa'i mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ mya ngan gyi mchi mas gdong khebs bzhin du phyag 'tshal te de la 'di skad ces
81a6(skyes rabs): smras so// bdag cag pha ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyi drug rngu'i rma ma sos par sdug bsngal gzhan gyis bsnun te/ khyod kyis 'dir rma dkrug pa'i mi rigaso// pha ma'i mya ngan zug rngung chung ngu// bdag cag yid la rma ni ma sos bzhin/
81b1(skyes rabs): de bas brtan pa'i blo can 'di btang legs// bdag cag rma ni 'jigs par ma mdzad cig/ 'on te khyim na gnas par mi bzhed la// nags tshal gnas pa bde ba'i lam lags na// bdag cag mgon med khyim du bor nasu// ji ltar
81b2(skyes rabs): gcig pu nugasu gzhung par dgyes// de bas na khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag cag kyang mchi ste bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ dben par gnas la ma goms shing // 'dod la
81b3(skyes rabs): chags pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// skye bo phal tshor rab 'byung la// g.yang sar lhung ba bzhin du lta// de bas nA khyim na gnas pa dang nags tshal ni gnas pa'i bye brag shos bzhin du rab tu 'byung ba la gnas par bdag gi tshe du
81b4(skyes rabs): mA smra so// de ltar khyed rab tu 'byung 'dod na 'u bu tsan cag rab tu 'byung gis 'deng ngo // de nas spun bdun po de dag dang sring mo brgyad car gyis khyim gyis longs spyod chen po bzang po dang / mdza'o dang / nang mi dang / nye du'i 'khor gdong
81b5(skyes rabs): mchi mas gang ba rnams bor te dka' thub can du rab tu byung ngo // de dag gi grogs po gcig dang bran pho dang bran mo snying nye ba zhig kyang de'i phyi bzhin du rab tu byung ngo // de dag dgon pa'i gnas chen po zhigra na mtsho chen po me tog pad+ma
81b6(skyes rabs): mang po kha bye ba mdzes pa ni 'bar ba bzhin/ me tog ku mu dmang po khe 'bus pa ni dgod pa bzhin// bung ba mang po ni der dir zer// chu gtsang ma sngon pos ni gang ba zhig gi 'gram du brten nas shing lo'i spyil po rab tu gtsang zhing
82a1(skyes rabs): yid du 'ong ba/ grib shing gis bsgribs pa/ so so so sor bar mi nye bar byas pa rnams su brtul zhugs dang sdom pa la 'bad cing yid bsam gtan la sbyor bas gnas par gyur to// zhag lnga zhing lnga zhing byang
82a2(skyes rabs): chub sems dpa'i drung du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de yang de dag la bsam gtan gyi man ngag la 'jug par 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs ston pa skyo zhing yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ rab tu dben pa dang chog shes
82a3(skyes rabs): pa'i bsngags pa mang du 'byung ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang gtsam sgyu dang le lo la sogs pa'i skyon la smod/ nye bar zhi ba dang rab tu dang ba'i lam du gyur pa'i tshe kyi gtam de dang de dag zer to// de dag gi bran mo de yang rab tu gus shing snying
82a4(skyes rabs): nye bas de bzhin du g.yog byed do// des mtsho de'i nang nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba bton te pad+ma'i lo mo chen po la mtsho 'gram gtsung mA cha mnyam par bkod nas tog brdungs pa'i sgras dus bstan te slar song ngo // de nas drang srong de dag bzlas brjod
82a5(skyes rabs): drang sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas zin nas rgan rim gyis re re nas song ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba cher bgos te bzhag pa de las go rims bzhin du re re nas blangs nas rang rang gi shing lo'i spyil par cho ga bzhin du zos te bsam gtan la brtson
82a6(skyes rabs): pa'i blos gnaso// de dag de ltar 'khod pa na chos nyan pa'i dus ma gtogs par gcig la gcig ltar mi 'dong ngo // de dag de ltar tshul khrims dang spyod tshul de lta bu dang / rab tu dben pa la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la gan
82b1(skyes rabs): pas grags pa cher gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de thos nas de brtag pa'i phyir der song ngo // des kyang de dag bsam gtan la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang ma 'brel zhing gdung ba med la rab tu zhi ba mngon par dga' zhing
82b2(skyes rabs): 'khod par mthong nas yon tan rab tu brtan pa yod par re zhing brtag pa la yid gzhol bar gyur to// rtsol ba med parU bas mtha' na// zhi lo rab tu gzhol zhing 'khod// dge ba rnams nI ye ni tAn la// re ba snying la 'jog par byed//
82b3(skyes rabs): de nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba glang po che'i phrug gu'i mche ba ltar dkar la 'jam pa rnams bton te dkrus nas pad+ma'i lo ma sngon po rin po che mar gang 'dra ba gtsang ma pad+ma'i me tog 'dab ma dang ze ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la cha mnyam par bkod nas
82b4(skyes rabs): rtog brdungs pa'i sgras drang srong de dag la dus bstan te/ bran mo de slar song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de brtag pa'i phyir lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i cha dang po mi snang bar byas so// sdug bsngal byung bar gyur pa dang / bde
82b5(skyes rabs): ba med par gyur gyi rlung // dge de rnams kyi bstan pa'i rgyu// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du mngon// de nas byang chub sems dopa song song nA cha dang po'i gnas ni pad+ma'i rtsa ba ni med// pad+ma'i lo mya ni rgyu ni 'khrugs shing 'dug pa sna thong nas
82b6(skyes rabs): bdag gi pad+ma'i rtse ba'i skal ba gcig gis khyer ros po ste/ sems 'khrug pa dang khro ba med par de slar log nas shing lo spyil por zhugs te/ bsam gtan gyi cho ga tshul bzhin du rtso mo// drang srong gzhan rnams snying mi dag
83a1(skyes rabs): bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir don de ma smras// de'i nu bo gzhan gyi snying lam na 'dis rang gi skal ba nges par blangs grang snyam nas/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skal ba blangs nas rang rang gi lo ma'i spyil por
83a2(skyes rabs): zos te bsam gtan byed cing 'khod do// de bzhin du zhag gnyis pa dang // gsum pa dang khazhi pa dang / zhag lnga pa'i bar du yang de'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skal pa brgya byin gyis mi snang bar byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83a3(skyes rabs): chen po dro yang de bzhin du sems 'khrug pa med cing rab tu zhi bar gyur to// dam pa rnams ni sems 'khrugs pas tshe zad nas ni shi yang bla/ de bas mkhas pa srog phyir yang / yid ni 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// de nas phyi dro'o dus
83a4(skyes rabs): la bab ste drang srong de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i shing lo'u spyil por go rims bzhin du lhags pa dang / de'i lus ni rab tu ring / 'gram pa dang mig ni klong / bzhin gyi mdangs ni ngan// skad kyi gdangos zab mo
83a5(skyes rabs): ni chung / nyam dmas kyang brtan pa dang rabau tu zhi ba'i yon tan zla ba tshos pa mthong na dag pa dang 'dri ba mthong ba dang / nye bar bsnyen nas zhes bskyed de brtabs bzhin du 'di ci nongs zhes rid par gyur par rgyu de la dris//
83a6(skyes rabs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la de'i don ji ltar gyur pa smras// de nas dka' thub can de dag 'di lta bu chos ma yin pa mi srid do snyam nas/ de nya mo thag pas kyang mi dga' bar gyur te mtshar byas zhes gi cig la gcig smras
