83b1(skyes rabs): nas ngo tsha zhing mgo smad de 'khod do// shes pa 'jug pa'i yul yang brgya byin gyis mthus bsgribs pas 'di ci las gyur pa yang nges par ma gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i nu bo 'og mas rang gi yid la bcags pa dang / bdag nyid gtsang
83b2(skyes rabs): bar bstan pa'i phyir mna' khyad par can bor ba/ bram ze khyod kyis rtsa ba sus khyer ba// 'byor pa'i mtshan mas brgyan pa'i khyim dag dang / chung ma yid du 'ong ba'i rnyed par shog/ bu dang tsha bo rnams dang ldan par shog/ de'i 'og mas smras
83b3(skyes rabs): pa/ bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba// phreng ba do shal tson dan gos bzang dang // bu yis reg pa'i rgyan rnams thogs pa yi// 'dod pa mi zad pa la spyod par shog/ yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyed kyi rtsa ba gang gis khyer ba de// zhing
83b4(skyes rabs): rmos pa las nor dang gos rnyed cing / bu dang smra bskya rab tu dga' bar gyur// tshe la'ang mi lha khyim na dga' bar gyur// yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba bskam pas gang khyer ba// rgyal po bran bzhin dul bar spyod pa yi// gtsug
83b5(skyes rabs): tor btud pas rab tu phyag byas shing / rgyal po'i tshul gyi ma lus sa skyong gyur// yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba/ de ni rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyur te// sngags la sogs pas bde legs byed gyur cing //
83b6(skyes rabs): de bzhin rgyal pos bkur sti bya bar shog/ yang gcig gis smras pa// rtsa ba 'dod cing yon tan mi 'dod pa// rig byed legs par lobs nas ston par byed// dka' thub can du re ba chen po yis// yul mi kun gyis de la mchod
84a1(skyes rabs): par shog/ grogs pos smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtsu ba la ma chags gang // yul gru dam pa 'byong bu ban+de brgya tsam// rgyal po dag las thos nas spyod gyur cing // 'ad+mo chags ma bral byar ni shrI byur gyur// d+hAn d+h+ya/
84a2(skyes rabs): smras pa/ rtsa ba'i phyir ni bdag don chud gson pa/ grogs pa'i nang na de ni glong dpon gyur// rgyal po'i chad pa dag gis mi chod par// bud medo glu gar dag gis dga' bar 'gyur// sring mos smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtse pa gang khyer
84a3(skyes rabs): ba/ de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur nas su// gzugs dang dpal gyis gzi byin 'bar gyur cing // btsun mo dam pa stong gis mchog tu gyur// bran mos smras pa/ gang gis rtsa ba mthong la mchod mi mthong // de ni gcig pu dge ba rnams
84a4(skyes rabs): dang bral/ bkur sti byas pas myos par gyur na su// kha zas zhim po dag la dga' bar 'gyur// de nas nags tshal de na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang glang po che dang spre'u dag cig der chos nyan du lhags pas gtam de thos nas/ rab tu ngo tsha zhing
84a5(skyes rabs): mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyis bdag gtsang bar bstan pa'i phyir de dag gi mdun du mna' bor ba// khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyir ni gang 'khrul pa// gtsug lag khang chen dag gis sbyin par gyur// bkru bshal stor khung dag gi
84a6(skyes rabs): zhig ral 'chos// nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang ba byed par gyur// glang po ches smras pa/ thub mchog khyod kyi rtsa ba gang rku ba// de ni zhags pa dam po drug brgyas bcings// lcags kyu rnon pos bkug pa'i rman zhing // nags tshal nyams
84b1(skyes rabs): dga' bor nas grong 'dab song // sprerus smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba bskam pas gang rku ba// de ni me tog phreng can zha nye thogs// dbyug pas brdeg cing sbrul gyi khar gtong shog/ se ral khar bcings khyim na gnas par shog/ de nas byang chub
84b2(skyes rabs): sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'jam zhing dul ba dang bzod pa dang / zab pa ston pa'i tshig 'di skad ces smraso// gang zhig me rlag par ni brlag ci 'am// gang zhig 'di 'dra khyed la ngogs gyur pa// 'dod pa yid 'ong ci bder spyad nas su// /
84b3(skyes rabs): khyim na gnas bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de dag 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa mo mthun par smod pa zhig gnas khyad par can du gyur par smra ba des gus pa dang ye mtshan skyed par gyur te/ bdag rang gi gzugs
84b4(skyes rabs): 'bur ba drang srong de rnams kyi drung du bstan nas mi bzod pa bzhin du smras pa/ khyed re zhig sdod cig/ grong dag thob phyir yid la rtsol byed cing // bde ba 'dod phyir yid la gnyis kyang med// dka' thub 'bad pas gang dag thob 'dod pa'i//
84b5(skyes rabs): 'dod pa de dag ci phyir smod par byed// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po 'dod pa ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas te/ gang la brtags nas thub pa rnams 'dod pa la mi spyod pa de mdo tsam zhig nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i phyir ni 'jig
84b6(skyes rabs): rten bcing zhing gsod par 'gyur// mya ngan gsus shing 'jigs pa mang po'i sdug bsngal myong / rgyal po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i phyir ni brlag par 'gyur// phyi ma la yang chos nyams sems can dmyal bar ltung / gang gis mdza' bo
85a1(skyes rabs): rnams dang myur du kho na 'byung 'gyur// gang gis g.yo sgyu dri ma can gyi lam du 'gro/ grags pa nyams shing phyi mA la yang sdug bsngal myong // de dag thob par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'dod pa yin// de byas rab drung 'bring da zla
85a2(skyes rabs): ma rnams// 'di dang pha rol du yang 'dod pas gsod par byed// bdag la pha bon 'dod sbrul gdug khros pa bzhin// thub pa rnams ni de la mi ston to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin tshig de bden no snyam nas mngon par bstod do// drang srong
85a3(skyes rabs): de dag gi mthu des yid dga' bar gyur nas// de dag la bdag gi nyes pa khas blangaso// gang dag brtags na yon tan rnams// re ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur// brtag pa'i phyir ni bdag gi 'dir// pad+ma'i rtsa ba sbas pa yin// pad+ma'i /
85a4(skyes rabs): rtsa ba 'di dag gis// khyed cag rnam dag spyod pa bstan// thub pa bden par smra ba yis// 'gro ba mgon dang bcas par mthong // de skad ces smras nas/ pad+ma'i rtse ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems
85a5(skyes rabs): dpyas de'i spyod pa glang po de la gzi byin gyis non pa'i tshig drag pos spyod pa// nged cag khyod kyi gnyen dang grogs ma yin// gar mkhan khyod mi ni nged cag 'phyas bdag min// lho dbang ci phyir khyad du bsad nas su// drang srong rnams la rtsed
85a6(skyes rabs): mo'i lam bzhin bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byon rab tu gus pas rna cha dang cod pan 'gul ba'i 'od kyis gdong gsal bar gyur to rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas de yi bzod par gsol pa/ bdag gi 'di ltar
85b1(skyes rabs): mi brtan pa// bgyis pa'i dogs pa sngar smras lags// pha dang slob dpon 'dra ba ru// bdag la khyod kyis bzod par mdzod// shes pa'i mig ni btsums par gyur pa rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni mnyams la'ang 'khrul bar 'gyur//
85b2(skyes rabs): bdag la phan pa de la bzod par mdzod// de bas bdag la thugs la mi bcad gsol// de ltar bzod pa gsol nas de nyid mi snang bar gyur to// de lta bas na rab tu dben pa'i ro myong bu rnams ni 'dod pa la 'phyas kyi gnas dang gnod pa lta
85b3(skyes rabs): pubur mi mthun par semaso// de la skyes pa'i rabs 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ dA dang shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / 'od srungs dang / gang po ma 'gags kun dga' bo// de tshe tshen spyan du gyur// sring mo ut+pal mdog yin no//
85b4(skyes rabs): bran mo kug+na ut+ta ra bran po khyim po dag mdzes pa yin// gnod sbyin ri bo bde ba yin// glang po pa ri le ya yin// spre'u ni sbrang rtsi 'bul ba yin// brgya byin nag po 'char ka yin// skyes pa'i rabs ni de ltar bzung // pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skyes
85b5(skyes rabs): pa'i rabs te bcu dgu pa'o// // yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni skyes bu dge ba rnams la bskul ma btab pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de bas na yon+ta tan sgrub po la 'bad par bya'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems
85b6(skyes rabs): dpa' thos pa dang / dul ba dang / cho rigs btsun pa ma 'jungs shing khong bzo ba// 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du bya ba la 'gal ba med pa// gtsug lag mang po la goms pas tshig la mkhas par grags pa/ snying rje dang ldan zhong sbyin gtor
86a1(skyes rabs): bas nor gyi 'byor pas thams cad du khyab pa/ rab tu phyugs pas khyim bdag rin po che ltar bkur bu rgyal po zhog gi tshong dpon du gyur te zhes grwa go// de ni rang bzhin chos kyi bdag/ thos la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyan//
86a2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten dag gis phal cher ni// bkur sti bya ba'i gnasu gyur// de nas re zhig cig/ sems dpa' chen po de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ba'i 'og tu de'i sgyug mo don zhig gnyer zhing bu mo dang phrad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du song ngo // 'gron 'od
86a3(skyes rabs): pa'i bkur sti bya ba byas nas gtam glengs langs pa las// rang gi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma la bde 'am mi bde dri ba'i skabs su// bu mo khyod kyi khyim thab khyod la byams sam mi byams// khyod kyi bkur sti byas pa'i yon
86a4(skyes rabs): tan drin du gzo 'am mo gzo// mi bde ba lta yod dam med ces dris pa dang // de ngo tsha bas mgo slong mi spobs pa bzhin du bcom bsgyangs te smras pa/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang yon tan dang spyod tshul ni rab tu byung ba la yang ma mchis so
86a5(skyes rabs): zlos byas pa dang / de nas de'i ma na so rgas pas rna ba mi gsang zhing sems mi gsal ba dang / bu mos de skad smras pa'i tshig kyang ngo tsha zhing bcom bsgrengs pas legs par ma thos la/ rab tu byung ba'i sgra zhig kyang thos pas bdag
86a6(skyes rabs): gi mgo pa rab tu byung ba lta zhig snyam nas/ bu mo'i mya ngan dang de'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur nas smre sngags 'don cing des skad phyung ste nguso// 'i ji ltar snying nye bdag gi mi yang bor te rab tu byung ba de'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan da
86b1(skyes rabs): spyod tshul yang ci 'dra ba zhig/ bu de'i rab tu byung ba yang ji lta bu zhig go/ dAr la bab cing byad gzugs bzang // gzhon sha can la bde bar gsos// de ni rgyal po'i gsang chen yin// dgon par gnas blo ji ltar skyes// nang
86b2(skyes rabs): mi drug dang khon ma byung // rgasna byas mi sdug ma gyur cing // nad mid ji ltar tshig gcig gis// khyim gyi longs spyod de yis btang // 'dzangs shing dul ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhan la snying brtsi mnyes kyang gshin// mi brtan nang
86b3(skyes rabs): mi snying rje med// 'di lta bu ni ji ltar lo'is// dge sbyong bram ze mdza' bo'i rten// nang mi dag dang phongs pa gso// nags tshal dgon par gang gtsal ba// gtsang sbra tshul khrims nor ldan pa'i// khyim na rnyed par mi 'gyur ram// rjes
86b4(skyes rabs): mthun zhing chos grogs byung // nyes pa med pa bor nas no// ha cang chos la dad ches nas// chos dang 'gal ba 'dir mi lta// 'di ltar gus pa'i skye bo spangs// yid la snying rje cung zad 'grub re skan// kye ma'i gnam gyis mnar ba ltar//
86b5(skyes rabs): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma bdag gi khyim thab rab tu byung ba'i phyir bdag gi ma snying rje zhing snying na sa smre sngags 'don pa des bud med rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir snying mi dga' bas 'khyams shing blong blong por ni gyur/
86b6(skyes rabs): mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyi sems dkrugs nas gtam gleng langs po'i 'phro yang brjod// bdag gi khyim thob reb tu byung ba'i gtam ngan thos nas bdag gi mi bdag mya ngan gsang ba'i phyir khyim 'dir 'ongs snyam nas
87a1(skyes rabs): bu mo do smre sngags 'don cing skad phyung ste ngu bya las brgyal bar gyur to// khyim mi dang g.yog 'khor rnams kyis kyang de thos nas mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis shugs kyis cho nges btab bo// khyim chos dang /
87a2(skyes rabs): mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes dang / de la brten pa'i skye bo bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis kyang de thos nas khyim bdag de la rje su chags pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams dang / pho brang gi 'khor gyi mi las kyang phal cher khyim
87a3(skyes rabs): der dong // gang phyir 'jig rten dag na srid pa ni// bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs par spyod// de bas 'di la 'ang 'jig rten slob ma bzhin// bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs spyod gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
87a4(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar log ste bdag gi khyim dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi khyim no cho nges 'debs pa dang mi mang po 'dus pa mthong nas bdag gi g.yog la 'di gyur pa ci nyes rtogs te shog tsog ces bsgo'o//
87a5(skyes rabs): des de ltar gyur brtags nas de'i drung du phyin te de la bzlas pa/ jo bo 'byor pa'i khab spangs nas// rab tu byung zhes thos nas ni// skye bo 'di dag gzhig nas// byams pa'i dbang gis 'dus par gyur// de nas byang chub sems
87a6(skyes rabs): dpa' rang bzhin gyis bsam pa dag pas tshig des bskul ma btab pa bzhin du ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa/ e ma'o skye bo rnams bdag la de ltar ro legaso snya mo// skye bo rnams kyi yon tan du/ brjod cing
87b1(skyes rabs): grags pa thob gyur la/ gal te khyim la phyogs na ni// bdag lta mir yang ga la rung / de ltar bdag ni skyon la dad gyur cing // yon tan khyad du gsod la tshul ngan na// skye bo dge bas yang gar brtsi bar gyur// de ltar gyur na gson
87b2(skyes rabs): yang ci zhig rung de bas skye bo ro bar gyur pa 'di// spyod pa dran pas nyon mongs khyim spangs nas// dka' thub nagaso na dga' ba'i yon tan gyis// nyams su blangs te rab tu bkang bar bya// bdag nyid chen po des de ltar nges par byas nas// de nas
87b3(skyes rabs): slar log ste rgyal por gsol ka bal tshong dpon spyan sngor mchis 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig ces smraso// spyan sngar mchir gnang nas kyang tshul bzhin du rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos ci'i phyir 'ongs zhes smras na// lha bdag ni
87b4(skyes rabs): rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na gnang ba'i rigaso// dri nas de la rgyal po des rim gro bskyed de byams pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces smraso// nga 'drir gnyen dang mdza' mchog yad bzhin du// nor dang thabs dang mthu rtsal gang dag gis// nga yis thub
87b5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i// sdug bsngal gang gis khyod ni bas mthar 'gro// gal te nor 'dod nga las nor khyer cig/ gnod pa yod na de las bzlog par bya// nga dang gnyen bshes gsol ba bdebs bor nas// ci zhig 'dod pa'i phyir ni
87b6(skyes rabs): bas mthar 'gro/ de ltar bdag nyid chen po de la rgyal pos byams pa dang gus pas bsgo ba dang / de la tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ khyod la brten pas gnod pa ga le mchis// nor gyis phongs pa'ang mchis par ga la 'gyur/ de bos phong
88a1(skyes rabs): te bas mthar bdag mi mchi// gang gi slad du mchi ba gsan du gsol// hUM bo m+b+ha ngan gzus pa'i snamam can dag gis// bdag nI rab tu byung bar gyur ces rab tu bsgrags// bdag ni yon tan ldan nas dang du rdza/
88a2(skyes rabs): gnas su gyur// de bas bdag ni bas mtha' dben par gnas par 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod skye bo rnams kyi tshig tsam gyis de dor bar mi rigs// khyod lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bo'i tshig bsrungs pa
88a3(skyes rabs): tsam gyis tshig pa yang ma yin la/ de ma byas na mi rung ba yang ma yino// 'jig rten mu cor smra ba'i gautA ma rnams ni// rang dgar rtog pa dag las rnam par 'phro// gang zhig de ltar snying la sems na yang // 'phyas su gyur na byed pa ci
88a4(skyes rabs): zhig smos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de skad bka' mi stsal du gsol// skye bo'i bka' mchis dge ba grags pa rnams ltar mi bgyi ba yang ma lagaso// lha gzigs su gsol// mi yi badrag po gang tshe dge
88a5(skyes rabs): ba yi// chos dang ldan zhes grags par gyur pa las// mi yis de la nyams par mi bgyi zhing // ngo tsha'i phyir yang rab tu 'bad pa'i rigs// yon tan yod ces glags shing re ba dag/ ji ltar gyur kyang rudra ste snang na ni// grags pa
88a6(skyes rabs): dag las gtam snyen 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan du bgyis na khron pa skam pa bzhin// bzhon bzhin ma yin yon tan grags pa 'phel// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa la// mi rnams grags pa nyams par gyur na ni// snga
88b1(skyes rabs): yang grags par 'gyur bar rab tu dka'// sbrul nag khros nas gdengs ka bteg 'dra ba'i// yongs su bzung ba rtsod pa'i rgyur gyur pa// spang rigs de ni spong bar bgyid pa la// lha cig bdag ni bzlog pa'i mi rigs// gus par mkhyen nas
88b2(skyes rabs): 'bangs la byams pa yis// khyod kyis de lta ra bgyi ba'i rigs mod kyi// bdag ni sems kyis rab tu byung lags ma'adu 'dzi nyon mongs can gyis ci zhig bgyi// de ltar gsol ba btab nas bdag nyid chen po nga rgyal po ngos gnang
88b3(skyes rabs): ste dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro bar chaso// de nas de'i mdza' bo dang nye du dang de la brten pa rnams lhags nas mya ngan gyis mig mchi mas gang zhing rkang pa la 'jus te 'gror mi ster bar gyur pa ni kha cig gis thal mo sbyar te gsol
88b4(skyes rabs): ba 'debs shing de'i lam bkag ste 'khod// kha cig gis ni mgul nas 'jus te tshig 'jam pos brid cing khyim logs khrid par byed// kha cig ni spobs pa'i tshul gyis tshig rtsub pos ci bya gtol med pa sha stug byed ces zer zhing
88b5(skyes rabs): gshe/ kha cig ni mdza' bo dang nang mi rnam la yang snying mi rje'am zhes zer zhing 'gror mi ster/ la la ni khyim na gnas pa'i dka' thu bo nyid bsod nams che mod zer zhing rnar 'ong ba dang rigs pa'i tshig gis rtog pa skyed// gzhan dag gi
88b6(skyes rabs): dka' thub kyi nags tshal dag na gnas pa sdug bsngal che ba dang / da cung bya ba me zin pa kha cig yod pa skad gsol ba 'debs/ kha cig ni tshe phyi ma la bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod dam med gtol med ces the tshom skyed de/ gzhung
89a1(skyes rabs): thams kyi byung bar dang dedas smras shing desgyu lag d+hA 'ayang bar gyur to// de de ltar ragad+d+ha 'thung m+b+hi sna byang nags rtul du gro 'grog byung 'thun pa gtsang mchims gang ba'i mdza ba dU ga la /
89a2(skyes rabs): nas 'di ltar sems par mngon no// mdzar bor 'thams pas mdz+war bo bag med la// phan par 'gyur na rtsug po 'ang s+pha r+ya dri'i rigs// phran zhing 'dzum na spyos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam pa rnams kyi chos tshul de lta yin// nags
89a3(skyes rabs): pas khyim dga' snyam du 'di dag sems// nags na gnas pa dogs shing 'jigs med par// tha mal gnas pa ji ltar mi sems kyi// sdig pas gros pa bzhin du 'gog par byed// mi ngag shi 'am shi bar 'gyur ba 'am// chos la
89a4(skyes rabs): nyams na ngu bar 'gyur pa bzhin// nags tshal gnas 'dod nga ni gson bzhin du/ ji zhig sems shing 'di dag ngu bar gyur// nga dang bral bas de ltar mi dga' na// nga dang lhan cig nags nu tsa mi 'khod// gal te nga bas khyim na 'khod/
89a5(skyes rabs): dga' na// mchi ma zad par du bya tsa ched che// de lta bdag gi mi la chags pa'i phyir// dka' thub byed du 'gro bar mi sbyar na// dag dang dmag 'gyed de dang de dag tu// 'gro ba ni yang de ltar cis mi byed// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na mdza' bo
89a6(skyes rabs): rnams// mchi mas 'ju zhing 'ong ba'i mthu yang mthong // mdza' bo'i rang bzhini rab tu bstan gyur kyang // phyi bzhin mi 'brang g.yo dang thabs byed bzhin// slad du bzlog pa'i phyir ni skad 'dzer cing // mig ni 'chims gang bzhin smra ba dang /
89b1(skyes rabs): mtshungs pa la yang bla ma 'dra bar ni// mgo bo btud de 'di dag phyag 'tshal ba// rab tu byung ba'i rjesu rab 'byung bar// 'di dag byams na de bzhin bya ba'i rigs// dam pa'i sems ni ngo mtshar gyur pa yi// gar mkhan spyod pa bzhin du
89b2(skyes rabs): mi 'gyur ram// yon tan med la phongs par gyur che yang // grogs po gnyis gsum nges par yod par 'gyur// yon tan yod bzhin nags su 'gro ba na// grogs po gcig kyang med pa ngo mtshar che// glang chen myos pa'i g.yul
89b3(skyes rabs): ngo dogs pa na// nga yi sngon du 'gro bar gtong pa dag/ nags su dra 'gro phyir na mi 'brang ba// de dag min nam nga yang de ma yin// de ltar byams pa med par 'gyur ba'i rgyu// nyes pa byas par bdag ni mi dran na// bdag gi mdza' bo 'di ltar
89b4(skyes rabs): 'khod bzhin du// 'di ltar gyur pa rung bar 'ong ngam ge/ bdag ni nagasu 'gro phyir mi 'brang ba// bdag la yon tan med pas de ltar grong // yon tan dag la rje su cha rdzogs pa rnams// de ltar 'byung bar nus pa su zhig yod// gang
89b5(skyes rabs): ngag khyim gyis nyes pa bsal bar mngon// dka' thub nags tshal yon tan mau mthong ba// shes pa'i mig ni btsums gyur de dag la// bdag gi de dung brtags tu ci yang med// phyi ma'i tshe dang tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal rgyu// 'dod pa dag ni/
89b6(skyes rabs): spong bar mi 'dod pa// dka' thub nags dang 'gal bar byed pa de// de ring bdag 'dor ba ni gti mug yin// bdag gi mdza'i bo 'di rnams gang gis slus// 'jig rten ma lus zhi bar ma gyur pa// dka' thub nags tshal rnyed pa'i mthu
90a1(skyes rabs): chen gyis/ nyes pa de dag mngon du gzhom par bya// de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyis yongs brtags nas// mdza' bshes spongs pa rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa dag/ 'jam zhing rab tu mnyen par smra
90a2(skyes rabs): pa'i tshig rnams kyis// bags kyis brid de bor nas dka' thu ba na gsu song // de lta bas na yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni skyes bu dge pa rnams la bskul ma btab pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na yon tan
90a3(skyes rabs): sgrub pa la 'dod par bya'o// 'di ltar dge slong ngo zhe 'am/ dge bsnyen no zhes yon tan brjod par gyur na dge ba rnams kyis dngos po do sgrub pa'i phyir bdag yon tan gyis brgyan par bya'o// de bzhin du chos sgrub pa'i grogs byed
90a4(skyes rabs): pa rab tu dkon no zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o// tshong dpon gyi skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu pa'o// // sdom lang+ga brgya byin bri ma ze myos byed ma// legs par pha rol phyin dang nywa// byA dang bum pa phyug pa'i bu/ dka'
90a5(skyes rabs): thub can dang tshong dpon no// bcu tshan gnyis pa'o// khro ba thul na ngag zhi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du byas na dag 'phel lo// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs chen po yon tan la goms pa'i
90a6(skyes rabs): mthus grags pa rgyas pa/ 'byor pa'i yon tan nges pa/ rgyal pos bkur sti byas pa/ 'jig rten pa lha bzhin du bkur ba zhig tu skyes par gyur to// zhes gra go/ de yun ring du gyur nas cho ga'i lasu bya ba rnams ni byas pa dang /
90b1(skyes rabs): mang du thos pa'i yon tan goms par byas pas mkhas pa rnams kyi nang du ming grags par gyur to// mkhas pa rnams kyis grugs pa ni// mkhas pa nyid kyi nang du 'phel// rin chen shes la rin chen dang // g.yul po dag tu dpa'
90b2(skyes rabs): po bzhin// de nas bdag nyid chen po de tsho rabs snga ma la byung ba la goms shing chos la sems pa goms par byas pa dang / blo dang shes rab rab tu gsal ba'i phyir khyim na gnas pa la dga' bar ma gyur to// de 'dod pa rnams thab
90b3(skyes rabs): mo dang / rtsod pa dang / dregs pa dang kho na dang / mi mthun pa mang ba dang / rgyal po dang / rkun mo dang / me dang / chu dang / ngagra dang / bgos skal la dpung ba rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa dang / cho ga mi shes par 'gyur pa dang / nyes pa mang
90b4(skyes rabs): po'i gnasu gyur pa'i phyir bdag la phan par 'dod pa rnams zlas dug can spong ba bzhin du yongs su spangs nas sgra dang khas spu bzang po bregs te gos kha dog bsgyur ba ngur smrig ni gyon/ khyim pa'i cha lugs ni bor nas// rab tu byung ba'i
90b5(skyes rabs): 'dul ba dang / sdom pa'i dpal la gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i chung ma de la snying nye ba'i dbang du gyur pa yang skra bregs te lus la rgyan dang lhab lhub ni med par byas/ rang bzhin gyi yon tan bzang pos ni brgyan/ gos ngur smrig ni gyon
90b6(skyes rabs): nas de'i phyi bzhin du rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de dka' thub kyi nags tshil du 'gro ba'o rjes su 'brang bar shis nas/ bud med sdug ma myong ba dka' thub kyi nags tshol na gnas mi nus pa'i phyir de la smras
91a1(skyes rabs): pa/ bzang mo khyod nga la byams pa'i rang bzhin 'di bstan zin gyis// khyod nga'i phyi bzhin du 'gro bar chas pa thong shig/ bud med rab tu byung ba gzhan dag gang na 'khod pa der khyod kyang de dag dang lhan cig/
91a2(skyes rabs): tu 'dug pa'i rigaso// dgon pa'i gnas ni 'dug pa ni rab tu dka'o// ltos shig/ dur khrod dang ni khang stong ri bo dang / nags tshal gcan gzan khro bos gang ba na// nyi ma gang du nub par gyur pa der// dka' thub can rnams gnas
91a3(skyes rabs): med 'khod par 'gyur// bsam gtan byed cing rtag par gcig pu gnas// bud med dag ni bltar yang med par byed// khyod kyi 'bad pa 'di na ci zhig dgos// de bas khyod blo slad du ldog par gyis// de yang de'i phyi bzhin du
91a4(skyes rabs): 'gro bar yi dam bcas pas mig mchi mos gang bzhin du cung zad cig 'di skad slar smras// khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'gro ba la// bdag ni gal te nyon mongs na// bdag sdug khyod kyang mi dgyes bzhin// ci yi slad du de ltar bgyid// bdag ni
91a5(skyes rabs): khyod dang bral bzhin du/ mchis par nus pa ma lags kyis// de ltar dka' dang 'gal ba 'di// bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de ltar de lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo yang slar log tu ma rung ba dang / de nas byang chub sems dpas
91a6(skyes rabs): de la cang ma smras pa dang / bya ngur ba'i phyi bzhin du ngur pa mo 'brang ba 'dra ba de yang de'i phyi bzhin 'bangs te grong dang ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas re zhig nags tshal rab tu dben pa nyams dga' ba shing ljon pa sna
91b1(skyes rabs): tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ grib ma sdug pa/ la la dag na nyi ma'i 'od zer tig tig po dag gis me tog sil ma bskum pa ltar 'dug pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phye mas khebs pa'i sa gzhi gtsang ma zhig tu bsam gtan gyi cho ga byas
91b2(skyes rabs): nus phyi dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin las langs te phyag dar khrod kyi tshem bu 'drub cing 'dug go/ bud med rab tu byung ba de yang de dang mi ring ba zhig na rang gi lus kyi gzi mdangs lha mo dang 'dra bar mdzes pas shing drung brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug
91b3(skyes rabs): cing yid la bya ba'i man ngag des bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du bsam gtan byed cing 'dug/ de nas yul de'i rgyal po phyogs de dang nye ba'i nags tshal dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i shing lo lhag par mdzes pa dang ni ldan// bu ba che phra mang po sgra
91b4(skyes rabs): dir dir zer// bya ko ki la mang po ni smin pa 'byin// mtsho'i gnas rab tu nyams dga' ba me tog pad+ma dang ut+pa la kha bye ba ni dgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi bsung gis bsgos pa'i ser bu'i ngang nyams su bde
91b5(skyes rabs): ba lhung ba yod pa nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing srong song ba las sa phyogs der phyin to// me tog sna tshogs chom bu rab tu mdzes// dpyi kyi dpal gyis che du bshams pa bzhin// ko ki la dang rma bya sgra sman 'byin// mchog nas bzang po
91b6(skyes rabs): me tog chu skyes ldan// ne'u sing sngon po mdzes pa'i rtswa 'jam yid// bung po myos pa'i sgra 'byin nag tshal dag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi rtse da mo'i gnas gyur 'dra// yid la lta bar rab tu 'dod par gyur// de nas rgyal po de dul zhing zhe sa skyed de//
92a1(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i gtam byas nas de dang de nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ des bud med rab tu byung ba mthong na yid rab tu 'phrog par 'gyur ba de mthong nas/ de'i gzugs bzang ba de la spying
92a2(skyes rabs): chags par gyur to// de ni 'dor chung ma yin yang dag go snyam nas/ 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir de 'phrog pa'i thabs bsham so// dka' thub can gyi dpyod pa'i mye 'bar ba'i// mthu ni khyo bo'o mer 'drar des shes nas// yid
92a3(skyes rabs): la 'dod pas brtan pa g.yengs gyur kyang // de la 'phral du brnyas thabs ma byas// des bsams pa/ de'i dka' thub kyi mthu shes par byas la nus na ni de bya bar rigs kyi de lta ma yin na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ gal te de 'di la sems
92a4(skyes rabs): chags pa'i dbang du gyur na ni de la dka' thub kyi mthu med ger ma chago/ de ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yIn ni de lta mi lta ba'i rigaso// de bas na de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che'am chung brta go snyam nas rgyal po ngos dka' thub kyi mthu
92a5(skyes rabs): brtag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la phan par dga' ba bzhin du smras pa/ kyai rab tu byung ge khyod 'jig rten na mi g.yo can dang thub tshod can rab tu mngan nags tshal rab tu dben par gdar bzlog tu yang med pa 'di lta bu
92a6(skyes rabs): na chung ma 'di lta bu dang lhan cig 'kho durad+ya ngam/ khyod kyi chung ma 'di la 'ga' zhig gis gtses na ni nga la yang gshe bar 'gyur ro// ltos shig/ dben pa 'di la dka' thub chung ma khyed// 'ga' zhig chos dang bcos te
92b1(skyes rabs): brnyes byas nas/ chung ma 'di ni mngon sum phrogs gyur na// mya ngan byed las gzhan ni ci byar yod// khro ba skye na'ang yid ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing // chos dang 'gal la grags pa'ang med par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni grong du bzhag pa'i
92b2(skyes rabs): rigs// dka' thub can la bud med bston ci dgos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gsung ba yang med na// gal te de ltar gyur na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba gsan du gsol// rgyags pas snyems sam
92b3(skyes rabs): gal te ma brtags par// bdag la gnod pa byed pa 'dir byung na// sa rdul stug po char pos mnan pa bzhin// bdag nyid gson bzhin don yod mi btang // de nas rgyal po des bsams pa// 'di ni chung ma 'dri la rab tu chags
92b4(skyes rabs): pas dka' thub kyi mthu yang med do snyam nas sems dpa' chen po de la brnyes par gyur te/ des gnod pa byas su yang mi dogs la// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du yang gyur pas bud med mthong ba'i mi rnams la bsgo ba
92b5(skyes rabs): khyed deng la bud med rab tu byung ba de pho brang gi nang du khrid cig ces bsgo'o// bud med rab tu byung ba des de skad zer po thos nas nags tshal gyi dgo ba mo gcan gzan ma rungs pas gtses pa bzhin du 'jigs shing brag tsha bas 'dzum
92b6(skyes rabs): ni gyur// mig ni mchi mas gang / skad ni 'dzer cing phongs nas smre sngags 'di skad 'don to// 'jig rten phongs shing sgra yis gtses gyur na// rgyal po dag la pha bzhin skyabs 'tshol na// de nyid gang la mi rigs byed gyur ni/
93a1(skyes rabs): de yi su la pA skyabs btsal bar bya// kye ma'o 'jig rten spyod pa'ang tshul las nyams// gang dag phongs pa legs par mi skyong ba// 'on te med tam shi bar gyur tam ci// chos kyang grags pa
93a2(skyes rabs): tsam du zad pa lta// jo bo bathugs bzhi no lha yis ci zhig bya// gzhan zhig yin na 'ong rjes su bsrung rigs na// sdig can rnams kyis bdag ni khrid bzhin du// bdag la skal ba med pasdu cang m+b+hi gsung // gang gi spyod
93a3(skyes rabs): pa'i ser ba blab gyur na// ri'i gzugs kyang mi spyang dran gyur pa// bAdag ni 'di ltar gyur kyang dri mi smra// 'on kyang byung ngan ma ni dacu du gson// bdag ni 'di ltar rab tu phongs gyur kyang // snying rje'i snod du ma gyur sdig ri tsha//
93a4(skyes rabs): phongs la snying rje n+dan gyis skyabs bya ba// 'di ni dka'i thub can gyi tshul min nom// bdag ni slad du bzlog kyang ma log pa// de nyid dacung thugs la bcings pa 'dra// khyod ni mi dgyes bzhin du bdag mchis pa// kye
93a5(skyes rabs): ma'o bdag dgur gyis bA ga la srid// da ltar byed med rab tu byung ba de stong rje rje skad smra zhing smre sngags 'don la dru ba tsam la brten pa rgyal pos bsgo ba'i mi de rnams kyis sems dpa' chen po ngos mthong bzhin du shing rta'i
93a6(skyes rabs): steng du bzhig ste pho brang gi nang du khrod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpes kyang so sor rtog pa'i mthus khro ba'o stobs bcil te/ de bzhin du sems 'khrug pa med cing rab tu ni bar phyag dar khrod kyi tshem bu 'drib cing
93b1(skyes rabs): 'dug go// de nas de la rgyal pos smras pa/ mi bzang khros pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i tshig khyod kyis snyems shing glasang bstod smras zin na// nyon mongs ma de mthong bzhin phrogs gyur kyang // mthu med zhum nas rab tu zhi bar 'dug
93b2(skyes rabs): de bas rang gi mthu rtsa la brtan par gyis// dka' thub gnas pa'i gzi brjid bsags pa'ang ston// bdag gi chod kyang gzung ba ma shes nas khas 'chos don med lhag pa ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpas smras pa// rgyal
93b3(skyes rabs): po chen po bdag gis yi dam bcas pa de ni dron mA mchis pa ma lags kyis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// gang zhig bdag la gnod pa byed pa de// g.yo bzhin du yang bdag gis yongs ma btang // bdag gis mngon
93b4(skyes rabs): sum du yang zhi bar bgyis// de bas bdag gi yi dam bcas bzhin gyur// byang chub sems dpa'o tshig rab tu bstan pa dang rab tu zhi ba'i tshul ston pa des dka' thub cen gyi yon tan yod par yid ches par gyur nas bsam
93b5(skyes rabs): pa/ bram ze 'dis ni gzhan zhig la bsams nas smras pa lta zhig na// bdag gis de ma shes par 'di lta bu mi brtan par byas snyam ste rtog pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rnam par g.yo bzhin khyod kyis
93b6(skyes rabs): ma btang ba// khyod la gnod byed de ni su zhig yin// char pa bab pa rdul phran dka' ba bzhin// khyod kyi gang zhig rag tu zhi bar byas// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol// skyes na'ang
94a1(skyes rabs): gang zhig mi mngon la// ma skyes na ni dge bar mngon// bdag la gnod pa'i khro ba de// bdag gi shor bar ma gyur to// mi phan 'dod pa'i mi rnams ni// gang zhig skyes na dgar 'gyur ba// dgra rnams dgar
94a2(skyes rabs): 'gyur khro ba de// bdag gis shor bar ma gyur to// gang zhig skyes par gyur na ni// dam pa'i don la spyod mi 'gyur// rgyal po long bar byed pa yi// khro ba de la bdag mi gnas// gang gis zil non dge ba gtong 'gyur pa/
94a3(skyes rabs): don rnams grub kyang nyams par 'gyur ba yi// khro ba ma rungs gdon gyis bsgyur 'dra ba// tshul min byed pa gdon gyis zin par 'ong // gau tsub shing gtsub pa las ni ma byung na// de nyid rab tu tshig par 'gyur 'dra ba// log
94a4(skyes rabs): pAr rtog las 'bar bar gyur pa yi// khro ba'ang de bzhin bdag nyid phung bar byed ci// rab tu 'bar zhing 'tshog pa'i ma 'dra ba// snying la gdung ba'i khro ba ma bcil na// yang bar gyur pas de la gtam ngan 'byung // nang par nam nangs zla
94a5(skyes rabs): ba'i 'od nyams bzhin// gzhan la gnod pa byed par mi sems par// khro bo la ni dgra bzhin gang lta ba// de yi grags pa nges par rgyas par 'gyur// zla ba yar gyi 'od zer gsal ba bzhin// khro bo lnga nyes dmigs chen po 'di
94a6(skyes rabs): ltar gzhan dag kyang yod de// khro ba'i se yis bzhin mdog nyams gyur na// rgyan gyis brgyan kyang bzang por yong mi snang // mal snyan bzang po dag la nyal gyur kyang // khro ba'i zug rngus sems ni sdug bsngal 'gyur//
94b1(skyes rabs): bdag la phan pa'i don sgrub brjed gyur te// khro bas gdungs nas lam ngan 'gro bar byed// grags dang don grub pa las nyams 'gyur te// zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin dpal las nyams// mdza' bshes dag gis rab tu bcugs
94b2(skyes rabs): gyur kyang // khro bas mi rigs g.yang sar ltung bar 'gyur// phran dang gnod par sems la blo nyams nas// phal cher 'gal zhing sems ni rmongs par 'gyur// khro ba'i sdig pa'i las ni goms byas pas// ngan
94b3(skyes rabs): song dag tu lo brgyar sdug bsngal myong // gnod pa chen po byas pas shar gnyer ba'i// dgas kyang de las lhag par ci bya yod khro ba 'di ni nang gi dgra/ bdag gis de ltar shes nas ni// de yi mthu ni 'phro ba dag/ skyes bu
94b4(skyes rabs): su zhig bzod par byed// de bas bo dag ni gson bzhin du// khro ba g.yos kyang ma shor to// phung bar byed pa'i dgra bo // su zhig yal bar 'dor bar byed// de nas de'i rab tu zhi ba'i yon tan rmad du byung ba dang tshig
94b5(skyes rabs): snying la 'bab po des rgyal po yid rab tu mgu bar gyur nas smras pa// khyod kyi smra ba'i rim 'di dang // zhi ba'i rje su mthun pa 'di// myang du smos kyang ci dgos te// khyod dang ma phreng brlag par 'gyur// de skad ces bskyod
94b6(skyes rabs): nas drung du bsnyen te de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas sdig pa byas po yang bshagaso// bud med rab tu byung ba de la yang bzod pa gsol nas slar btang ngo // bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog
95a1(skyes rabs): tu khas blangaso// de lta bas na khro ba thul bar gyur na dgra zhi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du byas na dgra 'phel lo// de bas na khro ba thul bar bya ba lnga 'bad par bya'o// de ltar khyon du 'dzin pa med na drag zhi
95a2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur la dul bar byas na dag 'phel lo// de bzhin du mi khro ba ni gnyis ka'i don spyod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzod pa'i phan yon 'byung ba'i mdo sde dag la yang brjod par bya'o// khro ba'i nyes dmigs
95a3(skyes rabs): kyi gtam bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid la yang brjod par bya'o// gtsug pud byang chub kyi skyes pa'i rabs te// nyi shu gcig pa'o// // skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud bam po bdun pa// dam
95a4(skyes rabs): pa rnams dud 'gror lhung ba'i spyod pa la yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyi rje su mthun par bya btsam yang mi nus so// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhon gyi mtsho chen po'i nang gi dang pa'i khyu chen po
95a5(skyes rabs): brgya stong phrag du ma gro ras mang po'i bdag blodag po ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to zhes grag go/ de'i blon po dang po'i sde dpon rigs pa dang mi rigs pa yongs su shes par bya ba la mkhas pa/
95a6(skyes rabs): yun ring por yang dran pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ rigs mthon po'i nang na gtso bor gyur pa/ mkhas pa dang nges pa dang dul bas brgyan pa/ brtan pa dang / gtsang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod tshul dang / spyod lam phun
95b1(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa/ dpal la sdug bsngal bzod cing bag yod la// g.yul ngor 'gyed pa'i dgra thabs la mkhas shing mi 'jigs pa/ jo bo la snying nye zhing legs pa lta ba bzhin bzangs zhes bya ba zhig/ kyang
95b2(skyes rabs): yod par gyur te/ de'i tshe'i de ltar gyur pa de yang gnas brtan 'phags pa kun dga' bo yin no// de gnyis gcig la gcig byams shing mdza' ba'i yon tan gyi gzhis yon tan gyi mthu rab tu che bar gyur te/ 'jig rten
95b3(skyes rabs): gnyis ka la phan pa 'byung bar bya ba'i don du legs par 'jog pa ni slob dpon dang slob ma'i gtso bo bzhin// gzhan ni slob ma phal pa bzhin// rnam pa gcig tu na pha dang bu rab thu bo bzhin// gzhan ni bu phal pa bzhin no// lha dang /
95b4(skyes rabs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / dka' thub can de mngon sum du mthong ba rnams rab tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur to// de gnyis ngang pa'i tshogs rnams 'khod pa de'i// bde ba'i lus ldeg spyod pa gcig
95b5(skyes rabs): tu gyur// mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya yi 'dab ma gnyis// lus 'degs phyir ni spyod pa gcig pa bzhin// de ltar de gnyis kyis ngang pa'i tshogs de dag rjesu bskyangs pa'i ni chos dang srid dar ba gnyis kyi mi rnams rjesu bskyang ba bzhin/
95b6(skyes rabs): du rab tu dar bar gyur to// des mcho de rab tu mdzes par gyur to// ngang pa mang po tshogs pa yi// sgra snyan yi du 'ong ba des// pad+ma dkar po rgyu ba bzhin// mchod rab tu mdzes par byas// la lar ngang pa so sor gyis// kho cig tu ni
96a1(skyes rabs): phang phung 'chas// mA kha ra la sbyin rnams gyes 'phung ba'i// mdzes pa'i dpal yang zil gyis gnon// de nas ngang pa'i bdag po sems can thams cad lha phan par dga' ba de dang / blon po'i ngang pa'i sde dpon
96a2(skyes rabs): bzhin bzungs de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi mthu chen pos yid la ya mtshan cher gyur pa'i grub pa dang / drang srong dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / lha mang po rnams de gnyis kyis grags pa'i gzhi las gyur pa'i gtam 'ba'
96a3(skyes rabs): zhig rjer cing de dang de dag na 'khod do// gser mchog gtso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba'i mdog/ dpal ldan lus can tshig 'bru gsal bar smra// dul zhing rigs pa chos kyi tshul las byung // ngang pa'i tshul can 'di gnyis nges par gzhan//
96a4(skyes rabs): phrag dog med pas yon tan bsgrags pa dang / de gnyis grags pa phyogasu rgyas par gyur// rgyal po rnams kyang de la dad pa skyes// dam pa 'tshogs sar skyes dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na yul ba ra NA sa'i rgyal po tshangs
96a5(skyes rabs): byin zhes bya ba zhig yod// des dang ba'i bdag po de dang // ngang pa'i sde dpon de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi gtam blon po yid ches pa dang / bram ze rgan po rnams kyis tshogs kyi nang du gleng bslang ba lan du ma zhig thos nas
96a6(skyes rabs): de gnyis lha 'dod par gyur te// blon po bka' la gtogs pa gtsug lag du ma la goms shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ kye ngang pa mchog de gnyis ci nas kyang ji'i spyan sngar brim du ru bya ba'i thabs bzang
96b1(skyes rabs): po 'ga' zhig tshol zhig/ de nas blon po de dag rang rang gi blo la ci dran pa dang / gzhung lugs dag dang yang sbyar te rgyal po la gsol pa/ sems can rnams ni bde ba 'tshal// bde bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan mchog/ de dang de nas
96b2(skyes rabs): 'gug par bgyid// de bas de thos de gnyis mchi// de bas na mtsho gang na de gnyis mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'i bka' mchid gda' ba de bas kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags shing bzang ba'i mtsho zhig yul 'dir yang dgon pa'i
96b3(skyes rabs): sa phyogs zhig tu bgyid du stsar la la// gdugs re zhing yang bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra bsgrags shing ci nas kyang ngo mtshar cher 'gyur ba'i yo byad kyi yon tan khyad par can thos nas de gnyis 'dir mchi bar
96b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi ba'i rigaso// lha gzigs gsol/ lho gcig sems can phal cher ni// bde ba rnyed pa khyad gsong // thos na dgar ba'i bde ba dag/ gud ni 'dug kyang yid 'phrog 'gyur// de nas rgyal po des bsams
96b5(skyes rabs): pa/ de bden no snyam nas ring po ma lon par grong khyer gyi skyed mas tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i longs spyod kyi yon tan la 'gran du me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po
96b6(skyes rabs): dang / so'u gan+d+hi ka dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ku mr-i da dmar pos khebs shing chu gtsang mas gang ba rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i mtsho chen po zhig tu byed du gtsugo/ ljon shing ma tog bzang ldan zhing // lo ma bzang po 'od gsal/
97a1(skyes rabs): rnams/ de la ltad mo ltar lhag bzhin// mtsho'i mtha' ma yongs su bskor// pad+ma rnams ni dgod pa bzhin// chu rlabs 'khrugs pas g.yo bar gyur// de la chags pa'i byung ba rnams/ g.yo zhing 'phur ba
97a2(skyes rabs): mang pos gang // kha cig na ni zla 'od kyis// kha bye ku mu da dag mdzes// shing gi grib mas par bcad pas// kha cig zla ba'i dum bu 'dra// pad+ma ut+pal phye ma rnams// rlabs kyis sor mos bris pa bzhin// mtsho' 'gram dag rab tu
97a3(skyes rabs): brgyan// kha cig gser phyi'o ri mo bzhin// pad+ma ut+pal 'dab ma dag gi/ sar bcas pas de dang der// me tog sel ma bkram pa bzhin// rab tu nyams dga' rnam par mdzes// chu ni rab gsal mi g.yo bas// lus kyi yon
97a4(skyes rabs): t+yan gsal mdzes pa'i// nya yi tshogs ni mang po dag/ mkha' la rgyu ba 'dra bas brgyan// le lar mu tig phreng chad bzhin// glang chen sna nas bus pa dang // brag la phog pa'i chu 'phros pas// rlabs kyis phye ma rab tu 'phro//
97a5(skyes rabs): reg 'dzin na chung khrus byas shing // glang chen rgyal ba'i bsung dag dang // me tog rnams kyi phye ma yis// kha cig tu ni bsrung ba sgos bzhin// zla ba'i chung ma skar ma rnams// phye'o gdong lha me ldo bzhin// bya rnams dga' ba
97a6(skyes rabs): mang pos gang // de yi sgo snyan rab tu grags// mtsho de lta bu bya mang po'i thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad dgag pa med pa de lta bu byed bcug nas// de dag la byin te bya rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing yang mi 'jigs
97b1(skyes rabs): pa sbyin pa'i sgra sgrogs tu bcug go/ mtsho 'di me tog pad+ma dang // ut+palA 'dab mas gang ba'i chu// rgyal pos bya rnams kun la byin// dga' zhing mi 'jigs yon dang bcas// de nas re zhig cig ston gyi rdul bab pa'i tshe sprin gyi
97b2(skyes rabs): mun pa yol ba ltar sgrib pa ni med// ston gyi dus kyi yon tan bzang po ni byung / phyogs rnams ni gsal ba de ltar snang // me tog pad+ma mang po kha bye ba ni mdzes par gyur// mtsho'i chu rnams ni rab tu dang zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur/
97b3(skyes rabs): zla ba nI gzi medangs kyi mchog dang ldan zhing 'od zer rab tu 'phel ba bzhin du gyur/ sa gzhi ni lo tog rnam pa mang po phun sum tshogs pas brgyan dang ldan par gyur/ bya dang pa gzhon nu mang po ni rgyu bur gyur pa'i tshe/ yid bzhi
97b4(skyes rabs): gyi mtsho'i nang na ngang pa mang po 'khod pa de'i nang nas dang pa shug gnyis shig ston gyi dus nyams dga' ba'i tshe yul rgyu zhing mthar gyis dong dong ba las rgyu lnga po dri'i yul du phyin to// de na yang bya mngapo ni sgra 'byin// bung ba mang
97b5(skyes rabs): po ni sgra dwi ri ri zar// ser bu bsil ba langs pas rlabs kyi phreng ba 'khrigs par byas shing / kho ra khor yug tu me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la'i dri zhim po'i dang ni ljang // pad+ma kha bya ba rnams ni 'bar ba bzhin// me tog ku mu
97b6(skyes rabs): dkar po rnams ni dgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i mtsho de mthong bar gyur to// ngang ba shug gnyis po de yid bzhin gyi mtshon 'khor 'khod kyang mtshe de'i dpal rab tu yi du 'ong ba mthong nas rab tu ya mtshan che zhing rang gi ngang pa'i tshigs
98a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyang rjesu dran par gyur te/ e ma'o ngang pa'i tshogs de dag kyang 'dir lcags kyang ci mya rung snyam du sems par gyur to// 'jig rten pa ni phal cher du// spyi yi bde ba myong nas ni// byams shing rjesu chags
98a2(skyes rabs): pa yis// mdza' bshes thog mar dran par 'gyur// de nas dang pa shug gnyis po de de na ji srid 'dod par 'khod 'khod nas dbyar gyi dus la bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba ni mtshon cha 'debs pa 'dra// sprin gyis khebs pa'i mun pa ni
98a3(skyes rabs): ha cang yang mi gnag/ sprin gyi tshogs mang po 'du ba ni lha ma yin gyis dmag tshogs 'du ba bzhin// rma bya'i mdongs yongasu rgyas pa ni mdzes par gyur/ rma bya'i sgra cod tsong po 'byin pa ni dbyar sprin rnams rgyal bar gyur pa bzhin du
98a4(skyes rabs): mgu bar byed// rma bya mang po ni gar sna tshogs byed// bya bran mang po nI sgra sna tshogs 'byin cing rnam par rgyu// me tog ka dam pa dang / sardza dang / ar+dz+dza na dang / kau tA ka rI dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i sa rA bu bsil ba'i ngang ldang ba ni nags
98a5(skyes rabs): tshal dbugs 'byin pa bzhin/ bya dkar mo'i nga ba rgyu ba ni sprin gyi so'i phreng ba gtams pa bzhin// ngang pa'i tshogs rnams ni gung du 'dod 'dod pas sgra cher mi 'byin cing 'gro chas byed pa de bzhin du dang pa shugs gnyis pa de
98a6(skyes rabs): yang yid bzhin gyi mtsho de nyid du slar 'dong ngo // ngang pa'i bdag po'i drung du lhags nas yul dang phyogs rnams kyi gtam gleng langs pa'i tshe mtsho der yon tan khyad par can de glongaso// lha gangs ri'i lho phyogs na yul bar
98b1(skyes rabs): NA sne zhes bgyi ba na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/ des mtsho chen po rmad du byung ba bzang ba yon tan che ba brjod kyi mi lang ba zhig bya rnams la rang dgar spyod cing bde ba'i longs spyod du stsal te/ nyi re zhing yang mi
98b2(skyes rabs): 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra yang sgrogs// bya rnams kyang de ni rang gi khyim na mchis pa bzhin du 'jigs shing bag tsha ba ma mchis par spyod cing mtshos so// de bas ni lha yang dgung lo slang ma la der gshegs pa'i rigaso//
98b3(skyes rabs): de skad ces zer ba thos nas dang pa de dag thams cad kyang de lta 'dod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang la gros 'dri ba'i tshig dang yi ge gsal ba rgya tshur bstan nas ji ltar bya ba'i
98b4(skyes rabs): rigs zhes smraso// de nas bzhin bzangs kyis phyag 'tshal nas de la smras pa/ lha der gshegs pa'i mi rigaso// ci'i slad zhe na/ 'o skol gyi lus 'di dag ni sha bzar rung ste chags pa'i gnas legs shing yaud du 'ong
98b5(skyes rabs): pa sha stag legs la// bdag cag 'di na ces kyang phongs pa ma mchis// mi rnams kyi snying yang tshig 'jam po bcos ma phyi bzhag can du smra la/ gnod par sems pa'i rang bzhin ngan pa ni mi mngon par bgyid la phal
98b6(skyes rabs): cher snying rje chung la g.yo ngan lags so// rdza gcig gzigasu gsol// phal cher bya dang ri dgas rnams// smra dang sems pa mthun par bgyid// mi yi nang na kha cig ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul la mkhas// 'jam
99a1(skyes rabs): xxx
99a2(skyes rabs): smyan te/ de bas lha gAN+DIg de tsam gyis thugs ches mdzad pa'i mi rigs// gal te der mi gshegasu mi rurgyan yang dor gshegs la// mcho longs spyod bor te slar myur du gshegs pa'i rigs kyi// den yun ri
99a3(skyes rabs): bzhugs par yang mi rigs la// gtan du bzhugs par yang dgongs par mi rigaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi dus la bab cing zla ba dang skar ma dang rgyu skar dri ma med pas brgyan pa'i tshe/ ngang pa'i tshogs mang po
99a4(skyes rabs): yula~M bA ra NA se'i mtsho lta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis dar 'dod pa'i phyir yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa dang / ngang pa de dag gis de zlog ma pong nas bzhin bzangs so la sogs pa ngang pa mang pos yongasu bskor te zla ba sngon gyi
99a5(skyes rabs): sprin gyis bskor ba bzhin du der song ngo // mtsho chen de ni nyams dga' dpal mthong nas// yaMd 'od dgu bkod pa sna tshogs rnams// rab tu dga' bar sems dpa' de rnams kyis/ gan su rung bar yon tan+da mtshungs par gyur//
99a6(skyes rabs): mtsho de gnas skabs de dang de dag gis// yid bzhin mcho bas gang dag lhag gyur pa// de'i phyir de ni ring du gnas par sems// yid bzhin mchol de dag mi dmigaso// de dag gis mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra de yang
99b1(skyes rabs): thos la de na bya mang po rnams kyang bde bar 'khod// mtsho de'i longs spyod kyis sems rab tu dga' zhing // de na skyed mos tshal du rtser dong dong ba bzhin du longs spyod rnaM su myong zhing rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas mtsho de bsrung
99b2(skyes rabs): bar bskos pa'i mi rnams kyi ngang pa de dag der lhags par rgyal po lo bdas par gsol pa/ lha ston ngang pa'i mchog gnyis shig yon tan dang gzugs dka' mchi du gda' ba de kho na 'dra ba'i ngang pa mchog gnyis shig 'dab
99b3(skyes rabs): ma ni gser gyi 'dab ma ltar mdzes// gdong dang rkang pa gnyis ni gser bcom pas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing mdzes// lus kyi tshad ni lhag par che zhing legs pa dag cig ngang pa'i g.yog 'khor brgya phrag du mas bskor te
99b4(skyes rabs): lha'i mtsho brgyan pa'i phyir mchis pa bzhin du 'dir mchis zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal po des bya shor ba'i mi bya shor ba'i las la mkhas par grags shing grub cig btsal nas bya de gzung ba'i phyir rim gro bskyed bka' stsal to//
99b5(skyes rabs): nges kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes rgyal po'i bka' mnyan nas ngang pa de gnyis kyis gnas dang spyod yul legs par brtags te/ de dang de dag tu snyi dam po rnams mi mngon par byas te gtsugaso// de nas dang pa de dag yid
99b6(skyes rabs): brtan cing ma rung du dogs pa med pas rab tu dga' nas yid g.yengs bzhin du rgyu zhing 'khor 'khod pa las ngang ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis rnyis zin par gyur to// brid pa'i thobs ni mkhas pa yis// nye su dogs pa med
100a1(skyes rabs): pa rnams// bag phab pa ni log par 'gyur// bag med brlag pa'i 'byung khung yin// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ gzhan dag las kyang kha cig 'di lta bu yi nyam nyes par gyur na mi rA d+yo snyam nas sgra
100a2(skyes rabs): 'byin pa'i bye brag gi mtsho 'di 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin zhes bsgrag so// de nas drang ba de dag dang pa'i bdag po rlom zin pas skyi khams nas 'jigs shing skrag la brtag pa'i skad mi snyan pa phyung ste/ gcig la gcig mo lte
100a3(skyes rabs): dmag mi g.yul ngor phan pa bzhin du phyogs phyogasu 'phur nas byer ro// ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs ni ngang pa'i bdag po'i drung nas ma g.yoso// byams pa'i bcing pas yid ni bcing ba rnams// rang gi srog dang bral ba'ang
100a4(skyes rabs): mi semaso// mdza' bshes nyam nyes gyur pa'i mya ngan ni// srog dang bral ba bas kyang sdug bsngal che// de nas byang chub sems dpas bzhin bzangs la smras pa/ song zhig song zhig bzhin bzangs khyod// 'di ni 'dug par mi
100a5(skyes rabs): rigaso// nga ni 'di ltar gyur pa la/ khyod kyi grogs byar ga la yod// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'di na mchis par dgum par nges ma mchis// gud du mchis kyang dga' shi med mi 'gyur// bde ba'i tshe na rtag tu khyod bkur la//
100a6(skyes rabs): nyam nyes tshe ni dor du ga la rung // ring gi srog bzung tsam gyis phyir// bya yi rgyal po khyod bor na// gtam ngan char bzhin 'bab pa yi// skyabs ni bdag la ci zhig mchis// rgyal po chen po nyams nyes pa// bor te mchi ba chos
100b1(skyes rabs): ma mchis sam// bya rgyal khyad na cir gyur pa// de ltar bdag nyid gyur gyung rabya// de ltar byang chub sems dbus smras pa// rnas ni zin par gyur pa sku// tshang bad min pa gang du 'gro// khyod ni ma zin bde bar gnas// ci'i phyir de ltar
100b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur bar 'dod// de ltar byas na cir 'gyur ltos// gnyis ka srog dang bral gyur na// gnyen bshes phyi na 'khod pa dang // khyod dang nga la ci zhig phan// bde dang mi bad mun khung bzhin// phan pa'i don ni mi mngon pa// de lta bu la
100b3(skyes rabs): sro ga bor na// khyod kyis don ni ci zhig bstan// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa// 'dab chags rnams kyi gtso bo khyod// chos kyi don kyang mi gzigs sam// chos don legs par bgyid na ni// srid kyi don mchog thob par 'gyur// /
100b4(skyes rabs): bdag ni chos kyi don la lta// chos las srid kyang thob par 'gyur// khyo de la glo ba nye ba'i phyir// bdag ni gson par mi 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// mdza' bo nyam nyes gyur pa la// grogs po gang dag chos dran
100b5(skyes rabs): zhing // srog gi phyir yang mi gtong la// dam pa rnams kyi chos yin bden// de bas khyod kyis chos bzhin byas// nga la gus pa'ang bsten zin gyis// ngas ni gsol ba btab pa bzhin// nga bdag 'dod pa bzhin du song // de ltar
100b6(skyes rabs): byas na rung ba ni// mdza' bshes nga dang bral ba rnams// blo gros phun sum tshogs pa khyod// song na 'byor pa mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar de gnyis gcig la gcig/ byams pa'i yon tan smra ba la// 'chi bdag mngon du 'ongs
101a1(skyes rabs): pa bzhin// rngon pa de yang 'ongs pa mthong // de nas ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis kyis rngon pa de 'ong ba mthong ba dang cang mi smra bar 'khod do// des kyang dad pa mang po de dag byer te med par gyur pa mthong nas//
101a2(skyes rabs): 'dir 'ga' zhig ni rnyis zin yang dag go snyam nas blo la nges par bskyed de// rnyi btsugs pa'i gnas rnams thul du song song dang dang pa'i mchog de gnyis mthong ngo // de de'i gzugs bzang po des yid la ngo mtshar cher gyur te gnyis
101a3(skyes rabs): ka rnis zin to snyam nas// der gtsugs pa'i rnyi gnyis bsgral ba dang // de nas gcig ni rnyis zin// gcig ni rnyis ma zin par bde bar 'dug bzhin du rim gro byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas snying la ya mtshan cher gyur te bzhin bzad/
101a4(skyes rabs): lel rme du smras pa/ bya 'di ni yis zin pas na// 'phur to 'gro ba'i mthu rtsa la med// ri yang drung du 'ongs bzhin du// mkha' le phur ti mI 'gro 'am// khyod ni ma zin bde par 'dug/ 'ad shu gshog rdzogs shing mthu dang ldan//
101a5(skyes rabs): nga ni 'dri ru 'ongs gyur k+ta d+yA// ci phyir mkha' la myur mi 'gro/ bzhin bzangs kyis de skad zer ba thos nas// tshig 'bru rab tu gsal zhing spel legs la rang bzhin gyis yid du 'ong zhing brtan pa'i yon tan gyi gzi byin dang /
101a6(skyes rabs): ldan pa'i sgra phyung ste// mi'i skad du smras pa/ nus bzhin du ni mi 'gro ba// bya 'di rnyi yis zin gyur te// sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur// de phyir nga ni mi 'gro bo// khyod kyis 'di yis rkang pa gnyis// rnyi yis zhags pa
101b1(skyes rabs): chen pos bzung // bdag kyang 'dri yI yon tAn gyi// rI nr-i d+ha bsu dgu du sbyin// de nas rngon pa de rab tu ya mtshan cher gyur te sgyu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bzhin blazangs la yang smras pa/ dA yis 'jigs nus drung ba gzhan// 'di bor nas
101b2(skyes rabs): ni gud du dong // khyod ni 'di ltar mi 'di gtong // bya 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong gi/ bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa// nga'i rgyal po srog dang 'dra ba'i grogs// bde ba'i sbyin pa de ni nyam nyes gyur// de bas bdag gi srog ni yal gyur kyang // 'di
101b3(skyes rabs): ni gtong bar bdag gis mi nuso// de nas bzhin bzangs kyi rngon pa de yid mgu zhing ya mtshan cher byed par shes nas yang smras pa/ bzang po bdag cag skyes po 'dis// gal te bde ba 'byung 'gyur zhing // dra ring bdag cag btang na ni
101b4(skyes rabs): chos dang ldan pa'i glags pa 'thob// rngon pas smras pa/ nga ni khyod la gnod mi byed// khyod ni nga yos bzung ba med// de bas khyod ni ci bdar song // gnyen dang phrad cing dga' bar gyis// bzhin bzangs kyis smras pa// bdag ni
101b5(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal mi bzhed na// bdag gis gsol pa bzhin du mdzod// gal te gtsug gi sa mnyes gyur na// 'di ni thong la bdag zung zhig/ bdag cag mchu dang zhing yang mnyam// na chod la yang rgan gzhon med// 'di ltas blus pa
101b6(skyes rabs): gyur pa la// khyod dang bdag gnyis pham rgyal med// bdag la thugs chos mi 'gyur na// khyod kyis bdag ni star bzung la// bya'i rgyal po phyi nas thong // khyod kyi rnyed pa'ang de bzhin la// bdag gis gsol pa'ang gnang bar
102a1(skyes rabs): mdzod/ ngang pa mang po 'ang dga' bar gyis// de bas mdza' ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur// khyod kyis btang na ji ltar 'gyur ba gzigs// ngang pa mang po grags pa'i bdag po do// na mkha' dang ba'i nang na rnam mdzes
102a2(skyes rabs): pa// lha min rgyal pos zla ba btang ba bzhin// de nas rngon pa de snying sra zhing rtsub pa la goms kyang de rang gi srog la yang mi lta bar dze bai la snying nye zhing byams pa dang chu gang dang khres ltas tshwa ba'i yon tan gyi byin drang ldan pa dang /
102a3(skyes rabs): bstan zhing 'jam por smra ba'i rgyan pa'i tshig nges sems dul bar gyur nas// ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu gus pa'i dbang gis thal mo sbyar te bzhin bzongs la smras pa/ skal pa chen po legaso legs// dzaM ba'i don du srog btang
102a4(skyes rabs): pa/ khyod kyi 'dir ni gang bstan pa// de lta bu yi chos bzang ba// mi 'am lha yis nang na dkon// de bas khyod kyi rgyal po de// mgu bar byas nas btang bar bya'o// khyod kyis srog pas phangs de la// gnod par byed pa su zhig
102a5(skyes rabs): yod// de skad ces smras nas rngon pa des rgyal po de'i bka' ma mnyan par ngang pa'i rgyal po snying rje can de la rim gro byas nas rnyi bkrol-i te btang ngo // de nas dang po'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs de ngang pa'i rgyal po de btang bas snying
102a6(skyes rabs): rab tu dga' bar gyur te// rngon pa la dga' zhing byams pa'i dga' bas bltas nas smras pa// ngang pa'i rgyal po khyod kyi dang btang bas// bdag ni mdza' bos ji ltar dgar gyur pa// bzang po khyod kyang gnyen dang lhan cig tu// /
102b1(skyes rabs): ston brgya mang po dag tu dga' bar shog/ khyod kyis las byas don med mi 'gyur phyir// nga dang ngang pa mang po'i bdag po gnyis// bde bar zung la khur gyi dor bsngos te// pho brang nang du rgyal po'i spyan sngar brims// ngang pa'i rgyal po
102b2(skyes rabs): g.yog dang bcas gzigs nas// rgyal po de ni nges par dgyes par 'gyur// khyod la mgu bar gyur pa'i nor chen rnams// re yang mi ra ba dag stsol bar 'gyur// de nas nges gal gyis bac+doMs me dang // rngon pa des bsams
102b3(skyes rabs): pa// 'di lta bu'i dang pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di gnyis re zhig rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim mo snyam nas/ ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis khur gyi dor bsngos te bde zhing ma bcings par khyer te song song nas rgyal po'i spyan sngar brimaso//
102b4(skyes rabs): bdag gis ngang pa'i rgyul po 'di// sde dpon dang bcas 'tshal te mchis// rnga du byung ba'i spyan gzigs 'di// rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim du gsol// de nas rgyal po de ya mtshan che zhing snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas// drang
102b5(skyes rabs): pa'i mchog gser gyi pha 'ong lhar gze mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba de gnyis bltas nas// rngon pa de la smras pa/ bya 'di gnyis ni mi bcings la// snang cing smras pa'ang yod med par// khyod ni sa
102b6(skyes rabs): la 'gro ba yis// ji ltar zin pa bzhin du smros// de skad ces smras pa dang // rngon pa des rgyal po la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa// mtsho dang lu ma'i 'gram dag na// bya rnams rgyu ba'i sa phyogasu// bya rnyi rab tu mi bzad pa//
103a1(skyes rabs): bdag gis shin tu mang po gtsugs// de nas ngang pa'i mchog 'di ni// bgra phab dogs pa med par rgyu// rnyi rnams btsugs pa de dag gis// rkang pa gnyis ni zin par gyur// gcig ni mu
103a2(skyes rabs): zin de la 'khor// bdag la de yis gsol ba btab// dang pa'i rgyal po'i srog blung du// bdag nyid mchis kyis 'tshalabar gyur// mi'i skad du tshig smra ba// rnam par gsal la tshig 'bru 'jam// bdag gi srog
103a3(skyes rabs): kyang yongs gtong zhing // gsol ba 'debs kyang gzi byin che// de bas 'di tshig rab tu 'jam pa dang // rje la snying nye spyod tshul brtan pa des// bdag ni mgu bar gyur nas 'di yi rje// bdag gis khro ba btang nas 'di yang
103a4(skyes rabs): gtang // de ltar bya rgyal 'di ni gtang ba yi// dga' bar gyur nas snyam pa mang du smras// bdag gi sug las don mod mi 'gyur phyir// khyod kyi spyan sngar khrid ces bdag la mchi// de bas 'di ni bya'i gzugs can chos
103a5(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa gzhan zhig lags// gang gi bdag gi sems kyang de ma thag tu 'jam zhing mnyen par gyur// de bas bdag gis bya yi rgyal po rnyi los bkrol te btang ba dang / bdag gi drin gzo phyir nI rje khol bcas te/
103a6(skyes rabs): khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis// rgyal po des de skad ces thos nas rab tu dga' zhing yid la ya mtshan tshar gyur te/ gser gyi spyan khri rgyal po'i gdan du 'os pa'i khri'i rkang pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'od zer 'phro zhing
103b1(skyes rabs): sdug pa// lha'i ba dan+da rim pa du mar bshams shing bzang ba// rgyu brten bde zhing nyams dga' bas brgyan pa// rkang brten btsugs pa zhig ngang ba'i rgyal po'i stan du thing shig ces bka' stsal to// blon po chen
103b2(skyes rabs): po'i stan du 'os pa skra'i khri zhig ni bzhin bzangs kyi stan du thing shig ces sgo'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas dpas bsams pa/ da ni dga' bar gyur pa'i gtam bya ba'i skabasu bab po snyam nas dril bu ltar snyan pa'i skad phyung ste
103b3(skyes rabs): rgyal po la smras pa/ gzi byin che zhing mdangs dang ldan pa'i sku// bde ba'i gnas khyod de ltar thugs bde 'am// khyod kyi chos kyi sku la rma med dam// bka' lung snyan pas rgya cher dbugs phyung ngam// phan gdags nan tur bgyi ba'i
103b4(skyes rabs): bka' khrims kyis// 'bangs kyi skye dgu srung ba'i dbang bskur tam// bdag gi grags pa'i gtam snyan rgyas gyur tam// 'bangs rnams glo ba nye zhing phan btags sam// blon po 'dzings shing glo ba nye ba rnams// brtags
103b5(skyes rabs): pa'i thabs kyis legs par brtagos lags sam/ 'bangs la smad pa rtag tu dgongs lags sam// de dag mi mkhyen par ni mi bzhugs glang // dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas pa'i bka' nan gyis// rgyal phran de dag bka' ni
103b6(skyes rabs): nyan lags sam/ thugs rje chen po'o mdzes pa mchis lags sam/ thug ches bag med pa ni mi na ma nal grangs// chos dang bde dang srid rnams mthun lags sam// khyod kyi spyod pa dam pa dga' ba yi// grags pa
104a1(skyes rabs): phyogasu rgyas par gyur pa yis// dgra rnams shugs 'byin smod par 'gyur lags sam// de nas rgyal po do sems rab tu dga' zhing dbang po rnams kyang dang la gsal bar gyur nas de la slar smras pa/ ngang pa de
104a2(skyes rabs): ring bdag kyang bde// thams cad du yang bde bar gyur// dam pa dag dang phrad po 'di// yun rings bsams pa grub par gyur// khyod ni rnyi yis zin pa na// dga' bas sems ni g.yengs gyur nas// khyod la dbyig pas brdegs nas
104a3(skyes rabs): nI/ 'di yis snang par ma byas sam// de ltar rngon pa 'di dag ni// bya rnams zin cing snang 'gyur na// dga' ba sems ni g.yengs gyur nas// ngan pa dag kyang spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'di lta bur
104a4(skyes rabs): ni nyam nyes kyang // rgyal po chen po bde zhing mchis// 'dis kyang bdag la dag bzhin du// gnod pa ci yang ma bgyis// bzhin bzangs 'di yang ma zin par// bdag la byams pas zin bzhin 'dug/ 'jam por smra ba
104a5(skyes rabs): mthong ba dang // ngo mtshor ya mtshan che bar gyur// 'di yi tshig ni 'jam po yis// de nas yid ni mgu gyur nas// dul zhing rim gro tshor bskyed de// bdag ni 'di yis rnyi las bkrol// de bas 'di ltar bzhin bzangs
104a6(skyes rabs): kyis// 'di la phan yon bdags pa dang // bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i phyir// bdag cag gnyis ni 'dir mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ bsam pa gnyis ni 'dir byon te// khyed gnyis byon pa rab tu legs// khyed gnyis
104b1(skyes rabs): mthong bar gyur pas na// bdag ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// rnon po 'di yang di ring ni// don chen grub par gzigs su gsol// 'o skal gnyis ka dgyes bgyis pas// 'di ni mgu bar bgyi ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras
104b2(skyes rabs): nas// rgyal po des rngon pa de la nor rab tu mang zhing rgya cher byin te mgu bar byas nas ngang pa'i rgyal po la smras pa/ khyed gnyis ched du bdag gi khyim du byon// de bas bdag la 'dzem dogs ma mchis par// ci dang ci bzhed
104b3(skyes rabs): de dag bdag la gsungs// bdag gi bdog pa khyed dang thun mong lags// mdza' bos spobs te dog med tshig gsal bar// longs spyod bdog la bslang na mgur gyur ba// de lta bur ni nor gyis mgu mi 'gyur//
104b4(skyes rabs): de bas mdza' bos sbrebs na phan yon che// de nas rgyal po de bzhin bzungs smrar gzhug par 'dod nas 'dzum dmul te bzhin bzangs la bltas nas smras pa// skye bo gsar du bshes pa ma 'dris pa// rab tu
104b5(skyes rabs): spobs shing bag dbab mi rung yang // dras shing mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshig bdag ni// zhes sngar bcas shing snyan pa mi smra min// de bas tshig tsam smra ba yis// bdag ni spobs par re bA dang // phyi phyir mdza' bar
104b6(skyes rabs): 'dod pa yi// bsam pa don yod bgyi ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzangs kyis de la tshul bzhin du phyag 'tshal te smras pa// dbang chen 'dra ba khyod dang gnyis// de ltar bka' mchid
105a1(skyes rabs): gsungs pa ni// rab tu dgyes pa'i tshul bstan na// su zhig yid la byas ma mi rdzogs// mi yi bdag po bka' mchid gsung bzhin la// byA yi bdug po 'ang rab tu dga' bzhin// bka' mchid de lta'i
105a2(skyes rabs): nang du 'bangs dag gis// spyi brtol bskyed smra ba'i ga la rigs// ya rabs dul ba'i tshig ni de ma lags// de ltar 'tshal bzhin rab tu ji ltar 'jug/ rgyal po chen po de bas bdag mi smra// bzod pa'i mdzad pa'i rigs
105a3(skyes rabs): ni bzod par gsol// de skad ces smras po dang / rgyal po de rab tu dag zhing bzhin gyi mdangs phyung nas bzhin bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// lha khyod kyi yon tan gtam snyanA mi rnams zer ba'i rigs// dang ba'i bdag po dang
105a4(skyes rabs): yang grogs por 'tham pa'i rigs// dul ba dang ni tshul la mkhas pa 'di lta bu// rang gi sems ni ma sbyangs pa la ga la yod// de bas bdag cag mdza' ba 'di// ci nas rgyun mi bcad pa dang // de bzhin bdag la
105a5(skyes rabs): spobs par bgyis// ya rabs phrang ba nyams ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de rab tu mdza' bar 'dod pa rang byams par gyur par shes nas de la mgu bar byedad cing 'di skad smras// dang po pa shes par
105a6(skyes rabs): gyur na yang // bdag nyid chen po'i tshul 'dzin pas// mdza' bo dam pas bya ba gang // de ni khyod kyis bdag la byas// bkur sti baugyi ba'i cho ge 'dis// khyod kyis bdag la gang bstan pa// rgyal po chen po su yi sems//
105b1(skyes rabs): dran zhing dmigs par mi 'gyur mchis// dgos pa lta zhig ched ci zhig mchis// rgyal po chen po khyod la brten cing lta// khyod ni mgron la dga' zhing yon tan 'dod// 'di ltar gyur pa nges par goms pa'i yon// 'bangs la phan phyi/
105b2(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pa// drang srong mnyam bzhag dka' thub 'bad pa bzhin// khyod kyi yon tan rang gis gnas// rang bzhin dul ba khyod lha lags kyang mad// de bas bstod par 'os pa'i yon tan bde// 'byung po nyos pa'i
105b3(skyes rabs): gcod rlong mi 'dong ngo // yon tan skyon gyi chos nyid 'di shes nas// sems yod su zhig lam ngan 'gro/ dpa' bas 'khor yul thob par mi 'gyur la// nor dang stsol phod thabs kyi de mi 'thab// yon tan med na nor bgod
105b4(skyes rabs): 'bad mi phan// rgyal po yon tan gyis ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i rgyal po'i dpal yang yon tan ltos// yon tan yod na rgyud kyang rab tu 'phel// grags pa rnams kyang yon tan nyid las 'phro// bdag nyid che ba'i mthu yang
105b5(skyes rabs): yon tan gnas// zla ba'i 'od pas gsal ba'i yon tan ni// dgra bo mi bzad dregs pas sdang ba dang // kho na snying yod cing phrag dog che ba yang // yid ni rab tu dang zhing myugu byed do// rgyal po de ltar dul la sogs pa yi// /
105b6(skyes rabs): yon tan bzang zhing che ba ma nyams par// rgyal phran dreg pa mthu yis btul nas ni// sa 'di skyongs la 'bangs kyang bslab du gsol// 'bangs la phan gdags rgyal po'i don gyi mchog/ rgyal po chos la dga' bar gyur
106a1(skyes rabs): na ni// tshe rabs gnyis kar bde ba'i lam 'di yin// rgyal po spyod pa bzhin du 'bangs kyang spyod// de bas chos bzhin sa la gnas pa slobs// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yang khyod la srung // khyod kyi drung na bde
106a2(skyes rabs): par gnas gyur kyang // bdag gi grogs mang sdug bsngal 'bod pa bzhin// de nas rgyal po des 'khor dang bcas par de'i tshig de la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti dang tshig snyan par smos te ngang pa'i gtso bo de gnyis
106a3(skyes rabs): slar skye'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi na mkha'i dkyil ral gyi dri ma med pa ltar sngo zhing dang la mdzes pa la 'phur nas bzhin bzangs phyi bzhin du 'brang ba ni gzugs brnyan drung du 'jug pa 'dra bar byas te ngang pa'i
106a4(skyes rabs): tshigs mang po de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang // mthong ma thag tu rab tu dga' ba dang ldan par byas// dus dus dag tu ngang pa'i rgyal po de// gzhan la snying brtse'i phyir ni rgyal po'i dar// ched du song nas chos kyang 'chad par byed// rgyal po
106a5(skyes rabs): des kyang mchod pa gus par byas// de bas na dam pa rnams dung 'gror lhung ba'i spyod po la yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis rjesu mthun par bya ba tsam yang mi nus na de 'gro na gnas pa rnams la lha smos kyang ni dgos
106a6(skyes rabs): de ltar tshig sman pa ni gnyis kau la phan par 'gyur ba yin zhes tshig sten par smra ba'i yon tan bsdogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang ldan ni don sgrub da' ba yang grub par 'gyuro zhes dge ba'i
106b1(skyes rabs): bshes gnyen gyi yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o// gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i sngon gyi ris mthun pa brtan pA la yang brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan 'di ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan
106b2(skyes rabs): cig tu 'grogs 'grogs te yun ring por byams pa dang rab tu gus pa 'ba' zhig byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// ngang pa'i skyes pa'i rab sA te nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud bram po
106b3(skyes rabs): brgyad pa// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni phan btags pa drin du gzo ba dang bzod pa l-i goms pas rim gro ma byas kyang sngon phan 'dogs pa la snying brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur ro// de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das po 'di sngon
106b4(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe kun tu rgyu byang chub sems ces bya bar gyur te zhes phyug/ de khyim na gnas bzhin du 'jig rten pas bsngags pa'i rigs pa'i gnas rnams kyi go rim 'di rgya cher shes// sgyu rtsa
106b5(skyes rabs): rnam pa sna tshogs la ni mkhas par byas// rab tu byung nas kyang 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par brtson pas chos kyi gtsug lag rnams le lhag par yang blo zhen par gyur te// de dag la slob dpon gyi go 'phang
106b6(skyes rabs): thob par gyur to// des bsod nams dang ldan zhing shes rgya che ba dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod tshul la mkhas pa dang / nan tan che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pas gang dang gang du song ba de dang der mkhas pa rnams dang / mkhas pa la
107a1(skyes rabs): dga' ba rnams dang / rgyal po rnams dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams dang / bram ze dang // khyim bdag rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyis bkuran+d+ha
107a2(skyes rabs): bya zhing dran par bya bar gyur to// bsod nams gzhi los 'bar ba'i yon tan rnams// nan tan sgrub pa'i byin gyis dag bar 'gyur// dag yang rang gi grags pa bsrung ba'i phyir// lhag po ri bkurA sti byed pa nyi du gyur/
107a3(skyes rabs): nga nas bdag nyid chen po do 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang grong rdal dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rgyu zhing song song ba las// rgyal po zhig gi yul gyi ma dab tu phyin par gyur ro// de'i yo/
107a4(skyes rabs): tan gyi mthu chen po rgyal po ngos thos shing de rgyang ring po nas yid rab tu dge' ste/ rang gi skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs shig tu de'i gnas byed du bcug/ bsu pa la sogs pa bkurar+ya sti cher byas te rang
107a5(skyes rabs): gi yul du bzhag nas// slob dpon lnga slob mas bya ba bzhin du rim gro bkur sti tshul bzhin du byas te mchod cing bkur to// longs spyod yon tan phun sum tshogs// khyim du re ba'i 'gron 'ongs nas// yon tan
107a6(skyes rabs): can la dga' ba rnams// rab tu dga' zhi nga spro bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas kyang de la chos kyi gtam yid du 'ong zhing rnar snyan pa rnams kyis phan par 'gyur ba'i lam bstan pas nyi ma re re zhing phan 'dogs par
107b1(skyes rabs): gyur to// gus pa med la'ang chos la dga' ba rnams// gzhan la snying brtse phan pa'i tshig spyan// phan par 'dod cing yon tan dga' ba yi// skye bo sdud btsang 'dra la smos ci dgos// de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams dang //
107b2(skyes rabs): mkhas pa'i thabs skyob pa rnams 'khor tshogs pa'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' lha rim gro cher byas pa dang // yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la blag dag gr-I semaswA bskyod nas mi dru bad+hA gyur to// rang go ldan tan grags
107b3(skyes rabs): khyad par can// 'gro ba mgu bar nus pa'i mthu can la// yon ton bcose mas bkur sti thob pa rnams// phrag dog me ni gror ma chug par 'bar// de la gtsug lag gi gtam gyis mngon sum du zil gyis mnan ma nus shing // rgyal po
107b4(skyes rabs): chos la brten pa yang ma bzod nas thabs de dang de dag gis rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la mi dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ce'o// lha kun tu rgyu byang chub la thugs ches par mdzad pa'i myi rigaso// gdon mi 'tshal bar 'di ni lha yon
107b5(skyes rabs): tan la dgyes pa dang // chos la phyogs par 'tshal nas// brlag par bgyi ba'i slad g.yo dang bcas pa'i tshiglo 'jam pos smra zhing spyod pa'i nyams drod 'dzin pa lags te/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po gzhan zhig gis bye ma rta btang ba lasna gor
107b6(skyes rabs): ma bkumo// de ltar ci mngon zhe na// 'di ltar chos kyi bdag nyid can du bgyis nas lha'i zhal snga nas gcig kho nar thugs rje che ba dang / ngo tsha mkhyen cing 'jam nges can du brlabs te// srid dang 'dod pa dang mi mthun pa/ rgyal rigs kyi
108a1(skyes rabs): chos ma yin pa/ sman ngag dang mi mthun pa/ chos la skul ma 'debs shing snying rje dang ldan par bgyi ba'i don du sgrub cing tshad cher bgyis nas thabs kyis bag 'beb so// nyi 'og gi rgyal po'i pho nya dag dang yang bshes
108a2(skyes rabs): shrIshing 'dral la// 'di ni nyid kyang rgyal por gtsug lag gi rgyu la mi mkhas pa yang ma lags te/ de bas na bdag cag 'di la glo ba mi chiso// de nas rgyal po de la dben gyi skabs yang dang yang du lan du mar phan par 'dod pa bzhin du mi ma
108a3(skyes rabs): pos smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la yid mi ches par gyur te byams pa bkur sti chung zhing sems sngon dang mi 'dra bar gyur to// 'brug sgra drag po'o ser ba 'dra ba yi// dben gyi ser ba rdo rje bab na ni// mi tsam chod kyi mdza' ba
108a4(skyes rabs): brtan pa dag/ nyams shing zhig par mi 'gyur su zhig yod// de nas rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' de la bag mi 'bebs shing dga' dga' ltar mi byed la bkur sti chung bar gyur nas sngon bzhin du rim gro ma byed par gyur to//
108a5(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa' yang sems gtsang bas rgyal po rnams ni bya ba mang pos 'brel to snyam nas// de ltar gyur pa yid la yang mi byed na// de'i 'khor ba 'khod pa 'khod pa rnams gus pa rnams dang rim gro byed pa la gra yel bar
108a6(skyes rabs): gyur pa mthong ba dang / rgyal po thugs mi dgyes pa shes nas// kun tu rgyu'i yo byad dbyig pa gsum dang / ril ba spyi blugs la sogs pa khyer te 'gro bar cha so// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po des thos nas da dung kho na byung ba nyi du yang ma
108b1(skyes rabs): gyur pas nges shing dul ba'i tshul bstan te// de'i drung du song nas rtab rtab por gyur pa 'dra bar byas te// slar bzlog par 'dod pa bzhin du smras pa// ci phyir 'di ltar 'phral la bdag bor te// khyod ni 'gro bar chas pa bzhin du sems
108b2(skyes rabs): nongs par dogs pa 'ga' zhig byung ba'i gzhi// bdag gis nongs pa khyod kyis mthong ngam ci// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la smras pa/ bdag ni 'phral la 'di ltar mi mchi zhing // bkur sti chung ba tsam gyi khros ma lags//
108b3(skyes rabs): khyod ni chos kyi snod du ma gyur cing // g.yo dang bcas pa bdag ni 'di nas mchi// de nas rgyal po de'i khyi gnang chen zhig khros shing zugs te so gtsigs nas der zar 'ongs pa bstan nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mi ma
108b4(skyes rabs): legs pas 'dis tshe gzhi bgyis pa gzigasu gsol/ khyi 'di sngon gyis rjes 'brang zhing // bdag la rab tu 'dris par bgyis pa las// mdzad stangs gsang ba shes par ma gyur nas// gzugs shing za bas khyod kyi dgongs
108b5(skyes rabs): pa bstan// bdag la ma gus rtsub pa cung zad cig/ khyod la nges par 'di yis thos ljags grang // de bas 'dis kyang rjesu 'brangs par gyur// 'khor rnams spyod pa khyod ni dgyes par bgyis// de nas rgyal po de rtags la
108b6(skyes rabs): bab pa dang ngo tsha bas mgo smang // 'di blo rno ba des sems dul nas mi dga' bar gyur te/ da ni g.yo bya ba'i dus la ma bab po snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' lo phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ khyod la gleng nas bka' mchid 'di
109a1(skyes rabs): lta bu/ bdag tshogs pa'i nang du bgyis kyang mang// dgos pa'i dbang gis bdag gis yal bar bor// de bas bzod par mdzod la ma bzhud bzhugs// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag ni bkur spyi
109a2(skyes rabs): chung ba'i phyir mi bzod do mchi ba ma legs kyi/ rgyal po chen po de ni mchis pa'i dus ma lags pa'i slad du myi mchiso// khyod gzigasu gsol/ bkur sti cung zad bri bar gyur pa'i tshe// bdag rang langs te song bar ma gyur na// po
109a3(skyes rabs): bzhin 'dog pa ngan cing byis pa'i chos// ma stes na ni slad kyis bsgag par 'gyur// de bas da ni mchi ba'i dus la bab// mi dga' bzhin du mchis su ga la rung / lan cig tsam zhig rma bab gyur pa yis// sngon cad phan btags
109a4(skyes rabs): pa dang ga l-i mnyam// byams pa'i rlan med bstan du mi rung ste// khron pa skam po chu 'dod mi bsten bzhin// de la rab tu bsgrims te don sgrubs kyang // de don chung zhing rnyog pa can du 'gyur// bde ba 'dod cing nyon mongs mi 'dod/
109a5(skyes rabs): pas// mtsho chen ston ko'i chu gtsang 'dra ba ni// rab tu drang ba nyid la brtan pa'i rigs// tshul 'di 'jig rten dag na gsal bar grags// gus par byed kyang gzhan du phyogs pa dang // gzhan du phyogs kyang zhum pas
109a6(skyes rabs): de la lta// sngon chad phan btags drin bu mi bzo ba// mi yi gzugs te ci lags gtol ma mchis// ma brten pa dang rab tu bsten drags dang // bslong ba dang drags ni byams pa med par gyur// de bas gnas pa'i
109b1(skyes rabs): skyon las mdza' ba'i 'jug 'di ni// bsrung bar 'tshal gyis bdag ni re zhig mchi// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod gal te mi 'gror mi rung yang dag par sems na// nga cung slar yang 'dir byon cing bdag spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i rigs
109b2(skyes rabs): so// ha cang ma bsten pa las kyang kho na byung bar bgyi ba'i mi rigs// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni bar chad mang la gnod pa dang dgra mang bas gdon mi 'tshal bar mchi'o zhes
109b3(skyes rabs): mched kyis 'tshal du mi rung ngo // gal te mchi ba'i skabs dang ldan na khyod kyi zhal lta'o zhes bdag nyid chen po des rgyal po de tshig 'dzum pos dga' bar byas nas// rgyal po des gnang zhing bkur sti byas te de'i yul nas byung ste/
109b4(skyes rabs): song ngo // de'i khyim pa dang bsnyen pa des sems mi bde bar gyur nas dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu gnas te// blo bsam gtan la brtson zhing de na gnas gnas pa las ring po ma lon par bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes
109b5(skyes rabs): pa lnga thob par gyur to// rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i ro myong ba de rgyal po de la snying brtse ba'i dran par byung bar gyur pa ni rgyal po de de tsam ji lta zhig 'dug snyam pa dang / de nas de 'di ltar blon po de dag gis lta ba gang la chags pa
109b6(skyes rabs): de la ltar bcug pa mthong ngo // de la blon po la las ni rgyu rtags mi bzod pa'i dpe rnams kyis rgyu med pa'i lta ba la drangs// pad+ma'i sdong bu lo ma ze ba snying po dang // kha dog dbyibs dang 'jam la sogs pa'i rgyu ni gang // bya yi/
110a1(skyes rabs): mdab ma sna tshogs ri mo 'dri ba su// 'gro ba 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin des// kha cig ni dbang phyug gi blos sbyar ba rgyu yin par ston te// 'di dag thams cad rgyu med 'byung ba'i mi rigs te// 'dri la kun
110a2(skyes rabs): gyi bdag po mtha' yas gcig cig yod// sna tshogs 'di dag rang dgar byed pa nges pa yod// 'jig rten byas nas phyis kyang mnyam du med par byed// yang la la ni bde ba dang mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las
110a3(skyes rabs): kyi byas kyi// 'bad pa'i mthus byas pa ni ma yin no zhes de la de ltar 'dzin du bcugo/ dngos po mtha' yas so sor gnas pa mang po rnams// gcig pus dus gcig du ni ji ltar bya bar nus// bde bar byed la mkhas pa
110a4(skyes rabs): 'ang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de bas 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las las gyur// gzhan dag ni chad par lta ba'i gtam gyis de 'dod pa'i longs spyod byed du gzhug pa'i phyir smras pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog yon
110a5(skyes rabs): tan ldan pa'i shing // las kyis byas pa ma yin 'on kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// chud gsan rnams kyang slar ni de bzhin skye mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de dang 'dra bas bde la gzhol por mdzod// kha T+wAMg ni de la rgyal rigs kyi
110a6(skyes rabs): gtsug lag las byung ba g.yo dang ngag thabs dang 'brel pa/ snying rje med cing skyon dang bcas pa// chos dang 'gal ba la 'di ni rgyal po'i chos lags so zhes gsol to// brtan pa'i mi rnams la ni grib ma'i ljon shing bzhin//
110b1(skyes rabs): de dag ji srid dgos pa'i dus la ma bab pa// de srid byas pa bzo bas rang gi grags pa bsrung // dgos pa byung na mchod sbyin phyug bzhin de dag spyad// de ltar blon po de dag gis rgyal po de lta ba ngan pa'i lam de dang de dag
110b2(skyes rabs): tu drangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po de skye bo sdig pa can rnams dang bsten cing blo gzhin gyi dring la 'jig pas lta ba ngan pa'i g.yang sar lhung du nye bar rtogs nas de la snying brtse bar gyur te de las
110b3(skyes rabs): bzlog pa'i thabs bsams pa// yon tan goms pas dge ba rnams// legs par byas pa sems la gnas// pad+ma'i 'dab mas chu bo bzhin// nyes pa byas pa mi chagaso// de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams
110b4(skyes rabs): pa// da ni de'i dus la bab po snyam nas rang gi dka' thub kyi gnasu spre'u chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de'i pags pa bshus te gzhan mi snang bar byas nas// de spre'u yi pags pa chen po sprul pa
110b5(skyes rabs): de gyon te rgyal po de'i pho brang gis sgor phyin pa dang chab sgo bas kyang sbran nas rgyal po'i 'khor tshogs pa go rim sna bzhin du mi 'khrug par 'khod pa mtha' ni mtshon cha thogs po rnams kyis bskor// blon po dang / bram ze dang /
110b6(skyes rabs): pho nya dang / nang mi'i gtso bo rnams kyis ni gang / skye bo rnams ni tshogs ni dul zhing brtan la rgya che// chab sgo chen po tshab sgo ba rol gri dang dbyug pa thogs pa rnams kyi bsrungs// mi'i bdag po ni seng ge'i khri la 'dug
111a1(skyes rabs): par 'ongs so// rgyal po des kyang bsu pa la sogs pa dang / 'gron 'ongs pa'i bkur sti bya ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / stan gding ba byas nas spre'u yi pags pa gyon pa ngo mtshar cher bzung nas
